    • AMEX GNS Outward Processing: supported export of Merchant Discount Rate for POS 1st presentments when new pipe parameter MERCHANT_FEE_CODE is specified.

  • [CARDS-47754]

    • AMEX GFS: Supported Global Settlement File Notification import.

  • [CARDS-51476]

    • "AMEX Statistics Issuing Business" default behaviour has changed. Now the report will group data by Internal Product Names, not by AMEX IPS Product names as before. To support this behaviour, a new parameter, P_ATTR_PS_ISS_INT_PRODUCT_NAME, has been added to the report (the default value is "PS_ISS_INT_PRODUCT_NAME"). Also, additional configuration is required and statistics gathering should be repeated for the required period to see the results in the new format. To keep the old behaviour, the P_ATTR_PS_ISS_INT_PRODUCT_NAME parameter should be set with an empty value. Please contact OpenWay Support for more details.

    Updated Manuals: [amex_statistical_reports\AMEX_Statistical_Reports.pdf]

  • [CARDS-52728]

    • Added grouping of totals by regions in the "BILLINGS & FEES" section of the XLS_AMEX_Statistics_Issuing_Business report.

    Updated Manuals: [amex_statistical_reports\AMEX_Statistical_Reports.pdf]

  • [CARDS-43882]

    • AMEX GNS Outward Processing: Fixed Chip Card (9240) ICC System Related Data field "Application PAN Sequence Number" filling. AMEX GNS Inward Processing: Fixed Chip Card (9240) ICC System Related Data fields "Application PAN Sequence Number", "Transaction Date", "Transaction Type" saving.

  • [CARDS-46738]

    • AMEX GNS Outward Processing: Fixed export of Restaurant Industry Specific Detail and Retail Industry Specific Detail.

  • [CARDS-47751]

    • "NMAS Doc IC.srd" form: the "Reason Code" field now gets a list of values from the standard handbook.

  • [CARDS-47827]

    • AMEX GNS Merchant Management: Dates processing.

  • [CARDS-49129]

  • [CARDS-51293]

    • AMEX FSF Export: Fixed Approval Code field format checking.

  • [CARDS-51492]

  • [CARDS-51825]

    • AMEX FSF Export: Supported empty Approval Code and empty batches won't be exported now.

  • [CARDS-52860]

    • The "Account Balances" section in the "XLS_AMEX_Statistics_Issuing_Business" report has been corrected: - Corrected calculation of 'Credit Outstanding Balance Total' and 'Current Credit Outstanding Balance' amount when the P_MIRROR_OVD parameter value is 'Y'. - Changed row order to fit AMEX specification requirements. - Delinquency group's rows are shown with zero values if there are no corresponding data.

    • Merchant Management: Fixed processing of incomplete operations.

  • [CARDS-53211]

  • [I1606296232]/[CARDS-49469]

    • AMEX GNS Inward/Outward: Chipcard Fallback transaction processing.

  • [I1609159302]/[CARDS-50584]

    • DA v2: Now there is an oppotunity to configure on the activity level (for Retrieval Requests, Chargebacks, Representments, Final Chargebacks) a set of tags which should be added into doc.add_info field. For example, to provide Itemized Document Code for AMEX Representment a tag "ADD_TAG_X=REQ_IDC;" in Parm List field can be added on the activity "Create Representment (Acq)".

    ATM management

  • [CARDS-47910]

    • ATM_Dispense_for_Recycler.rdf and ATM_Dispense_for_Recycler_by_Trans_Type.rdf reports. Menu in DBM: 1.OpenWay\Acquiring\ATM Controller\ATM Cycle Reports\Reports\Dispense for Recycler 2.OpenWay\Acquiring\ATM Controller\ATM Cycle Reports\Reports\\Dispense for Recycler by Transaction Type

  • [CARDS-51865]

    • The correct value is passed in the TRN_PHASE21_V3 procedure DocTransAttr parameter.

    Accounting

  • [CARDS-47408]

    • DCC Product: for clients with not only acquiring but issuing in WAY4 as well, the DCC_SKIP_TRANS_CURR tag must be set in the "Fee Algorithm Options" field for all transaction subtypes that affect Nostro contract Outgoing Suspense accounts but are not related to acquiring operations (e.g., Issuing Chargebacks, some IPS fees). Therefore, Supplementary GL entries for the Issuer`s operations will be created only in DCC MAIN Contract technical accounts in IPS settlement currency.

    Updated Manuals: [dcc\DCC_Setup.pdf.pdf] [tags description]

  • [CARDS-50813]

    • For Fee Prediction tariffs to use FX conversion by channel rates from Fee Base, Fee Min, Fee Max to the account currency, a special CR-FX Type (FX Type=CR_<Buy>;<Sell>;<Middle>) should be used, and the tag CONV_CHANNEL should be defined in Service Details. The special CR-FX Type should be Internal (the field "Is Internal=Yes" in OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Accounting Setup\FX Types), even if there are no banking FX Schemes for it.

  • [I1605184497]/[CARDS-49077]

    • A new report parameter, P_TO_HTML with the values Y/N has been added to XLS_GL_Trial_Balance.rdf. The default value is N. The "Y" value allows report data to be generated in HTML format. For this parameter to work, the File Extension field should also be set to 'html' in a customized menu item. The output driver should have the "SPREADSHEET" value as in the default menu item.

  • [I210188470]/[CARDS-41642]

    • Ledger Category has been added to the Account Roles standard handbook. This field is used in the Data Warehouse interface.

    Updated Manuals: [product_management\Client_Messages.pdf]

  • [I306131103]/[CARDS-35977]

    • Trace has been added to the account renumeration precedure OpenWay\Full\DB Administrator Utilities\Special Contract Utilities\Renumber Subsidiary GL Account

  • [CARDS-48601]

    • In report "GL_Account_Statement" the size of labels has been increased for displaying big amounts correctly.

  • [CARDS-49024]

    • Due Date will not longer be copied from previous cycle if it could not be calculated for the new cycle and no conditions for Due Date are met.

  • [CARDS-49732]

    • Full Payment Date calculation has been fixed for account schemes with DUE_DATE_MODE=A; or DUE_DATE_MODE=P; and zero balances on accounts involved in Due Date calculation.

  • [CARDS-49954]

    • Re-ageing is stopped as soon as the most delinquent bucket's balance exceeds the variance amount.

    Updated Manuals: [product_management\Client_Messages.pdf]

  • [CARDS-50296]

    • Fixed filling of account.on_date and on_date_balance fields for subcontracts during the MainSubRecovery process which runs on each contract billing if the global parameter MAIN_SUB_RECOVERY=Y (default behaviour).

  • [CARDS-52668]

    • Interest calculation has been enhanced for Interest Scheme -360 and interest calculation on the 31st day of the month.

  • [CARDS-52827]

    • The "Cardholder_Account_Statement" and "Cardholder_Contract_Statement" reports now support configuration with Date Schemes.

  • [I1601131604]/[CARDS-47289]

    • RBS FX Rates Copy To Internal bug has been fixed.

  • [I1604065714]/[CARDS-48967]

    • Maximum number ranges are extended in GL Transfers Export java pipe to support High Precision amounts.

  • [I1604208358]/[CARDS-49678]

    • Added macrotransaction cache reset on contract reprocessing error.

  • [I1604225383]/[CARDS-48607]

    • Order validation has been fixed (some validation for "Is Active" and "Date Event" fields has been restored).

  • [I1608234331]/[CARDS-50038]

    • Fixed automatical GL renumeration triggering in case the contract's product is changed to the new one with different Tariff Domain containing Tariff Role = GL Numeration tariffs with new values.

    Updated Manuals: [accounting\WAY4_Accounting.pdf] [tariff_management\Tariff_Management.pdf]

  • [I1703144988]/[CARDS-52447]

    • Modified generation of TRANS_TYPE codes if the global parameter FULL_TRANS_CODES=Y in the menu "OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Transaction Types\Generate Transaction Dictionary".

  • [CARDS-48234]

    • Added new currency "BELARUSSIAN RUBLE" with Alphabetic code BYN, Numeric code 933 and Minor unit 2. Currency "BELARUSSIAN RUBLE" with Alphabetic code BYR renamed to "BELARUSSIAN RUBLE (old)". Manual Action!

  • [CARDS-50174]

    • Direct FX conversion rates are used first when converting by Channel Rates.

    Updated Manuals: [accounting\Currency_Conversion.pdf]

    Acquiring

  • [CARDS-45312]

    • MCA Product: Multi-Currency Acquiring (MCA) conversion can be performed when posting acquiring documents. This feature allows to redefine the currency of an account for document posting, according to specific mapping between Transaction currency and settlement (accounting) currency and to apply a FX Rate Markup when converting funds using a special Service. In addition to Product configuration, to activate this functionality, documents loaded to WAY4 from an external system must contain the MCA_CONV=Q; (Request) tag in the "Add Info" field.

  • [CARDS-47078]

    • Button "Change RID" on "Add Service Type" form has been created. Billing RID can be changed on new value for certain selection.

  • [CARDS-47823]

    • Product selection has been added to the "DCC Contracts" form.

    Updated Manuals: [dcc\DCC_Setup.pdf.pdf]

  • [CARDS-48047]

    • MCA Product: It is now possible to define the currency of an expected payment from the IPS (Outgoing Suspense account currency) depending on the transaction currency. Selection of an Outgoing Suspense account currency can be set up using an FX tariff in a Nostro contract's Service. The ability to use one of a document's currencies (TRANS_CURR, SETTL_CURR, RECONS_CURR) as the FX_CURRENCY tag value has been added.

  • [CARDS-48048]

    • A link for tariff configuration has been added to DCC Interchange contracts.

  • [CARDS-48220]

    • MCA Product: the list of allowed/not allowed MCA currencies can be defined as a contract parameter for any contract used in processing MCA transactions (device contract, Nostro contract, DCC Contract).

  • [CARDS-48748]

    • Operations Pcash_pos, Pcash_pos_reversal, Pcash_atm, Pcash_atm_reversal. Pcard_control_request, Ppin_change, Ppin_change_rev are added into standard.

  • [CARDS-49628]

    • MIR_PARTNER_ID can be set up in merchant or device contracts. A new form has been created: OpenWay/Authentication Module/Authentication for merchant.

  • [CARDS-51670]

    • Document tags CYCLE_CB (Credit Banknote), CYCLE_DC (Debit Coin), CYCLE_CC (Credit Coin), CYCLE_DB2 (for ATMs with 2 dispensers) have been supported to define the cycle code to group entries for batch repayment.

    Updated Manuals: [acquiring\user_manuals\Acquiring_Module.pdf]

  • [I1604154458]/[CARDS-48780]

    • Contract Approve procedure will remove Merchant address "City" attribute leading spaces.

  • [CARDS-46393]

    • RPNA tag is generated according to MasterCard requirements

  • [CARDS-47177]

    • ACQ_USG tag is set when Accept Banknotes procedures occurs

  • [CARDS-47351]

    • DCC Product: an action for deleting a DCC Sub contract has been added to the form. The following checks are performed: - zero balances and no turnover on contract accounts. - if balances are zero, but there was turnover, an expiration date is set for the contract to close it in the standard way on CDU.

    Updated Manuals: [dcc\DCC_Setup.pdf.pdf]

  • [CARDS-47466]

    • Transaction documents with transaction types with Direction = None (e.g. Retrieval Requests) are not processed by the DCC_ACCOUNTING service and therefore do not generate supplementary GL-entries in DCC Accounting contracts.

    Updated Manuals: [dcc\DCC_Setup.pdf.pdf]

  • [CARDS-48971]

    • XLS_CB_f250_2.rdf report: Default values have been corrected for the following report parameters: P_CAN_DISPENSE_CASH, P_CAN_RETAIL, P_CAN_ACCEPT_CASH, P_CAN_WORK_WO_CARD, P_IS_POS. The P_HAS_CARDREADER parameter has been deleted. New parameters P_IS_KIOSK and P_CAN_WORK_WITH_CARD have been added. Columns 4-9 and 11 have been corrected.

    Updated Manuals: [rf_reporting\250\Form_250.pdf]

  • [CARDS-49617]

    • UPPERCASE rule removed for Device Parms DBM form Card Acceptor ID field.

  • [CARDS-50491]

    • Sorting by the ENTRY_DESCRIPTION and ENTRY_DETAILS fields for the "Entry" block in "Merchant Standing Order Entry Details", "Merchant Billing Level Standing Orders Details", "Merchant Standing Orders Details" reports has been added.

  • [CARDS-51378]

    • Documents, that are registered in the technical cycle "AllDocs", were excluded from the reports "Merchant Contract Statement", "Merchant Transactions Statement" and %TRANS_CST_CYCLE_N%, %TRANS_CST_CYCLE_CODE% variables used in notification.

  • [CARDS-51487]

    • For the "Merchant Contract Statement" report, parameter values (P_DATE_FROM; P_DATE_TO; P_ZIP_CODE; P_REPTYPE; P_SQL_TRACE; P_F_I; P_ID) can be set directly without local_constants. If these parameters are not set, values from local_constants will be used.

  • [C1511248467]/[CARDS-46840]

    • An issue with suspended acquiring BATCH_ID documents has been fixed. In some cases, they weren't sent to a merchant if an adjustment document had been processed.

  • [I1604123099]/[CARDS-48481]

    • Old behaviour has been restored: a batch order posting date is always set to the batch header posting date by default. To set the batch order posting date to the local banking date, use the POSTING_DATE=CURRENT; tag for BY_BATCH standing orders.

  • [I1604180329]/[CARDS-48569]

    • If BATCH closes several times a day, the closing date is recorded once for this day.

  • [I1607273568]/[CARDS-49782]

    • Problem with posting acquirer documents using functionality of MC installments has been fixed.

  • [I1609130700]/[CARDS-50687]

    • Fixed incorrect format modifier processing for %DOC_TAG:...*<format>% variables.

  • [CARDS-52386]

    • Additional tags BASE_RATE and FX_MARKUP_PCT are supported for DCC Info Inquiry documents.

    Updated Manuals: [dcc\DCC_Setup.pdf.pdf]

  • [I1603303826]/[CARDS-48286]

    • Merchant name can contain the "/" character.

    Acquiring authorisation

  • [CARDS-47214]

    • Transactions for device contracts in the "Not Ready" state are possible for "virtual" terminals if this state is not related to a change in the Service Package, Accounting Scheme, or contract currency.

  • [CARDS-47268]

    • ATM cassettes available balance computation mechanism has been changed. Number of diverted and rejected banknotes now affects available amount for cassette.

  • [CARDS-47318]

    • Received in inbound message TID is stored in doc.source_number attribute instead of device contract countract_number. New DEVICE_IDT_SCHEME=MBR_MRCH; have been added to be able to match contract on posting stage.

  • [CARDS-47419]

    • Tag DISp_ALG containing information about cash algorithm has been added.

  • [CARDS-48195]

    • New ability to restrict P2P OnUs transactions between cards of different FI hierarchies has been added. To activate this ability use P2P_CONF configuration tag FI_RESTRICT=Y;

  • [CARDS-48622]

    • Added Send-to-Friend transfers. P2P, P2P Reversal, Billing Payment and Billing Payment Reversal operations are supported. The card number may be unknown in Phase 1. Between Phase 1 and Phase 2 a card is searched for by a code. This interface can be used for payments when the payment transfer recipient's requisites are initially unknown.

  • [CARDS-49953]

    • A new API for searching contracts has been developed to standardize contract retrieval in the P2P package.

  • [CARDS-52559]

    • By default, the posting date after the cut-off time on a device is set to the next working day based on the default calendar. A new feature has been added to redefine the calendar type: the "ACQ_CLNDR_TYPE" parameter defines a special type of acquiring calendar. This feature is available only if the "ENABLES_SHIFT_DAY" parameter is set. If the parameter "ACQ_CLNDR_TYPE" is not set, the default calendar will be used.

  • [CARDS-53267]

    • The ability to decline transactions in the second phase when CVV was not checked has been added. The CVC2R tag with the values 'N', 'P', 'U' or 'S' transferred from the controller implements this functionality. The global parameter CHECK_CVV_ON_ISS switches on this functionality. If the parameter is empty, these transactions are successful. If it contains an error number, this error is transferred to the controller and the document is rejected.

  • [CARDS-47312]

    • Repeat Sales Completion operation inherits transaction attributes and conditions of the preauthorisation operation.

  • [CARDS-47341]

    • Merchant name has been extended up to 83 characters for DCI channel. The same global parameter MERCHANT_NAME_LENGTH_X as for AMEX interface is used to define Merchant name length.

  • [CARDS-47843]

    • Negative RC usages are fired on second phase of acquiring operation.

  • [CARDS-48360]

    • Error which occurs when operation is switching over controller and taking a long time and therefore rejecting incorrect document has been fixed.

  • [CARDS-48446]

    • Tag TOKEN was renamed to CASHCODE because of using tag TOKEN in HCE.

  • [CARDS-49635]

    • The global parameter "USE_PTID_IN_P2P" has been added to manage the PTID tag as a P2P money transfer indicator. If the parameter is set to "Y", the PTID tag is used to indicate a P2P money transfer transaction. The default value is "N".

  • [CARDS-49793]

    • The ACQ_ONLINE tag affects the entire document chain.

  • [CARDS-51883]

    • P2P merchant initiated transactions (MIT) are supported.

  • [CARDS-52735]

    • Error in filling final fee amount parameter has been fixed.

  • [CARDS-53412]

    • Cause of "No data found" exception has been fixed.

  • [I1510200399]/[CARDS-46264]

    • Fixed chained transactions device owner verification algorithm

  • [I1510303447]/[CARDS-46927]

    • Fixed incorrect rejection of timeout reversal matching with original document.

  • [I1512018244]/[CARDS-47390]

    • Fixed CDoc.source_member_id value definition

  • [I1601040104]/[CARDS-47504]

    • Error in checking late reversals due to the change of finding retail contract has been fixed.

  • [I1601144415]/[CARDS-47387]

    • An error message is now logged to the process log when an error occurs before Usage calculation and another error occurs during Usage calculation.

  • [I1605201828]/[CARDS-48882]

    • Transaction Processing: ORA-01403: no data found if routing is not found.

  • [I1606288749]/[CARDS-50596]

    • Now in a partial reversal, field 4 contains the total amount authorised.

  • [I1609088862]/[CARDS-50497]

    • MATCH_REVERSE_ONLINE parameter limits the period from sales completion to the reversal transaction excluding the preauthorisation transaction.

  • [I1610170004]/[CARDS-50818]

    • TagValue length up to 4000 chars supported in sy_convert.MERGE_TAGXX procedures.

  • [I1610184194]/[CARDS-50727]

    • Problem with losing some data in input field 26 when core P2P is on has been fixed.

  • [I1702139241]/[CARDS-52045]

    • The error "Incoming TransCondition does not correspond to TransAttributes" is interpreted as a warning in acquiring.

  • [I1703076703]/[CARDS-52318]

    • Address city field has been truncated to 32 symbols when filling device parameters.

  • [I1703241228]/[CARDS-53397]

    • Error in sorting P2P documents on Phase2 has been fixed.

  • [I1704134961]/[CARDS-52826]

    • Downgraded transaction MasterCard attributes in a financial confirmation are inherited from the preauthorization document.

  • [I1705221109]/[CARDS-53488]

    • Coms_Log parsing in DB. Fixed error in parsing pay_gate messages.

  • [CARDS-48160]

    • Added the "RESTRICT_PAYM" tag containing restricted BAI ('BP','CC','CO','CP','FD','GD','GP','MD','PD','PG','PS','TU','AA','BB','CI','BI','MI','PP','OG)' or the "ALL" value, if all BAI are prohibited. The PAYMENT='N' tag is kept for backward compatibility.

  • [CARDS-47896]

    • F43 field (Merchant Name (Trans_Details document field)) is now filled with SenderName attribute for Credit MoneyTransfer request to VISA according to VISA requirements

  • [CARDS-51852]

    • Merchant initiated transactions (MIT) have been aligned.

  • [CARDS-51892]

    • Voice Authorization Screen application is compatible with Oracle 12c.

  • [CARDS-52403]

    • The Voice Authorization screen has been refactored and migrated to the last java version.

  • [CARDS-52409]

    • Voice Authorization Screen is functional.

    Application management

  • [CARDS-47435]

    • Advanced Application R2 Monitoring forms show the contract number which was created or modified by the application.

  • [CARDS-47647]

    • A field for the payment receiver code value has been added to the "Appl Standing Order" form for advanced applications. The entered value will be checked among all existing payment receivers or created in previous sections of the same application.

    Updated Manuals: [application_management\r2\Advanced_Applications_R2_Module.pdf] [sepa_interface\SEPA_Interface_operation.pdf]

  • [CARDS-47775]

    • Application/RegNumber field in DB has been increased to 64 characters.

  • [CARDS-47803]

    • When activating an individual order for SEPA Direct Debit or SEPA Credit Transfer, it will automatically be linked to the Contract Counterparty created in previous sections of the same application.

    Updated Manuals: [sepa_interface\SEPA_Interface_setup.pdf]

  • [CARDS-48610]

    • All "PaymRec" buttons in OpenWay\Advanced Applications R2\Cardholder Input & Update by Applications forms have been renamed to "Counterparty" for synchronisation with the UFX object type. The "Payment Receiver" object type is obsolete but is still supported for backward compatibility.

    Updated Manuals: [application_management\r2\Advanced_Applications_R2_Module.pdf] [application_management\r2\Advanced_Applications_Workflow.pdf]

  • [CARDS-48674]

    • APPL_CHECK_EVNT global parameter is supported in Advanced Application R2 to prevent application decline in case when contract event can not be posted immediately.

    Updated Manuals: [application_management\r2\Advanced_Applications_R2_Module.pdf]

  • [CARDS-48936]

    • Instalment Limits are supported in Advanced Applications R2.

    Updated Manuals: [application_management\r2\Advanced_Applications_R2_Module.pdf]

  • [CARDS-49053]

    • Advanced Application R2 type validation now allows to have the Classifier section defined without any limitations/mandatory parameters (classifier code is no longer mandatory).

    Updated Manuals: [application_management\r2\Advanced_Applications_R2_Module.pdf]

  • [CARDS-49552]

    • In Advanced Applications R2, application accept is downgraded to approve in secondary nodes.

    Updated Manuals: [application_management\r2\Advanced_Applications_R2_Module.pdf]

  • [CARDS-51359]

    • Advanced Applications R2 supports setting contract Instalment Limits with an activity period.

    Updated Manuals: [application_management\r2\Advanced_Applications_R2_Module.pdf]

  • [CARDS-51887]

    • COMBO_Cards can be created by applications.

  • [UFX-211]

    • Now the UFX element StandOrder/ReasonDetails may only be present on export. If it's present in a UFX Application on import, the application will be declined.

  • [UFX-213]

    • XML Applications Export pipes (R1 & R2) now make sure that order of sub-applications under each top-level application in the export file is the same as in the import file.

  • [UFX-236]

    • Changed the default behaviour of the XML Advanced Applications Import (R2) pipe when the INPUT_FORMAT parameter is not specified. Now the pipe assumes UFX (FileHeader/FormatVersion='2.0') input format and immediately rejects all files that are not valid against UFX schema. For backward compatibility the pipe also supports legacy Application format (FileHeader/FormatVersion='1.0'), it can be enabled by setting the parameter INPUT_FORMAT=Application.

    Updated Manuals: Application Managment | XML Applications R2

  • [I1604080041]/[CARDS-49167]

    • Advanced Applications R2 now supports loading of the "Used As MK" field, which indicates whether the key is the master key.

  • [I1604213654]/[CARDS-48638]

    • Added houskeeping rule 'Purge Expired' for adv_appl table

  • [CARDS-46321]

    • An issue with Tariff Name auto-creation has been fixed for tariff personalisation applications working in old mode (see OLD_PERS_TARIFF_LOAD_MODE global parameter).

  • [CARDS-48108]

    • The <CheckAvailable> tag from an XML application for contracts is supported now in Advanced Applications R2.

  • [CARDS-48516]

    • An additional credit limit set through Advance Applications R2 does not check a Product's "Min Cr Limit" / "Max Cr Limit" values.

  • [CARDS-48705]

    • Fixed problem of Instant Issue cards attaching to a personal issuing contract when card subcontract and main account contract currencies differ.

  • [CARDS-49221]

    • Deferred response file for unsuccessful application in Advanced Applications R2 always contains the original error message.

  • [CARDS-49348]

    • A deferred response file for an unsuccessful application in Advanced Applications R2 always contains the original error message even when it's from custom processing.

  • [CARDS-49370]

    • When an Advanced Application R2 application to set a credit limit contains a comment that is more than 255 characters, the corresponding message will be returned instead of 'Internal error'.

    Updated Manuals: [application_management\r2\CBS_XML_Applications_R2.pdf]

  • [CARDS-49374]

    • PAN in response file for advanced application is masked.

  • [CARDS-49575]

    • Advanced Application R2: error message from custom procesdure cust_adv_exception_handler is returned as application response.

  • [CARDS-49670]

    • Adv Applications R2 declined due to not unique registration number are ignored during application search by registration number and its uniqueness check.

  • [CARDS-50077]

    • A new Product tag, STOCK; has been introduced. This tag should be set in the Custom Data field of Products used to register large numbers of stock "Instant Issuing" cards within the same hierarchy. This tag disables refresh of data in a contract hierarchy during contract approval, so the tag may not be set in issuing or acquiring products used for ordinary customer contracts. Use of this tag makes it possible to avoid performance problems seen in Applications inward interfaces (batch or SOA) when an Instant Issuing card is sold to a customer as the contract approval process is always called during application processing.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf] [tags description] [product_management\Preferred_Counterparties.pdf] [product_management\Products_and_Subtypes.pdf] [product_management\Standing_Orders.pdf]

  • [CARDS-50326]

    • Fixed the context of the "CAppInfo" input parameter for CUST_ADV_CHECK_APPL_INFO.

  • [CARDS-50544]

    • Advanced Application R2: the problem when XML applications with missing mandatory elements in sub-applications were successfully accepted has been fixed. The problem could be observed when using OpenWay\Advanced Applications R2\Application Processing\Issuing XML Application Import or OpenWay\Advanced Applications R2\Application Processing\Acquiring XML Application Import pipes or in WAY4Gate.

  • [CARDS-51093]

    • The problem with empty AMND_PREV fields in new device records created by Advanced Applications has been resolved.

  • [CARDS-51257]

    • Advanced applications for contract update now call the contract approve process if the contract was changed even if the last sub-application in the tree is for contract status update and no changes were made to contract status.

  • [CARDS-52774]

    • Client AddOrUpdate Application R2 checks the existence of a client in accordance with the additional global parameters UNIQUENESS_CLIENT_NUMBER and UNIQUENESS_CLIENT_REG_NUMBER.

  • [UFX-174]

    • BRANCH_ID_TYPE parameter of XML Applications Import R1 & R2 pipes can now be specified either as short code (B/N/C) or long code (Branch/Bank/CB). An invalid parameter value is now detected at pipe startup rather than when importing the first application.

  • [UFX-208]

    • Now when exporting an application in UFX format, we produce the Contract/DeviceInfo element for acquiring applications only and the ProductionParms and PlasticInfo elements for issuing applications only.

  • [UFX-215]

    • Change to appl_standing_order table structure introduced in 03.42.30 is supported in application export. There is no change in export data format or contents.

  • [UFX-240]

    • XML Applications Response pipe now property exports details of error that occurred during application import. Wrong application status could previously be reported for application R1 when SHORT_DEFERRED_RESPONSE parameter was disabled.

  • [I1510157789]/[CARDS-46499]

    • Advanced Application R1 to create an individual standing order with a specific order code has been fixed: a new order is created if there is no order with this code. The global parameter APPL_ORDER_INDIVIDUAL should be set to 'R'.

  • [I1510262148]/[CARDS-46558]

    • RBS Application Import: fixed incorrect file_info in some cases.

  • [I1603222795]/[CARDS-48260]

    • Fixed an error in permissions for checking status to OK. This permission is validated only for ATMs now.

  • [I1604078421]/[CARDS-48602]

    • The problem with calling SETUP_DEVICE for non valid device contract in Advanced Applications has been checked.

  • [I1604278984]/[CARDS-49039]

    • Performance of address application R2 caused by not optimazed query to paym_rec table has been improved.

  • [I1608300685]/[CARDS-50093]

    • Advanced Application R1 supports special *#N symbols in the <PlasticInfoTitle> tag to clear this field in a client or contract record.

  • [I1610184150]/[CARDS-50827]

    • Advanced Applications R2 for ClientAddress or ClientAuthMethod now support client identification through <ObjectFor><ContractIDT> format as in R1 applications. But this format for client identification is not correct and a warning message will be saved in process_mess.

  • [I1610275964]/[CARDS-51126]

    • Advanced Application R1 can be succesfully accepted even if it's blocked by the same officer who starts the accept process.

  • [I1611018583]/[CARDS-51190]

    • Exception handling has been added into usage limiter redefinition procedure

  • [I1703249728]/[CARDS-52849]

    • The problem with missing base relation for a new non-product based related contract during accept of an advanced application R2 has been resolved.

  • [UFX-212]

    • Application_management\file_samples\readme.txt has been split into issuing and acquiring parts.

    Authentication management

  • [CARDS-51427]

    • Allow the "SINGLE" option for identification schemes.

  • [CARDS-50668]

    • Fixed: System cannot find 'TERMINAL' authentication scheme.

  • [CARDS-51299]

    • TAGS_GET_NODE procedure not updating CLIENT/CONSUMER references during UID resolving process.

  • [CARDS-51780]

    • Fixed incorrect processing of long values for parameters of the procedure used by Authentication Server when the High Availability solution is not used.

  • [CARDS-52093]

    • Fixed "Failed to calculate DP routing, use default routing" warning for Authentication Server Context operations.

  • [CARDS-52915]

    • Added the "OFFICER" scope to validation conditions of an authentication scheme linked to a consumer record.

  • [I1510158133]/[CARDS-46367]

    • Fixed unnecessary duplication of authentication scheme with DEMAND option when you try to close it

    Automated routines

  • [CARDS-45749]

    • Bin Table Loading: Added links to all IPS in the menu OpenWay\Full\Daily Procedures\Load BIN Tables and Handbooks.

  • [CARDS-48205]

    • Standard CDU menu items are started using filtering by liab_category instead of liab_contract.

    Updated Manuals: [automated_routines\Daily_Procedures.pdf]

  • [CARDS-49298]

    • Processing of annual miscellaneous Service fees for contracts created at the end of the month (after the 28th day of the month) has been fixed. See Client Upgrade Notes for details.

  • [I1509078666]/[CARDS-46229]

    • The global parameter CLIENT_MOVE_FI_AFFILIATED now has a default value of "N". Clients will not be linked by default when related contracts are moved to another institution.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf] [issuing\user_manuals\Issuing_Module.pdf]

  • [I1603146183]/[CARDS-48291]

    • Full & Affiliated liability subcontracts are now closed (is_ready=C) when the liability main contract is closed.

  • [I1608183148]/[CARDS-49933]

    • Fixed Start of the day procedure problem during date shifting where multiple Time zones are configured in the system

  • [I1610075561]/[CARDS-50595]

    • Fixed grants for 'OWS.Apply Buffered Balance' menu item

  • [I1702225223]/[CARDS-52304]

    • The Approve procedure can be be called for sub-products. If the main product is not ready, Approve will be executed for the entire hierarchy; if the main product is ready, only the sub-product will be approved. A new form has been added, OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Products\Product Definition\Products (No Hierarchy), for viewing all products without hierarchy.

    Updated Manuals: [product_management\Products_and_Subtypes.pdf]

    Bill payments

  • [CARDS-51850]

    • It is now possible to clear the ServiceComment and License fields of a PaymentType using mBilling request.

  • [CARDS-52015]

    • Biller Management: ATM Retail contracts are now created with consideration of the requested channel.

  • [CARDS-52492]

    • Payment type properties created via mBilling request are now visible.

    CB Gate

  • [CARDS-49771]

    • The LOG_FILE_NAME parameter has been added for the cb_gate_balance_load pipe. Possible values are Y/N. If LOG_FILE_NAME=Y, the "FILE=<FileName>;" tag will will be added to TD_Doc.posting_details.

  • [CARDS-50891]

    • The STIP balance loading procedure has been improved by checking the fact of sending (and delivering) an operation to the CBS and matching it with information from the loading file. Added the ability to use last operation time instead of last operation reference number in STIP balance data files.

  • [CARDS-46419]

    • Fixed incorrect Core Banking system response for advice or adjustment message when available amount less than required hold

  • [CARDS-46428]

    • Fixed problems with reading CB Gate setup when integrating to CBS via Transaction Server using iRouter channel instead of NetServer CBGate channel.

  • [CARDS-48856]

    • Pipe cb_gate_balance_load: Fixed incorrect processing of parameter commit_interval

  • [CARDS-51859]

    • Fixed reversal message routing to core banking system for utility payments.

  • [CARDS-52762]

    • Fixed BerTLV buffers parsing.

  • [I1512016218]/[CARDS-48232]

    • Fixed storing of link between transaction and updated balance records.

  • [I1705099074]/[CARDS-53246]

    • Fixed incorrect processing of CBGate balance loading when the last transaction linked to the balance was delivered to CBS by SAF.

  • [I1706274643]/[CARDS-53891]

    • Balance update algorithm has been fixed to not update balance if account is Closed.

  • [CARDS-53597]

    • Added a default value (1000) for the commit_interval parameter of the cb_gate_balance_load pipe.

    Updated Manuals: [core_banking_interface\cb_gate\CB_Gate_Setup.pdf]

    Case management

  • [CARDS-47667]

    • Supported new ProgramCode "REFRESH_CASE;" tag to refresh a case after a Case Management activity.

    Updated Manuals: [case_management\Case_Management_Configuration.pdf]

  • [CARDS-48522]

    • The ROOT\OpenWay\Case Management menu has been reorganised: only configuration setup remains in this menu. All "Operations" menu items are configured in special menus: CM Consumer Collections, CM Risk Management, CM Card Blocking, Dispute Assistant CM - these menu items can work only with cases of the corresponding category.

    Updated Manuals: [case_management\Case_Management_Configuration.pdf]

  • [CARDS-48743]

    • When a Case Management activity should create a new subcase but this case already exists, it will be linked to the current case and the corresponding message will appear when "Complete" is performed manually.

  • [CARDS-48948]

    • if the global parameter CM_HSK_KEEP is set to "Y", documents linked to any type of case will never be removed by Housekeeping even when the case is closed.

    Updated Manuals: [case_management\Case_Management_Configuration.pdf]

  • [CARDS-49169]

    • The "Code" field has been added to Case Management domains. This field is mandatory for a domain and will be required during the domain approve process.

    Updated Manuals: [case_management\Case_Management_Configuration.pdf]

  • [I1602048837]/[CARDS-48934]

    • In Case Management screens, the error message shown when an activity cannot be performed now includes the reason.

  • [I1603178723]/[CARDS-48100]

    • The menu item "ROOT.OpenWay.Case Management.Automated Routines.Scan Cases in parallel mode" can use a new parameter, "Condition", which can be customised to select particular cases. The standard menu item selects all open cases.

  • [CARDS-48758]

    • Problem with Oracle error in "New Sub Case by all selected documents" is resolved

  • [CARDS-49151]

    • Repeated editing of documents created during a dispute cycle is now possible in Case Management dispute screens.

  • [CARDS-49185]

    • It's impossible to approve/accept a document through manual, not Case Management, interfaces if this document is included in an open "Document Workflow" case. Other cases don't restrict access to their documents.

  • [CARDS-49212]

    • Problem with case status when a group activity wasn't successful for some cases has been resolved.

  • [CARDS-52729]

    • Issue when a document was not added to an existing Financial case for the same contract has been fixed.

  • [CARDS-53794]

    • It is no longer necessary to register the "Case Management" menu for the clerk user group to allow clerk users to perform an activity in "Dispute Assistant CM" and other Case Management operation screens.

  • [C1507176475]/[CARDS-47305]

    • Case amount calculation doesn't take into account non financial items under the case documents, such as Loyalty Points.

  • [I1506253682]/[CARDS-46832]

    • Automatic case creation by a Cards Event in Case Management can use the Event contract when it's impossible to find the contract by the document.

  • [I1510047135]/[CARDS-46222]

    • Strategy approve process in Case Management configuration checks now that activities called from strategy and step rules are not defined both on the strategy and step level.

  • [I1603040013]/[CARDS-47944]

    • If manual case creation is replaced by adding a document to an existing case, and the case is not closed by the activity, all documents in the case are marked as kept from Housekeeping.

  • [I1604116565]/[CARDS-48520]

    • SQL view use in the "Contract" tab of Case Management screens has been optimized.

  • [I1605272744]/[CARDS-49346]

    • Problem with CommStr has been resolved, activity comments are limited to 4000 characters.

  • [I1610119034]/[CARDS-50735]

    • Trace stack overflow in CM document processing has been fixed for DEBUG_LEVEL=TRACE.

  • [I1610314143]/[CARDS-52065]

    • The Case Management screen with case details has been optimized to decrease "Contract" tab opening time.

    Changes export

  • [UFX-251]

    • Changes Export pipe has been fixed: empty file is now created in proper subdirectory when CREATE_EMPTY_FILES=Y and LAYOUT_BY_FI=N.

    Configuration inspector

  • [DBK-1787]

    • The ability to import a configuration to a different version has been enhanced. If not all fields from the source scheme are present in the target scheme, records can now be added in the Copy Configuration Import Screen "Exc: Fld Types" screen form. The "Table Code" and "Field Code" fields must be filled in manually (for each removed field) and "Removed" must be selected in the drop-down list of the "Field Type" field.

    Updated Manuals: [configuration_inspector\Configuration_Inspector_Import.pdf]

  • [DBK-2424]

    • Fixed importing records with default column values. Buffered messages mode is used for the import process to preserve the import log in the case of a fatal exception.

  • [DBK-2429]

    • Fixed long value trimming on configuration export.

  • [DBK-2461]

    • Added the ability to transfer Sy. Configuration mapping for Datamart dimension tables.

  • [DBK-2650]

    • Import of merged data has been optimized. A record is updated in a single expression, not by one field at a time. For unchanged parent records, "Is Ready" status update is done once when loading subordinate records.

  • [DBK-2785]

    • Corrected merging of MP_ETL_PARM table records using Configuration Inspector.

  • [I1702039456]/[DBK-2558]

    • Fixed error when collecting related data on FX Scheme export.

    Core

  • [CARDS-48956]

    • If any tariff domains in the hierarchy specified for a Product in the Tariff Domain field contain the ATTACH_BY_CODE=<value> tag in Apply Rules, the presence of a default Tariff Domain code defined as the <VALUE>=<default tariff domain code> tag in the Product's Custom Data field is validated when approving the Product.

    Updated Manuals: [tariff_management\Tariff_Management.pdf]

  • [CARDS-49283]

    • The tariff domain contract parameter is checked after the Product has been changed.

  • [CARDS-52173]

    • Several IF_CS and IF_PARM checks has been implemented.

    Updated Manuals: Core | Collect Doc Statistics [product_management\Events.pdf] [product_management\Preferred_Counterparties.pdf] [product_management\Service_Packages.pdf] [product_management\Standing_Orders.pdf] [tariff_management\Tariff_Management.pdf]

  • [CARDS-46236]

    • Support of classifier domains has been added. The CS_DOMAIN tag in a Service Package or financial institution can define a classifier domain template.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Contract_and_Client_Classifiers.pdf]

  • [CARDS-47399]

    • Interest tariff reading during CDU has been optimised.

  • [CARDS-47533]

    • MIN_SETTL_AMOUNT and MAX_SETTL_AMOUNT tags have been added to the Special Parameters field of an Event type to check a document's settlement amount when checking event type availability and to determine notification limits, for example. Tag values may be a contract parameter or a fixed value in the contract currency.

    Updated Manuals: [tags description] [product_management\Events.pdf]

  • [CARDS-47718]

    • XLS_CB_f250_1_Prepared.rdf: OpenWay\RF Reporting\Report Parameters Configuration (Form 250 Part 1) menu item has been created. It is used for Rep_type and Rep_parm tables loadig/updating.

    Updated Manuals: [rf_reporting\250\Form_250.pdf] [mir_statistical_reports\MIR_Statistical_Reports.pdf]

  • [CARDS-47760]

    • The "Domain Code" field has been added to Classifier & Decision configuration forms.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Contract_and_Client_Classifiers.pdf]

  • [CARDS-47813]

    • Additional setup possibilities have been added to custom Services processing: the "Priority" field has been added to the "Custom Fee" screen form and now fees are processed in decreasing order of priority. The value calculated by custom fee can now be saved in the doc.add_info field as a tag. To do so, the SAVE_FEE tag should be added to the custom fee's "Service Details" field (it can also be used for <CALC> fees). These new features can be used for example to support acquiring fee sharing setup. Acquiring fee sharing setup should be consistent with general Acquiring Product and accounting setup. Special instructions are provided by OpenWay consultants under separate agreements. Please contact OpenWay for more details.

    Updated Manuals: [tags description] [product_management\Service_Packages.pdf]

  • [CARDS-47911]

    • Balance history forms have been reorganised.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Balance_types.pdf]

  • [CARDS-47963]

    • MCA Product: when the MCA_CONV=Y; tag is present in a document's "Add Info" field, we calculate the MCA Conversion Difference (Revenue or Expense). This is the difference between the payment amount expected from the payment system calculated directly from the transaction amount and based on the transaction amount in the Merchant Receivable currency.

  • [CARDS-48005]

    • Dispute reason code processing has been enhanced. Tags are supported and can be set in the "Add Info" field (DSP_REASON.ADD_INFO): TRANS_TYPE_EXT=<Transaction Type Extension code>; allowing special services to be used for the specific reason code, and TRANS_TYPE_EXT_EVENT=<event code>; to generate an Event for the source/target contract.

    Updated Manuals: [tags description]

  • [CARDS-48062]

    • "Tariff Domain" contract parameter role has been supported.

    Updated Manuals: [tariff_management\Tariff_Management.pdf]

  • [CARDS-48155]

    • Contract balance forms have been redesigned.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Balance_types.pdf]

  • [CARDS-48391]

    • Balance Types configuration has been changed significantly. Some impact changes have been introduced in order to make the configuration more straightforward and avoid dubious setup. Balance Types configuration automatic update and validation will be performed during upgrade and results will be logged in the Process Log. For more information, see "Client Upgrade Notes".

    Updated Manuals: [core\Balance_types.pdf]

  • [CARDS-48456]

    • Added IPS Product "Priority Pass" with PRTPASS code and "Internal" Payment Scheme (channel).

  • [CARDS-48629]

    • A new interest calculation algorithm for Interest Scheme "360" has been implemented: IntScheme value for specifying the number of days in a year is determined with the formula InstScheme=12 * CycleWeight, where CycleWeight is the number of days in a billing cycle. To use this interest algorithm, set USE_MONTH_WEIGHT=B; for an account template, Accounting Scheme, financial institution, or global parameter.

    Updated Manuals: [accounting\Interests_Accrual.pdf] [core\Global_Parameters.pdf] [product_management\Client_Messages.pdf]

  • [CARDS-48800]

    • "Tariff Domain" contract parameter role has been supported.

  • [CARDS-48863]

    • The SET_THROUGH tag is no longer supported. Please see "Client Upgrade Notes" for detailed information.

  • [CARDS-48927]

    • The "Del" button is no longer available in the "DCC Contracts" form. DCC contracts are now deleted through the menu OpenWay\Full\DB Administrator Utilities\Special Contract Utilities\Bank Accounting Contracts Remove.

  • [CARDS-49018]

    • When approving a contract, the contract parameter whose value specifies the tariff domain code used for attaching a tariff domain is validated. If a parameter is not found for a contract, the default value will be taken from the corresponding tag in the contract's "Product Custom Data" field. When the additional contract tag ATTACH_DEF_FROM_SUBS is set, the contract parameter will be searched for and inherited from a subcontract's default value.

    Updated Manuals: [tags description] [tariff_management\Tariff_Management.pdf]

  • [CARDS-49178]

    • CMS Stat - information about reports and pipe names is gathered from process_log into PROCESS_GROUP.

  • [CARDS-49220]

    • New fields, start_local_date and end_local_date, related to mtr.local date have been added to the cs/decision log.

  • [CARDS-49225]

    • Country table. Currency Codes for Bulgaria and Russia.

  • [CARDS-49227]

    • Most frequently used reports have been updated. Now each time a report is run, the report name will be logged in process log parameters in the REPORT tag and the menu item name will be logged in the TITLE tag.

  • [CARDS-49289]

    • Automatic creation of classifier values has been implemented for new Tariff Plan approval in a Tariff Book (for contract parameters with location in Classifier or with Mirror To the classifier configuration).

  • [CARDS-49714]

    • "BT_SIMPLE" mode processing has changed: Current Due Min Amount Threshold, configured as specified in the Statement Tariff or Account Scheme Min Repayment value, and Full Statement Balance Threshold, configured as a new Threshold tariff with the predefined code "MTP_FULL_BALANCE", have been introduced.

  • [CARDS-49788]

    • Now "COUNTER_ONLY balances" are not shown in the "Balances for..." form. A new form, "Counters", has been added to show "COUNTER_ONLY balances". The "Entry N" field has been replaced by "Trx count" in the "Totals for..." form.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Balance_types.pdf]

  • [CARDS-50309]

    • New or changed custom procedures described: CUST_BILL_IS_USE_TRF, CUST_BILL_IS_USE_TRF_MFI, CUST_CARD_KEYS, CUST_CLL_INSTL_DOC, CUST_DISPATCH_TASK, CUST_GET_CLIENT, CUST_GET_CONTRACT, CUST_HA_CHECK_CHANGE, CUST_ROUTING_MODE, CUST_STATE_STR_TO_LOG

  • [CARDS-50685]

    • For name generation by the menu item "OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Transaction Types\Generate Transaction Dictionary" added the CUST_TRANS_DICT() procedure to customise generation of names in MESS_DICT.

  • [CARDS-50723]

    • Additional input parameters have been added to the CUST_TRANS_CODE custom procedure. These parameters allow more precise customization of transaction codes. A transaction code generated by the custom function is not altered anymore with additions in standard code. The resulting transaction code is used in the macrotransaction and GL Trace. Entry record trans codes can be synchronised with GL Trace records if the SYNC_ENTRY_GL_TRANS_CODE global parameter is set to "Y". For using standard transaction codes, the function should return null value. Different transaction codes can be generated for base amount, base fee, additional fee and markup using logic for the EntryRole input parameter. A transaction code with the BaseAmount role is saved in a macrotransaction, other roles are used in GL Trace and Entry only. The previous version cust_trans code was only called for the BaseAmount role. If only customization of macrotransaction trans_code is needed (which is inherited by certain rules into gl_trace and entry) then a condition on this EntryRole should be added.

  • [CARDS-50784]

    • Warning message that "Payment receiver is not found for client and payment type" during order document processing is created only for SEPA documents.

  • [CARDS-51386]

    • A new value, FEE_CURR, can now be used for the REDEF_FEE_ACC_CURR tag.

    Updated Manuals: [tags description] [product_management\Service_Packages.pdf]

  • [CARDS-51895]

    • The ability to post Event chains in a user-defined order has been added. A new field, "Step N" should be filled in for the Events in the chain to specify their posting order. A new event posting mode, DEPENDENT_CHAIN has been introduced to provide proper condition checking for cases when an Event depends on the results of previous Events in the chain.

    Updated Manuals: [product_management\Events.pdf]

  • [CARDS-52250]

    • The KEEP_CONTRACT_ID tag is set in a Misc Service (Service Details) or transaction subtype (Fee Algorithm). When a Misc document is created, the contract identifier is specified in add_info.

    Updated Manuals: [tags description]

  • [CARDS-52327]

    • Additional information about contract activity can now be shown in Financials -> Balance List ->[History] and [Totals] screen forms under OpenWay\Customer Service\Customer Service (and the same form is available in OpenWay\Issuing\Customer Support\OLD Contract Info): Counter of pending and declined authorizations for turnover balance types and maximum balance over contract life-to-date and year-to-date turnover balance types (requires special configuration in Balance Types screen form). Also for turnover balances with History Mode = Billing (After Close), history records after each billing will be saved in acnt_balance_history and will be available for viewing via the screen forms mentioned above.

  • [CARDS-52349]

    • The "Active Tariffs" form in OpenWay\Tariffs\Tariff for Contracts (Edit Personal) - Active Trf has been enhanced. Tariffs specified in the account scheme, account templates, services, standing orders and date schemes are shown with the "Yes" value in the "Used In Cfg" field of the form.

    Updated Manuals: [tariff_management\Tariff_Management.pdf]

  • [CARDS-52531]

    • New actions to recalculate contract functional dates have been added to the CSS screen OpenWay\Customer Service\Customer Service -> [Contr.Dates] form.

    Updated Manuals: [] [product_management\Functional_Dates.pdf]

  • [I205285470]/[CARDS-31666]

    • The ability to launch collection of CMS Statistics (OpenWay\Full\CMS Stat\Create Statistics) in parallel mode has been added. To launch the "DB statistics" process in parallel, the "PARALLEL" parameter and global additional parameter "PROCESS_WAIT_INTERVAL" should be configured with the required level of parallelism.

  • [CARDS-42826]

    • SAVE_TGT_FEE/SAVE_SRC_FEE tag behaviour for adjustments has been fixed. Concerns XF_FEE_PREDICTION fees.

  • [CARDS-44478]

    • An Event-based contract parameter (EXT_DATA tag) value is now restored when the triggered Event is closed.

  • [CARDS-45379]

    • A classifier's bank_date is now inherited from the posting date of the macrotransaction if it is created in the EOD posting process, or from the Event start date if it is generated when posting an Event. A Decision's bank_date is now inherited from the trigger classifier bank_date. Decision bank_date and bank_date_to are now recorded in the decision log.

  • [CARDS-47396]

    • Device usage limiter processing for non-authorised transactions has been fixed (the limiter type is now the same as for authorised transactions).

  • [CARDS-47614]

    • Now usages are not corrected when documents are processed for adjustments based on auth adjustments.

  • [CARDS-47912]

    • A number of issues have been fixed in the "Contract Parameters" form (OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Common Handbooks\Contract Parameters). Existing data in the form should be reviewed and validated (see the "Check All" action in the form).

    Updated Manuals: [core\Contract_and_Client_Classifiers.pdf]

  • [CARDS-48298]

    • Fixed problem where current Items were not closed when a contract account was renumbered.

  • [CARDS-48383]

    • Conversion by Channel rates is applied to Fee Max values in the same way as for Fee Base and Fee Min.

  • [CARDS-48506]

    • Message Converter: Fixed incorrect processing of variables with formatting style modifiers

  • [CARDS-48597]

    • "Country.srd" form: Added "N Curr Code" field for displaying numeric currency code.

  • [CARDS-48640]

    • Fee Prediction calculation for DCC/MCA transactions has been fixed. To use the correct base amount for fee prediction calculation, the new value, CR_TRANS, should be used for the FEE_BASE tag.

  • [CARDS-48707]

    • Due Amount is not rounded for High Precision accounts by an Account Due order if the XF_ROUND tag is absent and the PRECISION tag is present.

  • [CARDS-48880]

    • Default parameter values have been changed in the XLS_NSPK_Statistics_Acquiring_Devices.rdf report, a new column, "Cb Territory" has been added to the report. Footers have been added to XLS_NSPK_Statistics_Issuing_Business_Prepared.rdf, XLS_NSPK_Statistics_Acquiring_Business.rdf, XLS_NSPK_Statistics_Acquiring_Devices.rdf reports

    • The "Check" action for the "Folder" tariff domain generates an error when there are tariffs in this domain.

    Updated Manuals: [mir_statistical_reports\MIR_Statistical_Reports.pdf]

  • [CARDS-49148]

    • When an Additional Credit Limit is set, the value of the AUTH_LIM_DF tag in acnt_log.msg_details now changes.

  • [CARDS-49235]

    • Doc.Trans_Country, Doc.Merchant_Id, Doc.Sic_Code, Doc.Add_Info.'POSTAL_CODE', Doc.Add_Info.'TRANS_LOCATION' are defined in the document before to start services search.

  • [CARDS-49252]

    • The functionality of Balance Types with the "COUNTER_ONLY" tag in the "Posting Details" field has been fixed for multi-currency cumulation mode (when accounts in different currencies are registered for the contract). The logic for recording COUNTER_ONLY balances has also been changed, now they are "positive" for Advices and "negative" for Reversals. A new technical currency - "NUM" has been added for recording "COUNTER_ONLY" Balance Types. Please see "Client Upgrade Notes" for detailed information.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Balance_types.pdf] [tags description]

  • [CARDS-49392]

    • "SAVE_GL_N" option has been excluded from support. System default behaviour is the following: "GL Number" and "HeadOffice GL Number" are not copied from the parent Accounting Scheme if they are already filled in the child Accounting Scheme. Please see "Client Upgrade Notes" for detailed information.

    Updated Manuals: [tags description] [product_management\Client_Messages.pdf]

  • [CARDS-49463]

    • Added validation of "History Mode" value equivalence for parent and subordinate Balance Types.

  • [CARDS-49569]

    • When an Additional Credit Limit is set, the value of the AUTH_LIM_DT, TMP_LIM_DF,TMP_LIM_DT tags in acnt_log.msg_details now also changes.

  • [CARDS-49633]

    • Fixed an error when an active item was not closed during account renumeration if the account had a zero balance.

  • [CARDS-49701]

    • Fixed incorrect ageing of delinquency amount if the MIN_DUE or MIN_DUE_AMOUNT tag is set in the "Template Details" field of an account template with Due Types: "Payment Due", "Fixed Day Due", "Sliding" and without FROM_NEXT_BILLING; instruction.

  • [CARDS-49708]

    • Inheritance of tariff domain contract parameters has been fixed for parameters without locations.

  • [CARDS-49710]

    • Event chain posting has been enhanced: events in a chain are posted in fixed order by usage_action.id. This sorting applies to immediate posting as well as delayed posting (when Post Immediate = Post Later). The OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Products\Event Types -> [Event Chain] form has been updated - the "Step N" field has been temporarily removed.

    Updated Manuals: [product_management\Events.pdf]

  • [CARDS-49728]

    • Fixed incorrect ageing of delinquent amounts when the MIN_DUE or MIN_DUE_AMOUNT tag is set for Due Type = "Fix Due Date" in an account template's "Template Details" field.

    • Evening End of Day is ready for Distributed Processing.

  • [CARDS-50364]

    • The menu item "Synchronize DWD_CARD_BRAND with IPS_PRODUCT" has been deleted from the file "opt\stat_reporting\client\dbm\menu\Card_Products_mapping_for_stat_reporting.UPG". Fixed error in rep.SYNC_DWHCRDBRND_AND_IPSPROD() with deletion of sy_conf_group_val records not present in the ips_product table.

  • [CARDS-50387]

    • Error message override during contract subtype validation was fixed (menu-item "OWS.IPS Products check")

  • [CARDS-50424]

    • Calculation of FEE_BASE=CR_TRANS; has been fixed for different fee directions (debit/credit).

  • [CARDS-50489]

    • Fixed invalid error message generation during Balance Type validation in case when the parent balance type with the tag COUNTER_ONLY has subordinated balance types with 'TURNOVER%' usage. Added error message generation during Balance Type validation in case when parent balance type with the tag COUNTER_ONLY has subordinated balance types with 'BALANCE' usage.

  • [CARDS-50494]

    • "Latest items only" value in the "History Mode" field was removed. A new tag, "SAVE_LATEST" for the Balance Type is supported instead. It can be set automatically on Balance Type validation and it means that history will be saved for the last four items only.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Balance_types.pdf] [tags description]

  • [CARDS-50498]

    • Fixed calculation of the "MIR_REG_NUMBER" field for the "Statistics Acquiring Business", "Statistics Acquiring Devices", and "Statistics Issuing Business Prepared" NSPK reports.

  • [CARDS-50507]

    • The ability to set a classifier when there is more than one classifier with the same code but in different domains has been fixed.

  • [CARDS-50627]

    • Object Task Scheduler task for client addresses links renewing after client or contract approval now is switched off by default and can be switched on by the global parameter RENEW_ADDRESS_LINK.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf]

  • [CARDS-50692]

    • Fixed balance-based classifier processing when CYCLE_N > 1.

  • [CARDS-50794]

    • Menu Item DB Administrator Utilities.Special Contract Utilities.Macrotransactions - Reverse has been updated - now macro-transactions generated by this menu item are marked with REPOST_MTR tag. This tag has local_date of reversed macro-transaciton as value and it allows Datamart to filter out such records during daily ETL process.

  • [CARDS-51227]

    • Target ConsumerID calculation for decisions has been fixed.

  • [CARDS-51287]

    • FROM_TRANS_DATE behaviour has been restored for the explicit number of days defined in the tag value.

  • [CARDS-51394]

    • Fixed recalculation of values in the ON_DATE, ON_DATE_BALANCE fields of the Account table during the Accounting GL renumeration process.

  • [CARDS-51423]

    • Threshold amount calculation for Inherited standing orders with BY_BATCH has been fixed for multicurrency contracts.

  • [CARDS-51629]

    • The error message "History mode can not be empty" has been modified to the warning message "History mode may be required" when approving a Service Package.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Balance_types.pdf]

  • [CARDS-51981]

    • Problem with setting version attribute and INT_TRF tag for an Accounting Scheme has been corrected in situations when there are no contracts and normalization orders for this scheme.

  • [CARDS-52034]

    • Fixed the "IS_AM_AVAIL" tag in CMS STAT for the ACCOUNT_TYPES group.

  • [CARDS-52036]

    • MTR_GROUP is no longer counted twice in CMS STAT.

  • [CARDS-52164]

    • Fixed incorrect balance amounts shown right after balance prediction in WAY4Web; cache clear has been added.

  • [CARDS-52352]

    • BIN record search on contract subtype validation now checks BIN record status. Active records have a higher priority for being selected than records that are inactive or closed. However, active BIN records with "Data Source" = Own have a lower priority than inactive or closed records from other sources.

    Updated Manuals: [product_management\Products_and_Subtypes.pdf]

  • [CARDS-52662]

    • Reversal transactions have been excluded from the XLS_CB_f250_3.rdf report.

  • [CARDS-52766]

    • Validation of setting of classifier value for the contract or client has been enhanced.

  • [CARDS-52815]

    • Fixed lengthy execution of the approve process for related acquiring contracts.

  • [CARDS-52893]

    • New tags MIN_BAL_TYPE_SIGN/MAX_BAL_TYPE_SIGN have been supported for use together with MIN_BAL_TYPE/MAX_BAL_TYPE and LIMIT_AMOUNT tags.

    Updated Manuals: [tags description] [product_management\Service_Packages.pdf]

  • [CARDS-53036]

    • Behaviour of the FIRST_BILLING and MIN_BILLING=C tags has been enhanced.

  • [CARDS-53283]

    • Each ITEM_DUE is now processed separately in Acquiring products configuration. Previously, using a Due Type other then Value Days Due could cause a collapse of several ITEM_DUE with different signs, leading to incorrect information in Merchant Statement reports.

  • [CARDS-53809]

    • Use of the TOTAL_BAL_TYPE tag for prepaid cards has been changed. See Client Upgrade Notes.

    Updated Manuals: [tags description] [product_management\Service_Packages.pdf] [tariff_management\Tariff_Management.pdf]

  • [CARDS-54097]

    • A new custom procedure, CUST_RECALC_BILLING has been added for custom actions after changing the billing date for the main contract.

  • [I1507014999]/[CARDS-44845]

    • Fixed incorrect substitution of %PARTY_CITY_EN% and %PARTY_NAME_EN% variables in client messages

  • [I1511114677]/[CARDS-46537]

    • SAVE_SRC_FEE/SAVE_TGT_FEE tag behaviour has been fixed for custom fees with CONTRACT_FOR redefinition.

  • [I1511254947]/[CARDS-46773]

    • Fixed incorrect working form "Additional Pack" in W4M

  • [I1512231927]/[CARDS-47157]

    • Validation of FREE_RELATION based products has been fixed.

  • [I1602255603]/[CARDS-47937]

    • Macrotransaction Source Amount filling has been changed. Due to FX conversion, this field may have been equal to zero; now for all such cases, the zero value is overridden by the amount of the entry posted to the source account. Please see Upgrade Notes for more details on this change impact.

  • [I1604012994]/[CARDS-48620]

    • It is forbidden to use the "XF_ROUND" tag in account templates and "SO Due" for accounts with GL Type=High Precision and Due Type not equal to "End Cycle Due". When approving an Account Scheme, the corresponding error message will be shown in the case of these settings.

    Updated Manuals: [accounting\WAY4_Accounting.pdf] [tags description] [product_management\Client_Messages.pdf]

  • [I1604120013]/[CARDS-48688]

    • Temporary variable declaration has been corrected to avoid ORA-06502 error.

  • [I1604136109]/[CARDS-48558]

    • Links to the "Message Dictionary" in some forms have been fixed.

  • [I1604188226]/[CARDS-49967]

    • Form link from Process Message forms to Doc could open the doc was not related to this message

  • [I1605090770]/[CARDS-48751]

    • Merchant Management: Now we get Merchant Id and MCC directly from a merchant account contract and don't try to get device parameters.

  • [I1606141324]/[CARDS-49152]

    • Now we check (update) the value of the standard classifier CONTR_STATUS on contract approval.

  • [I1607272853]/[CARDS-49858]

    • Full Payment and Late Payment date calculation has been fixed for different calendar types specified in an Account Scheme. For credit products without date schemes.

  • [I1609229639]/[CARDS-50443]

    • Balance Type validation has been improved. "Latest items only" value of the "History Mode" field was removed.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Balance_types.pdf] [tags description]

  • [I1610117081]/[CARDS-50654]

    • The ability to move a contract from a child to a parent institution has been added.

  • [I1610143454]/[CARDS-50702]

    • Definition of routing idt for new contracts is regulated by the SKIP_ROUTING global parameter. When the value is "Y" (default), routing idt will not be filled in. If distributed processing is used and routing idt is a required attribute of real contracts, its definition can be additionally regulated by the client parameter SKIP_ROUTING, whose should be "Y" for cards that have been issued but not yet sold.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf]

  • [I1610179670]/[CARDS-50722]

    • Added reset of environment variables (global parameters, cached data when posting events, contracts, etc.) when a session is initialized.

  • [I1611249741]/[CARDS-52334]

    • FX rate definition for multicurrency limit normalization has been fixed according to corresponding Posting Date.

  • [I1612046735]/[CARDS-52303]

    • For the "test script import" pipe, search for a CLIENT_TYPE value for the APPL_CLIENT.CLT tag has been modified, now only financial institution is checked.

  • [I1702061012]/[CARDS-52491]

    • Character buffer overflow error message generation when approving Service Packages with long name values has been fixed.

  • [I1703017366]/[CARDS-52374]

    • When an event is posted for a contract, the last CDU date is not checked for events that change contract status.

  • [I1703024740]/[CARDS-52378]

    • Standing order amount calculation has been fixed for cases when an order's posting date is earlier than the current banking date, and when the order's minimum and maximum amount currency differs from the account currency.

  • [I1704121197]/[CARDS-52967]

    • Processing of annual miscellaneous Service fees for contracts created on February 28 of any non-leap year has been fixed. See Client Upgrade Notes for details.

  • [I1704189347]/[CARDS-52998]

    • Document processing procedure behaviour, when a fee was charged twice in an issuing contract, has been fixed for financial documents that inherit the fee amount from an authorization document (the FROM_AUTH tag with the FEE_AMOUNT value is used in basic transaction service setup) and if the fee is configured as a Misc service with the tag "MTR_FEE;" and was triggered by a usage limiter on authorization document processing.

  • [I1706260734]/[CARDS-54119]

    • To consolidate positive and negative Due Amounts from several Due Items for an acquiring product's accounts, the REFRESH_DUE tag should be set in the corresponding account templates. This tag should not be used for templates involved in per-transaction Merchant Payment Statements. By default, Due Amounts are never consolidated into one Due Normalization for acquiring products.

  • [I310186397]/[CARDS-37268]

    • Problem when some GL Entries could be created with a GL Date in the past has been fixed. See Upgrade Notes for more details.

  • [CARDS-48951]

    • Transaction Condition Processing: Applied caching.

  • [CARDS-51495]

    • Reports XLS_CB_f250_1.rdf, XLS_CB_f250_2.rdf, XLS_CB_f250_3.rdf: - Added count of contactless cards, transactions and devices. - Supported consolidated report for all financial organization branches. - Supported counting of cards with only 2 groups: debit/credit.

    Updated Manuals: [rf_reporting\250\Form_250.pdf]

    Core banking interface

  • [CARDS-48179]

    • RBS Outward processing: fixed "precision overflow (HASH_TOT_AMOUNT)" error.

  • [CARDS-48527]

    • RBS Documents Import: fixed response file when it is reloaded due to an error.

  • [CARDS-50912]

    • IC Document Export: added a new pipe parameter "USE_TRANS_TYPE_IDT" = Y/N(default), which allows the "TransTypeIDT" element to be exported in the "Doc\TransType\TransCode" aggregate (for DETAILED_TRANS_CODE=Y mode).

    Updated Manuals: [core_banking_interface\core_banking_interface\user_manuals\CBS_Interface_UFX.pdf]

  • [CARDS-51109]

    • RBS Outward Processing: fixed "Can't buffer without truncating ()" error when executing the "GET_CLIENT_PARMS" procedure. If target or source accounts are longer than 32 symbols, they are truncated with a warning.

  • [CARDS-53805]

    • The necessary privilege to execute CARDS_PIPES package procedures has been added for RBS. Payments Import pipe.

  • [1523223]/[CARDS-46182]

    • RBS. Payments Import : fixed "Invalid Renewal Batch Total" when the declined document has a partial amount.

  • [I1411270976]/[CARDS-43975]

    • MasterCard, VISA, UFX File Management forms display Received/Sent files.

  • [I1508148687]/[CARDS-46668]

    • IC Documents Export H2H: fixed export of chip addendums for secondary documents.

  • [I1511032735]/[CARDS-47173]

    • IC Documents Export, RBS. Transactions Export: fixed amounts for Reversal and Quasi Original when there are multiple Fin adjustments and Auth adjustments.

  • [I1512073441]/[CARDS-47135]

    • Transaction Export: fixed "device cycle" filling

  • [I1607060884]/[CARDS-50105]

    • RBS FX Rate Import: fixed moving empty files to error directory.

  • [I1607143764]/[CARDS-50193]

    • IC.Documents Import: added additional check for DocRefSet elements.

  • [I1609226977]/[CARDS-51687]

    • RBS Document Import: fixed response file for import file after previous unsuccessful import.

  • [I1703209597]/[CARDS-52654]

    • Pipe RBS. Transactions Export (Batching): generation of duplicate empty files for a future date has been fixed.

  • [I1705113768]/[CARDS-53779]

    • In the Core Banking System interface, Misc Fee data export for bank branches is supported in plain and UFX file formats.

  • [CARDS-51263]

    • IC Documents Export: Added the ability to export PAN instead of TOKEN for ONUS token transactions. To export PANs, the value of the new pipe parameter "PAN_FOR_TOKEN_ONUS" should be set to "Y".

    Updated Manuals: [core_banking_interface\core_banking_interface\user_manuals\CBS_Interface_UFX.pdf]

  • [I1605118135]/[CARDS-48898]

    • RBS. Outward Processing: added the TRANS_DTLS_TO_REASON_DTLS parameter.

    Updated Manuals: CBS | OLD CBS Merchant Payment Orders

    Customer profile

  • [CARDS-46253]

    • Possibility to manage wirh Client Corporate Managers has been added to OpenWay\Customer Profile\Operations menu.

  • [CARDS-47279]

    • Multi level additional authentication model using in Customer Profile can be set up in DBM forms.

  • [CARDS-48096]

    • EChannel Functionality List is stored now in the special database handbook and can be requested by the application to check whether the functionality is supported on the DB level.

  • [CARDS-48511]

    • Retry interval for the recurrent payments in WebBanking can be configured as in days as in hours.

  • [CARDS-51292]

    • Marketing personal messages are now limited to 4000 characters.

  • [I1603247423]/[CARDS-48235]

    • Upgrade script has been split into two parts to improve upgrade performance.

  • [I1605042097]/[CARDS-48694]

    • Problem with string buffer overflow in Bank List request is checked.

    Customer/account management

  • [CARDS-43148]

    • Added a new parameter P_USE_LOCAL_CONSTANTS for the "Merchant Standing Order Entry Details.rdf" report for using the report with Way4Web.

    Updated Manuals: [acquiring\user_manuals\Merchant_Statements.pdf] [issuing\user_manuals\Cardholder_Statements.pdf]

  • [CARDS-47229]

    • Using bank division address is included into the searching address logic by the special parameter for the address type.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Common_References_Books.pdf]

  • [CARDS-47231]

    • Validation of a standing order with an individual counterparty checks that its transaction direction corresponds to the counterparty type: Payee or Payer: debit orders should be connected with Payer, credit orders with Payee. For Normalisation and Norm Advice order types the counterparty type is not validated.

  • [CARDS-48386]

    • Added the ability to create a contract with a valid status if a client is present in a client stop list. Now we "ignore" the client response code for contract approval/set status for response codes present in the CLIENT_STATUS_IGNORED_FOR_CONTRACT (global parameter) list.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf]

  • [CARDS-48768]

    • Deletion of accounting contracts has been moved from standard contract forms to a special menu.

    Updated Manuals: [acquiring\user_manuals\Acquiring_Module.pdf] [issuing\user_manuals\Issuing_Module.pdf]

  • [CARDS-48941]

    • A new contract search algorithm has been added to route transactions with one card to different accounts (issuing contracts) depending on Contract Parameters. Special configuration is required.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Contract_and_Client_Classifiers.pdf] [core\Global_Parameters.pdf]

  • [CARDS-51973]

    • Added a new parameter P_USE_LOCAL_CONSTANTS for the "Cardholder Contract Statement" and "Merchant Contract Statement" reports for using these reports with Way4Web.

  • [CARDS-52014]

    • Added a new procedure cust_cms_stat() for gathering custom statistical information in the gather CMS statistics process.

  • [CARDS-52446]

    • In the "Contract_Analytic_Statement" and "Cardholder_Contract_Statement" reports an option has been added to show purchases made using loyalty bonuses in the separate section.

    Updated Manuals: [issuing\user_manuals\Cardholder_Statements.pdf]

  • [CARDS-52828]

    • A new parameter has been added to the "Cardholder_Contract_Statement" report: P_HIDE_FEE_CONDITION, varchar(4000). The default value is "1=2". The parameter only works if P_SHOW_CUSTOM_FEE=Y. Use the parameter to hide fee amounts (convert fee amount to zero) in the transactions section.

  • [I1603111318]/[CARDS-48031]

    • Process log for OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Common Handbooks\Standard classifiers markup has been added.

  • [CARDS-47831]

    • Processing of variable %ACCOUNT_INTEREST% has been corrected to empty billing cycle support.

  • [CARDS-48252]

    • Special procedures for deleting clients have been introduced. The standard "Del" button has been disabled in forms.

    Updated Manuals: [acquiring\user_manuals\Acquiring_Module.pdf] [issuing\user_manuals\Issuing_Module.pdf]

  • [CARDS-51444]

    • Fixed performance trouble with procedure of calculation values current amount and current number fields on GUI forms.

  • [I1512289895]/[CARDS-47275]

    • Message Converter: Fixed processing of messages which contains asterisk characters.

  • [I1512305689]/[CARDS-48214]

    • Contract level generation for acquiring contracts has been fixed in liability trees.

  • [I1603048816]/[CARDS-48032]

    • Product classifiers (CONTR_SUBTYPE, PRODUCT_GROUP) are now recalculated in the "Apply product changes" procedure.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Contract_and_Client_Classifiers.pdf]

  • [I1607274086]/[CARDS-50358]

    • In report "Merchant Standing Order Entry Details", the parameter "P_SHOW_EMPTY_CONTRACTS" affects the XML results - it applies a filter on the empty contracts.

  • [I1610123492]/[CARDS-50677]

    • Reversed entries are now shown in the CSS Doc Entry form.

  • [I1610145898]/[CARDS-50819]

  • [CARDS-48637]

    • Added hash partition for pk_serv_pack index.
