    • WAY4 Schema Checksum Report shows the difference in column order for indexes.

  • [DBK-2019]

    • New columns sy_conf_group_val.add_num (Additional Numeric Value) and sy_conf_group_val.sort_order for report configuration have been added.

  • [DBK-2203]

    • The default value for line separator has been changed from LF to CRLF. The LINE_SEPARATOR parameter has been added and it configures the Java SQL Exporter Pipe.

  • [CARDS-47964]

    • The FastTrack upgrade works without errors.

  • [CARDS-50648]

    • DML tagging for acnt_contract.last_scan does not work if "Upgrade Stoplist" synch flow is present.

  • [CARDS-51267]

    • Fixed document error message when a batch has already been posted, but not closed.

  • [CARDS-52983]

    • Fixed the possibility of falling into an infinite loop when incorrect bertlv data tries to parse.

  • [DBK-1850]

    • WAY4R synchronisation conflicts on num_seq_range in active-active mode.

  • [DBK-1922]

    • Some pipes reset process_log.current_number when they finished

  • [DBK-1998]

    • Cpability of disabling dbms_streams_adm.SET_TAG for avoiding SCN headroom exhousting

  • [DBK-2022]

    • Fixed issue when process uniqueness control did not work if the process had the Suspended status.

  • [DBK-2048]

    • Audit log records did not contain the user name if the application session used an oracle user was not registerered as an officer

  • [DBK-2109]

    • The CopyOfficers script now locks a user account if Officer.is_active is not "Yes".

  • [DBK-2147]

    • Telescope was unable to run reports with report server version 11+ if a parameter contained a single quote character.

  • [DBK-2238]

    • Now for any error, the SQL Exporter pipe saves error details to the process log and displays a message to the user.

  • [DBK-2278]

    • Object Task Scheduler fails if the node is not available.

  • [DBK-2280]

    • Fixed concurrency between object task and normal operations when the Object Task Scheduler is suspended.

  • [DBK-2282]

    • A periodic process will no longer try to start working when it is suspended.

  • [DBK-2283]

    • Fixed problem when process uniqueness control did not work if the process had the Suspended status.

  • [DBK-2331]

    • Concurrence on updating process_log in Way4Replication has been fixed.

  • [I1602272404]/[DBK-1904]

    • Some queries for redefinition tools have been optimised. Process time has been improved.

  • [I1604050612]/[DBK-2024]

    • 'Officer with id= does not exist' when auto creating new users

  • [I1611010227]/[DBK-2333]

    • Fixed: SQL error in OpenWay\WAY4U\Business Processes\Business Processes -> Data form.

  • [I1612278687]/[DBK-2428]

    • Non-periodic parallel process now processes Suspend and Resume correctly.

  • [I1705101042]/[CARDS-53222]

    • For event messages (OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Products\Event Types, "Messages" button) the filter in the "Dictionary" button has been changed so that only linked records are shown in the "Dictionary for Messages for..."form.

  • [CARDS-53785]

    • PA DSS Implementation Guide has been updated: Disk Encryption section has been added (disk encryption is used when there is no Oracle Partitioning option).

    DB manager

  • [DBK-1833]

    • Product Inspector tree control has been enhanced.

  • [DBK-2075]

    • Pipe name has been added to PROCESS_LOG.PARAMETERS as the tag PIPE=pipe_name; This relates to pipes stored in client\shared\pipes directory.

  • [DBK-2087]

    • DB Manager form selects a reference value from long reference tables (long DDDW) using a LIKE SQL operator. It causes searching without index if the DB column is encrypted. To prevent such a case, declare the list of encrypted columns directly. The form will use '=' in the SQL statement for these columns. Use the ENCRYPTED_COLUMNS DB.INI parameter to declare the column list. Format of the parameter: <table code 1>.<column code 1>,<table code 2>.<column code 2>,...

  • [DBK-1859]

    • Fixed bug. DBM no longer deletes files from C:\.

  • [DBK-1926]

    • Pipe exe executor.dll has been added to Full filter.

  • [DBK-2107]

    • Report Engine R2. Parameters P_USER, P_TITLE can be set in menu item parameter list.

  • [DBK-2139]

    • Reports Engine R2. New parameters for Batch report utility: errorStatusXml (to switch off corresponding Report Server parameter), errorDir (directory for error reports).

  • [DBK-2143]

    • Report Engine R2 generated an exception if it was requested to save result file on server.

  • [DBK-2162]

    • Reports Engine R2 processed double symbols '%' in parameter value incorrectly. Replace %% with %%%%.

  • [I1605067765]/[DBK-2031]

    • To switch encoding in the "Save As" dialog of "SQL Executor" use the new db.ini parameter "SQL_EXEC_SAVEAS_ENCODING" with the values ANSI, UTF8.

  • [I1606063687]/[DBK-2100]

    • Reports Engine R2 no longer ignores the report_server_http_timeout parameter.

  • [I1609232726]/[DBK-2247]

    • Report Engine R2 batch mode. The engine incorrectly substituted SELECT columns into parameters if the substitutions were marked by sequence numbers (%1%, %2%, ...).

  • [CARDS-47671]

  • [CARDS-51991]

    • A new form, "Mp Payment Scheme Member BINs" has been created for the new table, mp_ps_member_bin; a link to "Mp Payment Scheme Member BINs" has been added to the "Mp Payment Scheme Identification" form.

  • [CARDS-52308]

    • In WAY4 Datamart version 03.45.10, new FI Group Load functionality for performing several loads to Datamart (ETLs) for one banking date has been supported. The fi_load_group tag should be put in f_i.special_parms to configure financial institution groups to be loaded during a certain ETL. The mp_fi_load_group table and forms for filling in the fi_load_group tag in f_i.special_parms has been added from WAY4 Cards version 03.45.30.

    Updated Manuals: [Datamart\manuals\language\Datamart_Administration.pdf]

  • [CARDS-50949]

    • DCI Inward Processing: For loading Acquirer Confirmation File - changed message code S1--I--- trans type "Interchange Total" to S1-AI--- trans type "Acq Interchange Total" and code S1--F--- trans type "Reimbursement Fee Total" to S1-AF--- trans type "Acq Reimbursement Fee Total". They must be changed manually or by loading Copy Configuration file. Supported loading Interchange Issuer Detail File.

Inward Processing\DCI DXS Inward Processing has been removed.

    • DA v2: Supported OnUs disputes.

  • [CARDS-46406]

    • DA v2: The messages "DA: Cannot find dispute case for Previous doc." and "Cannot find dispute case for the Previous doc id" have been moved to Debug level.

  • [CARDS-46412]

    • DA v2: Card Number filling for Fee Collection document in orphaned chargeback cases.

  • [CARDS-47269]

    • DA v2: Supported Dispute Case creation for unmatched final chargebacks.

  • [CARDS-47535]

    • DA v2. Supported case creation and chargeback processing if a presentment has multiple adjustments.

  • [CARDS-48645]

    • DA v2. Incoming Chargeback processing when it initiates creation of a case.

  • [CARDS-48788]

    • DA v2. Reject-documents processing.

  • [CARDS-49659]

    • Fraud Management: Fixed menu Item "OWS.Accept SAFE" and conditions to call DA for incoming safe documents.

  • [CARDS-49711]

    • DA v2: Creation of automatic SAFE / FRS documents has been fixed.

  • [CARDS-49733]

    • DA v2: Retail Reversal processing if a case is being created for an incoming chargeback.

  • [CARDS-49902]

    • DA v2. Form "Dispute Rule - Doc Parms.dataform.xml" restored field "Check Level".

  • [CARDS-50569]

    • Accept Documents: Fee Collection performance impact.

  • [CARDS-52496]

    • DA v2. Fixed situation when incoming Presentment Reversals/Adjustments and MasterCard Fee Collection secondary documents were not linked to the corresponding cases.

  • [CARDS-52939]

    • Dispute Assistant v2. Fixed the procedure to get the last document in a chain.

  • [CARDS-52942]

    • Fixed posting of secondary documents, now when an optional document is reversed, the previous document status is not restored.

  • [CARDS-53484]

    • DA v2: Fixed automatic Final Write-Off creation if one of the summary balances is equal to zero.

  • [I1408182397]/[CARDS-51748]

    • Dispute Assistant v1, v2: Changed MasterCard default type of rate for amount conversion from MDB to MDM.

  • [I1503163246]/[CARDS-49248]

    • DA v2. Fee Collection processing in part of case creation and linking.

  • [I1508124180]/[CARDS-45550]

    • History document posting: Amount processing.

  • [I1510289575]/[CARDS-46408]

    • DA v2: Recovering document settlement amount default filling.

  • [I1512106388]/[CARDS-49388]

    • DA v2: Supported Dispute Case creation for final chargeback matched with history representment. Supported activities for Acquirers to add history representment, history chargeback and history presentment for such cases.

  • [I1512231114]/[CARDS-53570]

    • DA v2. Fixed filling Trans Date for Reimbursements.

  • [I1601117197]/[CARDS-47499]

    • DA v2: Final Write-Off amounts processing.

  • [I1602164896]/[CARDS-47845]

    • Dispute Assistant v2: Second Presentment and Second Chargeback amount processing for Credit transactions. Fixed previously incorrect calculation of Chargeback Balance (and 2nd presentment amount) when a chargeback had been performed for a credit transaction.

  • [I1604192767]/[CARDS-49093]

    • DA v2. Supported changing Trusted Amount currency. The currency may be the First Presentment transaction or settlement currency.

  • [I1606077949]/[CARDS-49565]

    • DA v2. Fixed amount calculation if case is initiated by Orphaned Chargeback.

  • [I1606108037]/[CARDS-49851]

    • DA v2: Added "No Such Card" detection for not fully posted documents when contracts are found but no macro-transaction under the document.

  • [I1607081471]/[CARDS-51266]

    • DA v2: Fixed amount processing if the global parameter USE_TRANS_AMOUNT=Y.

  • [I1607269017]/[CARDS-50154]

    • DA v2: Fixed the procedure to get the last document in a chain. Supported processing reversals that were not generated in the DA interface. The activity "Accepted Presentment Reversal (Iss)" (idt DSP_ACPT_PRS_REV_SYSACT) must be registered in the acquirer strategy.

  • [I1609075192]/[CARDS-50165]

    • Accept Documents: Fee Collection performance impact if there isn't ARN and PS Ref Number in the doc.

  • [I1609086162]/[CARDS-51433]

    • DA v.2: Fixed filling reimbursement amounts by default.

  • [I1609086162]/[CARDS-52526]

    • DA v2. Fixed Reimbursement Transaction Amount processing if a reimbursement is created manually.

  • [I1609213579]/[CARDS-50737]

    • DA v2: Fixed Reject documents processing (adding to a case).

  • [I1610184379]/[CARDS-51319]

    • DA v2: Restored the reopen case feature if a new document is added to a closed case.

  • [I1701125638]/[CARDS-53582]

    • Dispute documents with fee return can now be processed even if the original document's services have been deleted by Housekeeping. If the FEE_RETURN=ALL option is configured, a fee will be returned; in other cases, a document will be processed without fee return.

  • [I1702080846]/[CARDS-52354]

    • DA v2. Fixed settlement amount calculation for credit Second Presentments.

  • [I1702105338]/[CARDS-52777]

    • DA R2: For write-off of a dispute case with a presentment for "No Such Card", if reimbursement (in this case, write-off of the presentment) is created manually, it won't be created automatically by the standard dispute case write-off procedure.

  • [I1702225414:ISMP 2075322 : MC International CBK are all rejected since MC Release 16.2]/[CARDS-52243]

    • DA v1: Restored channel M (MasterCard International Channel) processing. Only for DA v1!!!

  • [I1703145086]/[CARDS-52516]

    • DA v2. Now Target Member Id is not filled for Fee Collection from acquirer. It must be filled from routing.

  • [I1703281144]/[CARDS-53100]

    • DA v2: For documents that are manually edited, added checking that data in the document add_info field is properly terminated with a semicolon. If not, a semicolon will be added to the end of the add_info field.

  • [I403199808]/[CARDS-52506]

    • DA v1. Restored original (which were used before DA v2 was developed) conditions to call DA v1.

  • [CARDS-51624]

    • MasterCard Transaction Management. A warning message and opening a "CHBK_FRAUD_COUNTER" Event have be added for cases when the number of Fraud Chargebacks is exceeded. DA v2. Create Chargeback activity can't be performed if the number of Fraud Chargebacks is exceeded.

    Distributed processing

  • [CARDS-50534]

    • Added ability to check that all contract groups are processed on the primary node in a Distributed Processing configuration.

  • [CARDS-49989]

    • CDU with LAST_SCAN_MODE=S skipped new contracts.

  • [DBK-2030]

    • Migrating HA services did not always switch service activity.

  • [DBK-2176]

    • To avoid a large number of queries to gv$instance from multithread periodic jobs, set the process parameter EXIT_ON_MAX_DELAY = 'N'.

  • [DBK-2379]

    • Unable to set the primary unavailable with a console connected to a secondary if another secondaries exist

  • [DBK-2676]

    • Fixed error: High Availability service was not active on this node just after activating.

    Fast track upgrade

  • [DBK-2438]

    • For LOCK/UNLOCK/KILL_SESSION actions, the optional procedure Sys.OWS_ADMINISTER_USER no longer checks that the user account being processed has system privileges. Otherwise, it would not be able to manage the HSK Owner user. These privileges continue to be checked for other actions with user accounts. Note that this is an insignificant reduction in security in the new version of the procedure.

    Fee Prediction

  • [CARDS-51673]

    • MasterCard MPE Import. Supported loading amount restriction from MPE for a particular IRD by tag in the configuration. Now the configuration supports loading amount restriction for Spain IRD 75 and 85 for retail transactions.

  • [CARDS-51894]

    • IRD configuration has been modified for Europe region. TCA "All Face To Face (Group)" has been replaced by "All Cardholder, Card (Group)" for IRD S2.

  • [CARDS-52707]

    • The RewardsBusiness product has been added in RA configuration for Interregional jurisdiction.

  • [CARDS-52798]

    • UPI Fee Prediction. Fixed the channel in the OpenWay\UPI Fee Prediction\UPI IRF Criteria form.

  • [I1703025952]/[CARDS-52595]

    • IRD PE configuration has been modified for Interregional and Intra-LAC region transactions.

  • [I1704192981. Wrong IC for new visa B2B Virtual Payments (ICFEE-178)]/[CARDS-52895]

    • RA configuration has been modified for all regions and countries in accordance with VISA release (Apr17-341 Mandatory 2.2 New Visa Business-to-Business Virtual Payments Product).

  • [CARDS-50801]

    • Fee Prediction configuration (payment products) has been modified in accordance with MasterCard interchange tariffs.

  • [CARDS-51576]

    • RA configuration has been modified for the Great Britain and the Czech Republic.

  • [CARDS-52069]

    • IC tariffs have been modified for the Czech Republic in accordance with MasterCard Interchange Bulletin No. 1.

  • [CARDS-52209]

    • IC tariffs and RA configuration have been modified for all regions in accordance with VISA release requirement: 2.8 Changes to Private Label Transfer Pricing.

  • [CARDS-52387]

    • RA configuration and IC tariffs have been modified for the Czech Republic according to Visa Business News (AI06374,AI06367).

  • [I1502060020]/[CARDS-50943]

    • Interchange Reimbursement qualification criteria have been added for Kazakhstan.

  • [I1610204653]/[CARDS-52179]

    • IC tariffs have been modified for the United Kingdom in accordance with MasterCard Interchange Bulletin No. 40, 14 October 2016.

  • [I1611068909]/[CARDS-51437]

    • Interchange tariffs have been modified for Portugal in accordance with MasterCard Interchange Bulletin No. 21.

  • [I1611068909]/[CARDS-51671]

    • IC tariffs have been modified for Ireland in accordance with MasterCard Interchange Bulletin No. 22, 2 November 2016.

  • [I1611234983]/[CARDS-51440]

    • Interchange tariffs have been modified for Germany in accordance with MasterCard Interchange Bulletin No. 23.

  • [I1612279006]/[CARDS-51719]

    • IRD configuration has been modified for EU region.

  • [I1702196591]/[CARDS-52157]

    • IC tariffs have been modified for Belgium in accordance with VISA requirements from 16 February 2017.

  • [ICFEE- 107]/[CARDS-52986]

    • RA configuration has been modified for fallback transactions in Europe.

    Fleet cards

  • [CARDS-46874]

    • F0.EA.FFXX.D5 value (bill item Cost) received from terminal can be used instead or Price*Quantity for item documents. To swith on this mode use FLEET_USE_COST=Y global variable or tag in F_I.special_parms or tag in trans_sutype.Fee_Algorithm. Discounts, source/target prices will not be calculated by system in this mode.

  • [CARDS-50357]

    • Available amount restricted by the lowest triggered limiter can be included in the response BERTLV tags for Retail, PreAuth, and Sales Completion transactions: - MoneyLimit - F0.EA.FFXX.C7, - UnitsLimit - F0.EA.FFXX.C8, - LimitExpire - F0.EA.FFXX.C9 for each Bill Item.

  • [CARDS-47278]

    • New prices for interbranch transfers are calculated and stored in the SRC_FS_PRICE and TGT_FB_PRICE tags.

  • [CARDS-47287]

    • Response Code value 78 returned instead of common value 12 in F0.EA.FFXX.D4 fleet bertlv tag if no records found in fleet goods dictionary for received Goods Code.

  • [CARDS-49219]

    • Uniqueness validation added for Fleet Goods dictionary tables: goods_nomenclature.name, goods_nomenclature.code, goods_item.goods_group_id+name, goods_item.code, Nomenclature added to goods_group validation rules.

  • [CARDS-49454]

    • Fuel solution enhanced. Additional column has been added to Goods Categories dictionary in order to allow Goods Categories filtering by Goods Nomenclatures

  • [CARDS-50244]

    • Fleet goods pipe filename prefix is no longer case-sensitive.

  • [CARDS-50787]

    • New inbound fleet bertlv tag E3.EA.FFXX.DA (PriceCurrency) has been supported.

  • [CARDS-51120]

    • A new tag, F0.EA.FFXX.C9, has been added to the Fleet decline response bertlv message. The tag will be filled in with the exceeded limiter's expiry date when at least one of the MoneyLimit(F0.EA.FFXX.C7) and UnitsLimit(F0.EA.FFXX.C8) tags in the response message also contains values.

  • [CARDS-51405]

    • Usage limiter remainder values (units and money, units or money, units, money) returned for successful transactions are now regulated by the FLEET_RETURN_LIMITERS global parameter.

  • [CARDS-46232]

    • Authorization Retail Item document no more created if transaction declined.

  • [CARDS-47529]

    • Fleet usage amount calculation for adjustment posting has been corrected: tgt_fee amount for an advice document is decreased by the tgt_fee amount for the adjustment.

  • [CARDS-47744]

    • Use tag BASE_AMOUNT_TYPE=REST_QUANTITY; on usage spc_condition to setup ACQ fuel usages in liters.

  • [CARDS-48521]

    • Goods Nomenclature can be ommited in Fleet Goods Dictionary pipe inbound file. Nomenclature DEFAULT will be used in this case.

  • [CARDS-48989]

    • F0.ED, F0.EA.FFXX.ED attributes are returned from issuer.

  • [CARDS-49267]

    • Fixed padding in bertlv number format

  • [CARDS-49317]

    • Fixed issue with Recons Amount during RePosting of Advice-Adjustment docs chain.

  • [CARDS-49462]

    • ITEM_AMOUNT, ITEM_CURR tags are calculated for the documents loaded from clearing files.

  • [CARDS-49585]

    • CODING_SET_EXT, CODING_SET tags stored in the document created in UI form on validation stage.

  • [CARDS-49673]

    • Fleet REST_AMOUNT clearing item doc tag made optional and can be ommited in the clearing files.

  • [CARDS-50857]

    • Transit of another root bertlv containers together with Fleet bertlv container has been supported from terminal to issuer and back from issuer to terminal.

  • [CARDS-53670]

    • The discount calculation algorithm with the BEST_PRICE option has been updated. A new BEST_PRICE_USE_STELLA calculation mode has been added to allow selection of the best price: tariff price or pump price.

  • [I1508038215]/[CARDS-48187]

    • RetCode parameter removed from cust_bill_is_use_trf procedure. Cust should return USE_TARIFF=N and create Warning message if cannot to determine required processing flow for transaction.

  • [I1603304602]/[CARDS-49586]

    • Target Fin institution currency rate selected to convert discount amount defined in target tariff.

  • [I1606027645]/[CARDS-49250]

    • Adjustment documents fee calculation algorithm is changed to avoid rounding issues.

  • [I1611117514]/[CARDS-51060]

    • Fixed incorrect processing of the list of redefined fields when personalized usage limiters are modified.

  • [I1706056722]/[CARDS-53767]

    • Adjustment amounts rounding issue has been fixed in the end of month fee recalculation procedure.

    Health monitoring

  • [CARDS-47859]

    • Added support of Way4U monitoring by coms_log.

  • [DBK-2584]

    • "Node availability" status supported.

  • [DBK-2550]

    • Only processes that can be activated in the current node are monitored.

  • [CARDS-53916]

    • PA DSS Implementation Guide has been updated: Health Monitoring section has been added.

    High availability

  • [CARDS-48641]

    • Implemented protection against changes in data for contracts that are authorised in secondary databases.

  • [CARDS-46834]

    • WAY4R secondary->primary apply authorisation documents uses deferred apply technology with Object Task Scheduler.

  • [DBK-1940]

    • Way4R Copy can use several connections for reading si_log_src.

  • [DBK-1942]

    • Running Way4R with parameter TRACE=Y enables sql trace in the source (db link) session in addition to the target one

  • [DBK-2029]

    • Way4R copy: slow performance when there are a lot of uncopied changes with default parameters.

  • [CARDS-47301]

    • WAY4R: A lot of deadlocks on the item table when synchronising primary->secondary.

  • [CARDS-49559]

    • Added replication of contract's counter value which used for authorisation code generation when documents from secondary node loading to primary one

  • [CARDS-53396]

    • SAF forwarding works on HA secondary node.

  • [DBK-1818]

    • Fixed the issue when a large number of failed changes was caused by foreign key constraint errors on applying a high volume of changes after a long gap.

  • [DBK-1830]

    • WAY4R: "Retry for all" is not efficient if there is a large number of waiting changes.

  • [DBK-1871]

    • Way4R crashed while replicating delete operation if this operation raised an exception

  • [DBK-1874]

    • Way4R could loss some changes made in the short oracle session

  • [DBK-1895]

    • WAY4R copied data before the flow start point.

  • [DBK-1982]

    • Way4R did not copy changes until the source session is closed if a session had been idle for more than one minute

  • [DBK-1984]

    • Way4 Replication: wrong latency calculation for Way4 Replication Copy Fixed

  • [DBK-2180]

    • Fixed service migration (switching Main and Reserve nodes). After migration, a service becomes Inactive on the old Main node and Active on the new Main node.

  • [DBK-2255]

    • Unable to switch easily between primary and secondary of the old version.

  • [DBK-2258]

    • 'Retry All' in HA console utilised all available parrallel query servers

  • [DBK-2291]

    • High Concurrency on sw_service_activity when switching services to another node has been fixed.

  • [DBK-2326]

    • Fixed latency of WAY4Replication copy process.

  • [DBK-2342]

    • TS could not reject not-critical services without waiting for time-out if the only node was not available

  • [DBK-2404]

    • Excluding some actions from outward replication did not work

  • [DBK-2592]

    • Fixed incorrect HA services switching when WAY4R has a big latency.

  • [DBK-2604]

    • Fixed issue when a High-Availability service returned to an active state at the secondary node after the node became unavailable.

  • [DBK-2624]

    • Use FORCE mode to set Online1 to available after upgrade in HA Switch.

    Updated Manuals: [ultimate_ha\ha_switch\HA_Switch_operation.pdf]

  • [I1601157925]/[DBK-1855]

    • Database changes are not prohibited in an unavailable node.

  • [I1603082607]/[CARDS-48089]

    • Fixing ignoring device status in Online nodes if it has been set in Backoffice in HA Switch

  • [I1612293501]/[CARDS-51620]

    • Incorrect PostingStatus values are no longer assigned to documents moved from a secondary HA node when deferred processing takes these records in a different order than the original one.

  • [CARDS-39148]

    • Exception Request List: Supported High Availability mode.

    Host card emulation

  • [CARDS-50533]

    • Fixed problem with HCE token enrollment event generation.

  • [CARDS-47076]

    • Transaction Processing: Added TOKEN attribute, added Group Transaction Conditions <<All Token Initiated (Group)>> with G_TOKEN code and "TOKEN" formula and <<All HCE (Group)>> with G_HCE code and "TOKEN and REMOTE_CHIP" formula.

    Host2Host interface

  • [I307169689]/[CARDS-36311]

    • UFX Documents Export: Added pipe parameter FETCH_SIZE for source select.

    Updated Manuals: [core_banking_interface\core_banking_interface\user_manuals\CBS_Interface_UFX.pdf]

  • [CARDS-48008]

    • UFX Documents Import: APPLY_ARN pipe parameter processing.

  • [CARDS-48158]

    • If acquirer parameters are not found by member ID, a search is made for default acquirer parameters by the "default" member id.

    Updated Manuals: [acquiring\user_manuals\Acquiring_Module.pdf]

  • [CARDS-48188]

    • Affiliated BII Inward:Fixed invalid "DEV" tag filling.

  • [CARDS-49232]

    • Affiliated BaseII Outward: 16-byte length Transaction Identifier processing.

  • [CARDS-51586]

    • IRouter: Removed unnecessary incorrect PIN tries processing in routing contract.

  • [I1509142952]/[CARDS-51531]

    • IC Documents Export, IC Documents Import. The "EXCLUDE_TAGS" parameter has been added to IC Documents Export, IC Documents Import pipes, making it possible to exclude export/import of the specified tags from/to doc.add_info.

  • [I1612082027]/[CARDS-51341]

    • Affiliated BII Inward: fixed fallback detection for several types of POS Terminal Capabilities.

  • [I1612096107]/[CARDS-52844]

    • IC Document Export: fixed "An invalid XML character (Unicode: 0x1a) was found" error when exporting a document containing special characters. Invalid symbols are replaced with the "?" character in an outgoing file.

  • [I1612151492]/[CARDS-51420]

    • Fixed "CHIP_TRANS ::ERROR: Wrong Data Detected" error when exporting chip NSPK transactions using the "Affiliated BII Outward Processing" pipe.

  • [I1704246960]/[CARDS-54064]

    • Affiliated BASEII Outward Processing (pipe) : Fixed "Illegal BaseII message length" error when exporting transaction with incomplete "AI" addendum.

  • [I1705264283]/[CARDS-53576]

    • IC Documents Import (pipe): removed incorrect check of DocRefSet/DRN element length.

  • [CARDS-47723]

    • Supported NSPK Transaction ID for Affiliated BII format.

  • [CARDS-49060]

    • H2H Affiliated BASE II: supported new tags required for NSPK.

  • [CARDS-49061]

    • NSPK Inward, Affiliated BII interface: supported NSPK MIR Loyalty messages.

  • [CARDS-49804]

    • When Money transfer for not ONUS cards occurs in H2H Money transfer specific tags for clearing are taken from BERTLV-buffer.

  • [CARDS-54129]

    • IRouter stored procedures: Added ownership property for NextChannel in ON_US_CH tag of NextAddData parameter. Values are Own(Y)/Affiliated(A)/Foreign(N).

    Housekeeping

  • [DBK-1797]

    • Housekeeping created a large number of extra sections for si_log_src and si_log_dst at the end of the year.

  • [DBK-1840]

    • Housekeeping could not run in a secondary node with parallel threads.

  • [DBK-1915]

    • Unable to create custom parameters for drop/create partitions.

  • [DBK-1957]

    • Disabling a HSK rule for a particular node did not take effect

  • [DBK-2026]

    • HSK multithread execute failed on HSK.EXPIRED.SAVE.APPL_ACNT

  • [I1601263775]/[CARDS-48702]

    • Outward Status for additional Card Production data in card_info_p table has been corrected to housekeeping processing

    Instalment management

  • [CARDS-47936]

    • Instalment plans for a transaction can be simulated on demand.

    Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

  • [CARDS-48312]

    • Fixed amount of fee for each instalment plan portion can be configured.

    Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

  • [CARDS-47100]

    • The Instalment Shift period now can be limited by a minimum and maximum length in an Instalment Scheme

    Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

  • [CARDS-47337]

    • INVOICE_CODE tag no longer needed in account template for instalment creation.

    Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

  • [CARDS-47411]

    • Instalment configuration metadata corrected for proper Copy Configuration support.

  • [CARDS-47692]

    • Instalment interest can be calculated up to the due date. To enable this mode, set the INST_INTEREST_TO_DUE global parameter to "Y".

    Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf] [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

  • [CARDS-47900]

    • Both automatic and manual early repayment of an instalment can now be forbidden for plans created in different Instalment Schemes.

    Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

  • [CARDS-48088]

    • Simulated instalment plans now can be viewed using the "Simulated" link in Instalment Contract Data.

    Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

  • [CARDS-48175]

    • Now when a financial document is processed, an instalment plan can be created as a copy of an existing plan simulated for an authorisation request.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf] [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

  • [CARDS-48309]

    • Added procedures for packing and unpacking instalment-specific BERTLV tags into corresponding document tags.

  • [CARDS-48401]

    • Instalment Limits supported for template tariff domains.

    Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf] [tariff_management\Tariff_Management.pdf]

  • [CARDS-48500]

    • Instalment plans can be closed by an Event.

    Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf] [tags description] [product_management\Events.pdf]

  • [CARDS-48523]

    • The INST_IRATE document tag may now be used together with the INST_FRATE, INST_FTOTAL, PORT_FRATE, and PORT_FTOTAL tags to redefine instalment fee configuration.

    Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

  • [CARDS-48525]

    • Instalment payment holidays behaviour has changed. All unpaid principal is now shifted after payment holidays, even that which is open and overdue.

    Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

  • [CARDS-48570]

    • It is now possible to specify Shift Plan and Free Period when creating an Instalment Plan from a transaction or balance.

    Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

  • [CARDS-48643]

    • Special Auxiliary invoices can be created under instalment plan portions for fee capitalisation during the plan shift period.

    Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

  • [CARDS-48653]

    • New "Shift Fee Charge Mode" values for an instalment scheme have been added to capitalise fees calculated for a shift period into the Principal: "Capitalize Fees Every Month" and "Capitalize Fees on First Portion". These modes define the frequency of capitalisation.

    Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

  • [CARDS-48737]

    • Instalment simulation mode can be specified with the INST_SIM_MODE tag in a document's add_info field.

    Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

  • [CARDS-48823]

    • Recalculation of an instalment plan on its activation during financial document processing is supported.

    Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

  • [CARDS-49098]

    • Instalment Rate/Interest Fee values passed as document tags and used for instalment fee calculation are now saved to an instalment plan's fee subtotal (invoice_log.posting_details).

  • [CARDS-49103]

    • When using Shift Fee Charge Mode=Capitalize Fees Every Month / Capitalize Fees on First Portion, an additional check is made that the sum of fee invoices does not exceed the total pre-calculated amount of the fee.

  • [CARDS-49218]

    • Fee rate and calculation scheme used for instalment creation is shown in an instalment plan's "Subtotals" form.

    Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

  • [CARDS-49393]

    • Early Repayment for instalment plans with Shift Fee Charge Mode=Capitalize Fees Every Month / Capitalize Fees on First Portion is supported.

  • [CARDS-49600]

    • Way4 now supports the ability to create an instalment plan after the adjustment of the original document is posted on the amount of the advice macrotransaction of the received adjustment. To enable this feature set the INST_CREATE_ON_ADJUSTMENT=Y global parameter or tag in the "Special Parms" field of the financial institution's details.

    Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

  • [CARDS-49906]

    • Instalment Tariffs with the Instalment Fee and Instalment Scheme roles now can be configured to check document tags and additional properties. This makes it possible to specify "If Preference Type" for an Instalment Fee tariff, for example.

  • [CARDS-50226]

    • An Instalment Option can be configured and chosen when creating an instalment plan. Depending on the selected option, a tariff value can be used for the plan.

  • [CARDS-50444]

    • New custom procedure CUST_INSTL_FEE_DOC added. It allows to add some tags into document using instalment parameters for correct search of instalment fee tariffs.

  • [CARDS-51271]

    • Installments behavior changed. Installments with extra fee are added into the principal amount . An Additional fee capitalization invoice will be created to reflect the fee amount calculated and create the proper funds transfers.

    Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

  • [CARDS-51375]

    • The ability to set a temporary Instalment limit added. A limit may be set for a time period, after which it will be set to zero or to the current value used, depending on the limit's configuration.

    Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

  • [CARDS-53683]

    • Using the CUST_INSTL_FEE_DOC procedure, instalment plan portion amount, tenor, and fee rates can be customized using standard instalment tags.

  • [CARDS-53684]

    • Instalment plan recalculation is now automatically called when contract Billing Date or Due Date is changed.

  • [CARDS-46733]

    • Fixed Oracle error on checking instalment scheme availability in scheme selection form.

  • [CARDS-46815]

    • Fixed Total Plan Count calculation, Inactive plans are now included in calculation.

    Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

  • [CARDS-46981]

    • Fixed first portion fee calculation for instalments with an interest 360 fee calculation scheme.

    Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

  • [CARDS-47008]

    • Fixed billing cycle end date computation for future cycles when the billing cycle length is equal to one day.

  • [CARDS-47139]

    • Fixed shifting of the posting and local dates of macrotransactions to the previous day during Instalment creation. Now the INVOICE_POST_DUE global parameter is applied only if invoice status is changed during CDU and not on conversion of the transaction into an Instalment in the middle of the day.

  • [CARDS-48077]

    • Instalment Limits with the "Counter" type no longer depend on currency.

    Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

  • [CARDS-48471]

    • Early repayment of an instalment plan with a flat fee no longer changes the fee amount. On full repayment, the full fee amount is taken. On partial repayment, an advance fee is not taken, the new plan preserves the fee amount from the original plan.

  • [CARDS-48476]

    • Fixed early repayment of an instalment in the full amount of the principal before the first portion opens with a postponed fee.

  • [CARDS-48536]

    • Restored the ability to create instalments by normalization orders.

  • [CARDS-48573]

    • Fixed processing of Instalment Limits recalculation in the correction process initiated by Reversal Management when several Instalment Limits changed on the same day.

  • [CARDS-48608]

    • Fixed contract domain check for instalment secondary actions.

  • [CARDS-48905]

    • Fixed calculation of non interest-based fees for secondary instalment plans: fees are calculated using the original transaction amount and parameters received in the original document; an advance fee is taken only upon Full Early Repayment.

    Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

  • [CARDS-49472]

    • New fee calculation parameters for Instalment Schemes are now used when performing the "Change Instalment Terms" operation.

    Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

  • [CARDS-49648]

    • Fixed instalment limits check error in the "Payment Holidays" action causing failure in creation of a new plan.

  • [CARDS-49759]

    • Fee Capitalized into principal changes the Unpaid Principal amount limit upon the capitalization when corresponding invoice event changes it's status from "Written-off".

    Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

  • [CARDS-49785]

    • Fixed instalment advance fee calculation in secondary actions when there are several fees for the instalment plan.

  • [CARDS-50019]

    • Custom fees excluded from standard summary rate (INST_INF_RATE tag in invoice_log.posting_details) calculation.

  • [CARDS-50513]

    • Fixed instalment plan creation when Monthly Interest = Next Working Day in the Instalment Scheme.

    Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

  • [CARDS-50738]

    • Interest for the first portion of an instalment plan is always calculated for the entire period, not on a daily basis if the USE_MONTH_WEIGHT global parameter or tag in the Accounting Scheme is set to "B". A new value, "W", is supported for the INST_ADV_FEE_OPEN global parameter. This value can be used to waive an "Advance Fee" for early repayment or other actions that cause plan recalculation.

    Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

  • [CARDS-51005]

    • Fixed activation of an instalment plan with recalculation if custom fee parameters are used.

  • [CARDS-51040]

    • INST_INF_RATE tag format has been fixed. The new format has two decimal digits and no decimal point.

  • [CARDS-51965]

    • Instalment fee code is now taken from an Instalment Scheme even if the fee rate is passed in document tags. Previous system behaviour was to use "FEE" as a fee code value regardless of Instalment Scheme settings.

    Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

  • [CARDS-52133]

    • Instalment Event = "Plan Closed", according to which an Instalment Event Fee is charged is no longer generated when an instalment plan in preview or inactive status is closed.

  • [CARDS-52361]

    • Corrected information portion status in an instalment plan after "Change Instalment Terms".

  • [CARDS-52686]

    • Fixed changing of the "Is Ready" contract attribute when performing manual instalment actions using DB Manager.

    Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

  • [CARDS-53113]

    • Fixed parsing of E2.E1 BERTLV tag containing instalment interest rate.

  • [CARDS-53394]

    • Filtering out of recalculated entries added on instalment creation.

  • [CARDS-53733]

    • When converting a transaction from a previous cycle into an Instalment, transfers are generated as separate documents, not as macrotransactions for the original document.

  • [CARDS-53918]

    • Original document tags are now not skipped on instalment plan recalculation.

  • [CARDS-53919]

    • It is not recommended to use the same fee type for Instalment Event Fees and other Misc Fees as this may affect reversal processing.

    Updated Manuals: [instalment_management\WAY4_Instalments.pdf]

  • [CARDS-53983]

    • Instalment Payment holidays portion amount calculation has been corrected for the "Keep Tenor" option.

    Invoice management

  • [CARDS-46699]

    • Invoices amounts can be shown with High Precision.

  • [CARDS-47273]

    • A new global parameter, DO_NOT_SCAN_INVOICES, has been added. This parameter regulates the scanning of invoices on CDU.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf]

  • [CARDS-47566]

    • Additional information is now available for invoices in fleet configurations. Customization of invoice properties is extended.

  • [I1510262910]/[CARDS-48982]

    • Added the ability to inherit tags on invoice payment resend. The tags to inherit should be listed in the RESEND_PAYM_INHERIT_TAGS global parameter.

  • [CARDS-51201]

    • Fixed standing order generation for invoice payment reject actions.

  • [CARDS-51647]

    • Overdue substate restore procedure has been fixed for invoice payment reject.

  • [I1602126901]/[CARDS-47795]

    • If an Adjustment document does not reject invoices or instalments that were previously made by a document and results in normalizations that must update invoices, these normalizations are not ignored and invoices are updated.

  • [I1606027788]/[CARDS-49471]

    • Fixed processing of reversal batch entries in a batch invoice if they belong to a different cycle with an advice entry.

  • [I1608165474]/[CARDS-50110]

    • Fixed suspending batch invoice generation if any of the batch documents was declined

    Issuing

  • [CARDS-47385]

    • Added support of card's contracts with nonunique contract_number field values on authentication server.

  • [CARDS-48000]

    • Added processing of new tag SEQV_N_MASK. The tag should be entered into contr_subtype.add_parms if needed. If the tag exists then Card Sequence Number for new plastics will correspond the Oracle's condition "CSN like <TagValue>". F.e., "SEQV_N_MASK=9_;" should be using to MIR(NSPK) cards.

  • [CARDS-50455]

    • Data in the "Installment" block of the "Cardholder Contract Statement" report can now be sorted.

  • [CARDS-52305]

    • The internal procedure for creating a duplicate contract no longer "forces" approval of the contract if it was duplicated because it is linked with another contract, for example, in the case of combo-cards.

  • [CARDS-47313]

    • Card production response loading for "PIN Reissuing" tasks has been fixed for chip cards without offline PIN validation feature

  • [CARDS-47345]

    • XLS_MC_Statistics_Issuing_Business.rdf: "Accounts at beginning of quarter", "New accounts obtained during the quarter" and "Accounts lost during quarter" fields in the Accounts and Cards section have been corrected.

  • [CARDS-47352]

    • Fixed procedure of unmarking card for production for Cards with applets without contract.

  • [CARDS-47987]

    • XLS_MC_Statistics_Issuing_Business.rdf, XLS_Visa_Statistics_Issuing_Business.rdf reports: The P_MIRROR_OVD parameter has been added to the Delinquent Outstanding section.

    Updated Manuals: [MasterCard_statistical_reports\Quarterly_MasterCard_Reporting\MC_Statistical_Reports.pdf] [visa_statistical_reports\quarterly_operating_certificates\VISA_Statistical_Reports.pdf]

  • [CARDS-48466]

    • Fixed incorrect filling of "Off-Line PIN" plastic property on Reorder/Reprint PIN production events

  • [CARDS-49694]

    • Aligned blocks of text in the "Corrections" section for the "Cardholder Contract Statement" report.

  • [CARDS-49814]

    • In the form "OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Contract Types\Plastic Codes" added the new columns"Offline PIN (fill only for Chip cards)" and "Contactless (fill only for Chip cards)". In the menu "OpenWay\Full\Statistics\Dictionaries\Statistic Attributes (custom)" added the new attribute "PS_IS_COMBINED".

    Updated Manuals: [data_preparation_and_card_personalisation\administrator_manuals\Card_Production_Setup.pdf]

  • [CARDS-49955]

    • Fixed incorrect value for STND_LENGTH additional card data record after marking card for reissuing.

  • [CARDS-50609]

    • Fixed incorrect inheritance of PIN_SET tag's value when card reissuing with ERASE_SEC_VAL mode.

  • [CARDS-51235]

    • Fixed incorrect ability to mark an additional card applet for production without the main one.

  • [CARDS-52848]

    • Fixed use of P_IS_IMPERSONAL parameter for the XLS_NSPK_Statistics_Issuing_Business_Prepared report.

  • [I1510160987]/[CARDS-46213]

    • Fixed validation of the length of a cardholder's embossed company name and length of the full name of the cardholder including the salutation.

  • [I1510212474]/[CARDS-46311]

    • Entering CLEAR_PIN_ATTEMPTS; tag in Add Prod Parms no more lead to generation CLEAR_PIN_ATT event for card contract

  • [I1512040808]/[CARDS-47662]

    • Fixed incorrect validation of usage limiter template currency in service package approve procedure

  • [I1605040820]/[CARDS-48701]

    • Fixed ability to generate the same value of authorisation code for different requests by the same contract received at the same time.

  • [I1609214123]/[CARDS-50964]

    • The Move Contract procedure has been fixed when a new parent Account Scheme is the same as the old one (for example, when the same Account Scheme is used both for cards that have not yet been assigned and for assigned cards).

  • [I1611018583]/[CARDS-51391]

    • Fixed incorrect usage limiter redefinition processing which lead to Oracle exception when all previously made redefinitions was already terminated.

  • [I1704204444]/[CARDS-52880]

    • Fixed definition of IPS Product for MasterCard subtypes.

  • [CARDS-52786]

    • "PA DSS Implementation Guide" has been updated. The section "Specifying Sensitive Data" has been changed. Added a warning that the system cannot function normally without the PVV and Encrypted PIN fields.

  • [CARDS-51360]

    • Pan reference identifier, Token reference identifier and Token requestor identifier have been added as document and authentication scheme tags.

  • [CARDS-52167]

    • Consumer's Activation Method Preference for MDES transactions has been added to doc.add_info.

    Issuing authorisation

  • [CARDS-47796]

    • Added support of PVV updates for MasterCard in PIN change and PIN set transactions and plastic reissuing.

  • [CARDS-47938]

    • Added ability to disable of reading of configuration of returning on authorisation responces balances from additional packages for performance increasing. Please, see documentation for details.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf] [tags description] [product_management\Service_Packages.pdf]

  • [CARDS-47978]

    • Added support of some chip cards property when contactless transaction data does not contain of executed issuer script command couner

  • [CARDS-48628]

    • Added Instalment data filling for sending to POS in authorization response

  • [CARDS-48665]

    • Special activation method value for activation method "By phone" in TAR-response for MDES(VDEP) transactions has been realized. Constant written in address record as phone number will be used as an answer without masking if it contains alphanumeric symbols. AUTH_TOKEN_ADDR_TYPE global parameter contains the type of address record.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf]

  • [CARDS-49055]

    • Bertlv tag processing of MDES data has been added.

  • [CARDS-49121]

    • 3DS TD package now has support for distributed edition of Cards.

  • [CARDS-50712]

    • Unique and opaque identifier for VDEP verification method has been added

  • [CARDS-50816]

    • The additional global parameter CHIP_ATC_DEFERRED=ENABLE may be used to enable chip deferred authorisation request processing.

  • [CARDS-52020]

    • Tokenization activation code stored under a document has been masked.

  • [CARDS-52106]

    • Added the ability to fill doc.acq_ref_number in online message processing,

  • [CARDS-52194]

    • Added support for external management of transaction value date by sending the Posting Date parameter in IssFundsTransfer, IssPaymentFromContract, IssPaymentToContract web services when working in SMS mode. Requires the appropriate version of W4W.

  • [CARDS-52215]

    • Data from field 112 have been parsed on Purchase token operation.

  • [CARDS-52484]

    • Added ability to permit no more than the specified number of transactions with certain conditions. See documentation for details.

  • [CARDS-53977]

    • If a successful authorization advice is received after a reversal, a new hold will be made on contract funds.

  • [I1512245244]/[CARDS-48356]

    • Logging of analyse of cell based usage limiters has been changed. Available amount and available number for the logging taken form current cell now.

  • [I1603110989]/[CARDS-48272]

    • The procedure to select plastic for issuing authorisation has been corrected to improve processing of messages without a card expiration date. Previously, when such a message was received for a card after plastic reissuing the message would be rejected without a reason.

  • [I1612121917]/[CARDS-51820]

    • "No Check" Auth scenario has been removed from forms as obsolete. The additional global parameter ENABLE_NO_CHECK is no longer supported.

    Updated Manuals: [core\Global_Parameters.pdf] [product_management\Products_and_Subtypes.pdf]

  • [CARDS-46214]

    • Fixed incorrect processing of authorisation request for partial approval when a card's available amount is equal to zero.

  • [CARDS-46262]

    • Fixed incorrect reversal of fee document which was created by a usage limiter for non-transaction operations (Change PIN, Balance Inquire etc.) in the Clear Old Pendings process.

  • [CARDS-46539]

    • OFFLINE_PIN_UNBLOCK processing analyses incorrect PIN counter the same as for the other operations.

  • [CARDS-46697]

    • Fixed wrong card selection for PIN_SHANGE

  • [CARDS-46784]

    • Contract_subtype.add_parms field must contains tag USE_AID; to activate find card_info record with EMV_AID condition

  • [CARDS-46807]

    • Fixed incorrect STIP when SAF is not empty on IRouter service

  • [CARDS-46809]

    • Fixed incorrect usage limiter processing on IRouter service

  • [CARDS-46843]

    • Fixed incorrect processing of authorisation rejection when it happens after Core Banking response received.

  • [CARDS-46917]

    • Fixed incorrect processing of CHANGE_PIN on Irouter.

  • [CARDS-46918]

    • Fixed incorrect processing requests by IRouter when security value(s) validates in core banking system.

  • [CARDS-46938]

    • Added the ability to extend the list of security values in "not first" phases of message processing on IRouter.

  • [CARDS-46953]

    • Supported the ability to update transaction attributes not only in the first processing phase.

  • [CARDS-47461]

    • Workflow for incomplete validation of security values on IRouter has been corrected.

  • [CARDS-48396]

    • Fixed incorrect authorisation code generation for standing order based transactions

  • [CARDS-49013]

    • Fixed the behaviour of adjustments with sec trans_conditions attributes. For transaction usage limiters, trans_conditions are taken from the primary transaction. For operation usage limiters, trans_conditions attributes are not inherited from the primary transaction.

  • [CARDS-49780]

    • Fixed incorrect processing of "non-zero" approval response codes on IRouter for transit authorisation request responses.

  • [CARDS-49926]

    • Eliminated clear PANs in process_mess in debug mode.

  • [CARDS-50573]

    • Multiple authorisations matching (with PS_REF_NUMBER) has been fixed.

  • [CARDS-50580]

    • When an attempt to create or change token information is made in Stand-In mode, the error "Tokenization is not available in stand-in mode" occurs.

  • [CARDS-50681]

    • Fixed incorrect checking of card expiration date for linked contract requests when plastic is locked

  • [CARDS-50850]

    • The VDEP_TYPE tag to define the identification type for VDEP has been supported for Financial Institutions, Services and Contract Subtypes.

  • [CARDS-50974]

    • VISA Interface: supported TCR5 pos 150 PAN Token field. It is stored/exported from "D_TKN" tag.

  • [CARDS-51435]

    • Fixed incorrect "PIN change" processing on TS IRouter when request to an external system is required.

  • [CARDS-51774]

    • Error in formatting activation methods in TKN_VERIFICATION messages has been fixed.

  • [CARDS-51930]

    • Error in TKN_VERIFICATION method has been fixed.

  • [CARDS-51941]

    • Error in BERTLV data format in retail MDES transactions has been fixed.

  • [CARDS-52074]

    • Fixed incorrect inheritance of the return code from an original document when a repeat message is received.

  • [CARDS-52142]

    • Error using three delimiters ('|') instead of two when answering TAR messages during MDES transactions has been fixed.

  • [CARDS-52547]

    • IRouter: Fixed incorrect selection of message code for Core banking system.

  • [CARDS-53221]

    • Decreased possibility of deadlock when several authorization requests for one card are received at the same time.

  • [CARDS-53291]

    • Fixed the inability to redefine the PARTIAL_APPROVAL_ENABLE property in Services or transaction subtypes.

  • [CARDS-53434]

    • IPS STIP negative advice message creates a reversal document when it is received after posting an original request which was received in single-message mode.

  • [I1509248021]/[CARDS-46375]

    • Fixed incorrect processing of additional criteria for usage limiters (i.e. by document tags) when the limiter threshold was overridden for the contract.

  • [I1510160835]/[CARDS-47226]

    • Corrected calculation of closing date for holds with inactive statuses.

  • [I1511167076]/[CARDS-46795]

    • Fixed "division by zero" error when usage limiters are setup incorrectly.

  • [I1512245244]/[CARDS-47371]

    • Added a trace message for cases when available resources are absent in a usage limiter cell for correction of usage limiter counters.

  • [I1603164269]/[CARDS-48094]

    • Special symbol has been deleted from code.

  • [I1604044398]/[CARDS-48359]

    • Check additional service pack activity by default has been fixed (workaround for Oracle RESULT_CACHE bug).

  • [I1604117605]/[CARDS-48421]

    • Fixed inconsistent processing of authorisation requests with tag CARD_ABSENT=M;

  • [I1604120846]/[CARDS-48432]

    • Fixed wrong message for manually initiated EMV issuer script generation

  • [I1604194090]/[CARDS-48761]

    • Condition to create the error message "094-Duplicate reversal" has been corrected

  • [I1604209420]/[CARDS-49064]

    • Menu Item "OpenWay\Full\Daily Procedures\Document Processing Step by Step\Clear Old Pendings" has been redesigned to improve performance

  • [I1605090243]/[CARDS-48914]

    • Fixed incorrect suppression of sending credit authorization reversals to the core banking system.

  • [I1605201553]/[CARDS-49598]

    • Added check for request category of PIN-based message to disable unlocking plastic by secondary operation.

  • [I1606039198]/[CARDS-49213]

    • Now credit authorisations with an amount less than 1 minimum currency unit for an account will be rejected.

  • [I1607219702]/[CARDS-49729]

    • Authorisation code generation algorithm has been corrected to supply of it's uniqueness when standing order on Bank's contract is using.

  • [I1701111004]/[CARDS-51791]

    • Corrected processing of repeat messages for partial approved requests.

  • [I1701270697]/[CARDS-52291]

    • Fixed incorrect currency conversion rate use in issuer authorization after return from Stand-in.

  • [I1704243534]/[CARDS-52916]

    • Fixed "No Data Found" error during authorization processing if contr_subtype.bin_record is invalid.

  • [CARDS-50457]

    • Correct notice of refusal has been supported when maximum possible (i.e.five) TAR MDES requests with wrong CVC2 occur.

  • [CARDS-51933]

    • Product Configuration ID can also be configured as contract subtype MDES_ISS_ID tag.

  • [CARDS-52080]

    • The TAR response code for VISA authorizations has been changed from 5 to the real response code of the transaction.

  • [CARDS-52104]

    • VDEP Active account management velocity checking result and Device identifier tags have been added to document.

  • [CARDS-52166]

    • Tokenization correlation identifier and device type for MDES transactions have been added to doc.add_info.

  • [CARDS-52180]

    • Primary account number source and Device type fields have been added under authentication scheme.

  • [CARDS-52198]

    • Final tokenization decision tag has been added to TNK_ACTIVATION message.

    JCB interface

  • [CARDS-45948]

    • JCB: Added functionality for export transactions in JCB BIG Variable format.

  • [CARDS-45950]

    • JCB: Added functionality for import transactions in JCB BIG Variable format

  • [CARDS-45951]

    • JCB: Added functionality for importing rejects in JCB BIG Variable format.

  • [CARDS-45953]

    • JCB Merchant Export: New 850 format is now supported. To export merchant data in new "850 bytes" format new "FILE_FORMAT"="850" parameter must be set for the "JCB Merchants Export" pipe.

  • [CARDS-49455]

    • Merchant Management: Fixed processing of operations that were not completed.

  • [CARDS-49561]

    • JCB Merchant Approve: truncate Legal and Trading names if they exceed the allowable length.

  • [CARDS-50304]

    • JCB BIN Table Import: fixed record processing for Maintenance file with OperationSign=01 (Add record).

  • [CARDS-50400]

    • Merchant Management: No data found error for next action after incomplete previous initial action.

  • [CARDS-51131]

    • JCB ISO Outward: fixed "Strange situation" error.

  • [CARDS-51165]

    • JCB ISO Outward Processing: fixed NPE when exporting chargeback.

  • [CARDS-51178]

    • JCS ISO Inward: fixed calculating fee amount sign for settlement documents.

  • [CARDS-51196]

    • JCB ISO Interface: fixed "Unknown message type" for Chargeback Reversals processing.

  • [CARDS-51238]

    • JCB ISO Outward - fixed "Unknown message type" error when exporting Partial 2nd Presentment.

  • [CARDS-51579]

    • JCB Variable Outward: fixed ARN field 31 subfield 2 filling. Now it matches PDE3901.2. Removed DE14 filling for non ICC transactions.

  • [CARDS-52320]

    • JCB ISO Inward Processing (pipe): fixed incorrect creation of settlement documents with zero amount.

  • [CARDS-52365]

    • JCB ISO Inward Processing (pipe) : fixed rejected Interchange Message processing.

  • [CARDS-53216]

    • JCB ISO Inward Processing (pipe): fixed "Settlement Data doesn't contain settlement amounts" error.

  • [CARDS-53558]

    • JCB ISO Inward Processing (pipe) : fixed filling of "transaction date" field for incoming S2 documents.

  • [CARDS-53579]

    • JCB Outward Processing.dll (pipe) : fixed size of letters for filling "Merchant Name" and "City Name" fields.

  • [CARDS-45952]

    • JCB Inward: added settlement processing.

  • [CARDS-45955]

    • JCB Stoplist Import: new format supported (PAN up to 21 digits). No manual action required.

  • [CARDS-49716]

    • JCB: Added functionality for loading JCB BIN Table.

    Updated Manuals: [jcb_interface\JCB_Interface.pdf]

  • [CARDS-51140]

    • JCB ISO Inward: added support for incoming files without RDW. To import such files, the "NORDW"="Y" pipe parameter must be set.

  • [CARDS-51280]

    • JCB: Added requirements for JCB ISO.

  • [CARDS-51481]

    • JCB ISO Outward (variable): added the "EXT_CURR_EXP" parameter for changing the currency exponent on transaction export.

  • [CARDS-52210]

    • JCB Rel Apr 17: supported IIN file format changes.

  • [CARDS-52399]

    • JCB ISO Outward Processing (pipe): improved DE4 and DE49 function for dispute transactions. If a document's reconciliation currency does not match the 1st presentment currency, the document's transaction amount/currency will be exported instead.

  • [CARDS-52832]

    • Added the FILTER parameter (pipe:JCB. Outward Processing.cpp).

  • [CARDS-53268]

    • JCB Outward: for all chip read transactions the "C" value is exported in 22.7 subfield.

  • [CARDS-53336]

    • JCB: Added message codes ("RjP-----","RJP-----","RmP-----","RmR-----") for reject processing.

  • [CARDS-53379]

    • JCB ISO. Added the "OWS.Accept Clearing" subitem to the menu item "OpenWay\JCB\JCB. Daily Procedures\JCB. Inward Processing\JCB ISO Inward Processing".

  • [CARDS-53510]

    • JCB Outward Processing, JCB ISO Outward processing (pipes): added the ability to set up start sequence numbers for outgoing file numbering. If needed, the new "START_FILE_SEQ" pipe parameter must be set with the desired number.

  • [CARDS-53771]

    • JCB ISO Inward (pipe): added the ability to charge a cardholder using Cardholder Billing Amount (BIT 6) instead of Reconciliation Amount (BIT 5). "ACP_<memberid>"="Y" new pipe parameter must be set to use this functionality for a specific member.

  • [CARDS-53853]

    • JCB: Added menu items "OpenWay\JCB\JCB. File Management\JCB Outward Rejected" and "OpenWay\JCB\JCB. File Management\JCB Rejects".

  • [CARDS-53926]

    • [JCB Release 17.2] BIT54 is inherited now in chargebacks. No additional action is required.

  • [I1606211754]/[CARDS-50027]

    • JCB: Added menu item OpenWay\JCB\JCB. Daily Procedures\JCB. Load Bin Table and Handbooks\JCB BIN Table Import.

  • [I1702212586]/[CARDS-52413]

    • JCB Interface fixed format (pipes): supported contactless PEM.

    Loyalty

  • [CARDS-51610]

    • Added the ability to limit the bonus points amount accrued for a client contract within a loyalty campaign. The limit amount should be set in the "Action Total Limit" field of the tariff action, the ACTION_LIMIT_MODE=LOCAL tag indicates that the action limit should be calculated for each contract. A new strict mode has been added to check the action limit, it prevents total points from exceeding the specified limit with the last transaction; ACTION_LIMIT_MODE=STRICT should be set for the tariff action.

  • [CARDS-50984]

    • Tariff action processing has been fixed. When applying a tariff action, two tariff data records are automatically created: one from the date the action starts and the second - from the date the action is finished.

  • [CARDS-51371]

    • Fixed action approval for loyalty actions with Action Total Limit specified.

    MasterCard interface

  • [CARDS-47315]

    • MPE Import: added filling of new column MPE_IP0072T1.IRD_DERIVATION_SERV_IND from MPE file.

  • [CARDS-48529]

    • MPE Import: Added check of whether Full MPE file contains all necessary tables.

  • [CARDS-49159]

    • The algorithm for calculating AMEX_MEMBER_ID, VISA_MEMBER_ID and MC_MEMBER_ID statistic attributes has been refactored. The BIN table's "Member ID" value is now used.

  • [CARDS-49245]

    • MasterCard IPM Inward: Supported loading installment data form PDS0181.

  • [I1406162997]/[CARDS-40816]

    • Supported reversing outgoing MC IPM files.

  • [I1510156268]/[CARDS-49236]

    • MasterCard IRD Calculation: Supported CutOff Time checking for Timeliness processing.

  • [I1604115588]/[CARDS-48793]

    • Either RPBA or PTID tags are used to determine Money Send transactions.

  • [I1606174351]/[CARDS-49202]

    • MasterCard Inward Processing. Optimized reject messages processing by moving functionality of I305169548 to Accept Clearing process.

  • [CARDS-40745]

    • MasterCard IRD Calculation: Supported ALM by the additional global parameter MC_CALC_IRD_ALM=Y.

  • [CARDS-42412]

    • In reports: MC_Inward_Monetary_Transactions.rdf, MDS_Notification.rdf, Mastercard_Notification.rdf, Monetary_Transactions.rdf, Unmatched_Trans_DiffAmounts.rdf, Unmatched_Trans_NotAuth.rdf, VISA Inward Monetary Transactions.rdf calculation of Reimbursement Fee for reversal is corrected - now fee amount are used with sign which depends on document request category.

  • [CARDS-43810]

    • MC BIN Table loading: fixed loss of some acquirer records.

  • [CARDS-44017]

    • IRD config autofilling: fixed IRD for Cash Disbursement for CPI=MCC,DMC.

  • [CARDS-44609]

    • IRD config autofilling: Fixed product_id filling to consider not only CONFIG PRD_TYPE but also MPE_IP0052T1.Product_Type_Id.

  • [CARDS-44687]

    • IRD config autofilling: ird_fee_desc amount restrictions are not reset now on IP0030T1 MPE Daily Update if ird_fee_desc record received these restrictions from CONFIG.

  • [CARDS-44868]

    • IRD config autofilling: changed "Possible error in MPE: no products for ..." message type from Warning to Debug.

  • [CARDS-46242]

    • MasterCard IPM Outward: Changed pipe parameter TRAILER_CHECKS default value to "N".

  • [CARDS-46277]

    • MPE Import: now all MPE_IP00XXT1 tables are loaded from an MPE file unconditionally; improved performance for big MPE Daily files.

    • IRD configuration has been modified. Restrictions by Service Code (1,5,7) have been added for IRD 88,84 for some EU countries.

  • [CARDS-49697]

    • IC Fraud import: Fixed fraud document processing when no authorisation with the found ID exists in the database.

  • [CARDS-49704]

    • There are two ways for implementing additional identification when TAR occurs. The first is to set the global parameter AUTH_REQ_ADD_AUTH_METHOD='1'. When the parameter is set and the special tag FORCE_AUTH in the Service is set to "Y", error code 85 is returned. When Primary Account Number Source method of PAN capture is manually entered by the cardholder or if it is a "card on file" from the wallet provider, error code 85 is returned.

    • In report "MasterCard Statistics Issuing Business" the sum conversion by parameter P_FX_RATE in "Delinquent Outstanding" section was fixed (same as in transactions section).

The default value has been changed for the P_CHAIN_TYPE_FILTER_1 - checks by group_channel are extended by analysis of card_brand for support of affiliated transactions - " trans.chain_type in ('U') and target.card_brand like 'E_%' ".

  • [CARDS-48493]

    • MasterCard Installment Payment Processing is supported in Acquiring.

  • [CARDS-48801]

    • MasterCard IPM Inward: Supported PDS0001 processing.

  • [CARDS-48805]

    • MasterCard Fee Prediction: Supported Europe Product Category Code (MPE table IP0016T1) processing. BIN Table must be reloaded.

  • [CARDS-49029]

    • XLS_MC_Statistics_Issuing_Business.rdf report has been enhanced pursuant to MasterCardQ2 2016 requirements: On-us/Domestic Interchange/International reporting breakout for "ATM Cash" and "Manual Cash" part has been removed. Only "Total ATM Cash" and "Total Manual Cash" is reported in the "Total Cash Advances" section. "Local Use Only" section has been removed from MasterCard forms. It can be now shown by setting the report parameter "P_HIDE_LOCAL_USE_CARDS" value to "N" (the default value is "Y"). New "Open" and "Blocked" reporting columns have been added for the "Accounts and Cards" section for the following lines: - Accounts at the beginning of the quarter. - Accounts at the end of the quarter. - Cards at the beginning of the quarter. - Cards at the end of the quarter. The following fields have been added to the "Accounts and Cards" section: - Cards at the beginning of the quarter. - New cards. - Cards with at least one transaction during the quarter.

    Updated Manuals: [MasterCard_statistical_reports\Quarterly_MasterCard_Reporting\MC_Statistical_Reports.pdf]

  • [CARDS-49192]

    • XLS_MC_Statistics_Acquiring_Business report has been updated: the Cirrus/Maestro section has been split into two sections.

    • IRD configuration has been changed for Manual Cash Disbursement.

  • [I1603017876]/[CARDS-48172]

    • CSOF tag filled in with Funding Source information in the Credit to MC P2P document according to MasterCard requirements. New P2P_CONF global parameter configuration tag CSOF_NO_DATA determines system behaviour if no Funding Source information is available. Valid values are: W - generate a Warning only, E - generate an Error and decline the transaction.

    Mobile banking

  • [CARDS-48659]

    • Fixed problem with adding client mobile number instead of updating the existing one.

  • [CARDS-53086]

    • The problem with empty invoice details in Mobile Banking has been resolved.

  • [CARDS-53004]

    • Mobile banking: a requirement for the value of the allow_multiple_user_sessions parameter has been added. The parameter must be set to "false" in accordance with PA-DSS.

  • [CARDS-53008]

    • Mobile banking: a requirement for the value of the debug_enabled parameter has been added. The parameter must be set to "false" in accordance with PA-DSS.

    Money transfers

  • [CARDS-47999]

    • New tag SENDER_AUTH has been added. The Y value will be set if correct sender data (Name-CPNA, Address-CPAD, City-CPCY, ClientCountry-CPCN, State-CPST(for USA, CAN), PostalCode-CPPC) are available.

  • [CARDS-48036]

    • MIR to not MIR Money transfer transactions are supported.

  • [CARDS-48276]

    • P2P Sender Data tags can be filled in in OnUs and Domestic transactions. To Activate this option use P2P_CONF parameter tag ONUS_CPNA=Y

  • [CARDS-49631]

    • CPNA, CPBD, CPCY, CPST, CPCN, CPAD, CPPC, UTRN tags are available for Visa domestic transfers.

  • [CARDS-50084]

    • RPNA_NO_DATA P2P configuration parameter default value has been changed to Error.

  • [I1512035347]/[CARDS-47254]

    • CPNA, CPBD, CPCY, CPST, CPCN, CPAD, CPPC, UTRN tags are available for Visa domestic transfers.

  • [I1603021458]/[CARDS-48580]

    • The CSOF tag can be filled in in a P2P credit document even if standard P2P is not used and the P2P_CONF global parameter is not defined. To switch on this feature, use the global parameter P2P_ATTRS=CSOF.

  • [CARDS-48945]

    • Fixed error in filling the CSOF tag for device host-to-host P2P operations.

  • [CARDS-49162]

    • State is optional if it is not used for corresponding country

  • [CARDS-49190]

    • Updated CPID, CSOF calculation algorithms according to IPS requirements

  • [CARDS-49204]

    • Fixed SenderName calculation algorithm

  • [CARDS-49335]

    • Expand CPRN tag value with leading zeros to be 16 char length.

  • [CARDS-49336]

    • CSOF tag is filled in for VISA transactions that are not USA.

  • [CARDS-49519]

    • Bin record search algorithm of CH Payment document processing for Debited card is fixed.

  • [CARDS-50806]

    • Updated warning message text.

  • [CARDS-51563]

    • Ability to change the CUP Channel name letter has been implemented.

  • [CARDS-53167]

    • P2P CSOF tag 06 value returned for Credit accounts and 05 value for Debit/deposit access accounts for money transfers to a VISA card from another IPS card according to VISA requirements.

  • [I1605241039]/[CARDS-49004]

    • CSOF tag made optional for P2P transactions with credit of OnUs card.

  • [I1609126520]/[CARDS-50263]

    • One of transaction participatns Sender or Recipient data can be omited in P2P acquiring request (in any bertlv or tags format). Another participant data will be selected from the database.

  • [I1609146279]/[CARDS-50459]

    • The field 'State" will not be filled in the BERTLV container prepared for the VISA channel if the State attribute is not applicable for the corresponding country.

  • [I1609146279]/[CARDS-50532]

    • Recipient and Sender bertlv container StreetAddress attribute length of up to 35 characters for the VISA channel. Added validation that the total length of FirstName and LastName does not exceed 30 characters. Numeric country code used for attributes in the bertlv container has been prepared for VISA.

  • [I1701163750]/[CARDS-51967]

    • BIN routing search has been changed for P2P transactions from cards to accounts.

  • [I1703076137]/[CARDS-52813]

    • C2C to affiliated channel license validation has been updated. Transactions will not be more declined by reason of C2C IPS licensies. Correct routing configuration is - corresponding BIN Group Channel should point to Affiliate channel and BIN Table channel should point to appropriate IPS.

  • [I1703201358]/[CARDS-52738]

    • If device_parms.device_location value is used as the source of the CPNA tag and the value consists of one word only, the tag value will be calculated as two device_parms.device_location values separated by a space character.

  • [I1706069710]/[CARDS-53514]

    • Money transfers Sender Data made optional for OnUs and Domestic transactions for CUP cards.

  • [CARDS-47593]

    • RPNA tag is filled in for International and Domestic MasterCard transactions.

  • [CARDS-48979]

    • According to the IPS requirements for Money Transfer bertlv E9 container generation is added to fill F112 of ISO message. CPID, CPRN calculation algorithms are arranged. P2P_EMPTY_NAME_SUBST global parameter added. This parameter defines constant value which will be used to fill in empty FirstName, LastName attributes of Sender in cases when these values should be filled in with 'Bank Name' value. If parameters is not defined 'UNKNOWN' constant value will be used.

  • [CARDS-49604]

    • Ability to save MoneyTransfer data received in F112 bertlv container to doc tags is implemented. To activate this feature add 'F112' key into P2P_ATTRS global parameter value.

  • [CARDS-51366]

    • P2P tags are filled in in the documents prepared for processing in the Affiliate H2H channels.

  • [I1512036021]/[CARDS-46885]

    • VISA OCT: All Original Credit Transaction (OCT) Business Applications Identifiers are supported on acquiring side in Device H2H. Configuration changes may be required for 'CH Payment' transaction subtype. Contact Support for details if you use OCT transaction with RPBA different from AA and PP.

  • [I1607113056]/[CARDS-49574]

    • Validation of Country, City, SenderName attributes added for Visa Domestic transactions. To activate this verification add P2P_VISA_VALIDATE_DOMESTIC=Y tag in special_parms field of Device Fin institution.

  • [I1612198860]/[CARDS-51583]

    • P2P data Validation rules required for the IPS channels will also be validated for the Affiliate channels if the card BIN group channel is defined as an IPS channel.

  • [CARDS-49993]

  • [CARDS-50045]

  • [CARDS-50128]

    • NSPK Inward: EMV Chip data error checks are skipped.

  • [CARDS-50315]

    • NSPK Inward Processing: Fixed doc.rec_member_id filling for Fee Collection.

  • [CARDS-50435]

    • NSPK Outward : fixed error during DE37 check (when is present) for collection only documents.

  • [CARDS-50590]

    • NSPK Inward Processing: fixed "Inward Invalid number format for PDS-0301" error for large numbers. Also, the "TRAILER_CHECKS" parameter for the NSPK Inward Processing pipe has been added to skip checking values from trailers.

  • [CARDS-50626]

    • NSPK Outward Processing: added a check for DE12 (must not be greater then PDS-0105.2 (file date)). Added the "FILE_REF_DATE" pipe parameter for file date (PDS-0105.2) filling, parameter values are "SYSTEM" (default value, system time is used) and "BANK" (bank date is used).

  • [CARDS-50765]

    • NSPK Outward: fixed the rollback procedure for NSPK Collection Only files, so it is possible to export these transactions again.

  • [CARDS-50799]

    • NSPK Outward - fixed filling PDS 0025.2 for reversals of presentments. The correct date is taken from the settlement data for the original transaction.

  • [CARDS-50939]

    • NSPK Outward Processing: fixed filling PDS0025.1 for Fee Collection Reversals.

  • [CARDS-50955]

    • Visa Affiliated BII Inward: added the ability to import the DEV tag (device description) allowing some fields (ie DE22 in NSPK protocol) to be exported more precisely.

  • [CARDS-51410]

    • Fixed "No or incorrect tag NSPK_TA" error when exporting a transit adjustment transaction to NSPK.

  • [CARDS-51434]

    • NSPK Outward ONUS: fixed PDS-0025.2 filling for reversals. A reversal will be exported only after receiving the appropriate [1644-685] (Financial Position) message for the original transaction.

  • [CARDS-51451]

    • NSPK Outward: added Member ID to error message when getting Member parameters.

  • [CARDS-51533]

    • NSPK SIOM Outward: fixed Oracle grants for Clerk role.

  • [CARDS-51572]

    • NSPK Outward Processing: fixed ARN recalculation for Adjustments, when an Adjustment has the same date as original transaction.

  • [CARDS-53334]

    • NSPK Processing (pipes): fixed incorrect processing for PDS-0176 and PDS-0190 for AMEX.

  • [CARDS-54071]

    • NSPK MPE Import (pipe): fixed filling country code for MIR, JCB, AMEX, UPI BIN table import.

  • [I1511181487]/[CARDS-47366]

    • Mastercard_Acknowledgement.rdf: Reject Items section corrected, now the report supports NSPK.

  • [I1602295599]/[CARDS-47904]

    • Visa Inward: improved currency rate accuracy when loading settlement documents.

  • [I1605304783]/[CARDS-49051]

    • NSPK Outward: fixed filling DE63 for Refunds.

  • [I1608058069]/[CARDS-49956]

    • NSPK Inward: fixed message code for NSPK Loyalty Settlement.

  • [I1608316382]/[CARDS-50493]

    • Fixed error "Doc was not uploaded (ONUS) Mandatory field 31 is absent". Fixed Internet transaction detection for collection only export. Changed ARN date (DE31.3) filling - now selected from file date and not from transaction date. Added processing of "MIR_NSPK_AID" tag in addition to "NSPK_AID" tag when searching the Member Id for affiliated collection only export.

  • [I1611018920]/[CARDS-50902]

    • NSPK Outward Processing: ARN date (DE31.3) is recalculated for credit transactions converted from adjustments.

  • [I1702174295]/[CARDS-52110]

    • NSPK Inward Processing pipe: fixed incorrect message code (S2IIF1X1, S2III1X1) generation.

  • [I1702270914]/[CARDS-52869]

    • NSPK Outward Processing (pipe): fixed export of last adjustment, which reverses transaction completely.

  • [I1705264583]/[CARDS-53495]

    • NSPK Outward Processing (pipe): fixed ARN calculating for multiple adjustments.

  • [I1706150009]/[CARDS-53865]

    • NSPK Processing (pipes) : fixed processing of PDS 2063.

    Updated Manuals: [UFX_H2H_Interchange.pdf (NDA Specification for vendors)]

  • [CARDS-49008]

  • [CARDS-49228]

  • [CARDS-49499]

  • [CARDS-49578]
