    • RA configuration and IC tariffs have been modified for Ireland according to VISA requirements published on 2 March 2017.

    WAY4 Web

  • [CARDS-52808]

    • In WAY4 Web added check of client privileges to access uploaded files and merchant tree contracts.

  • [DBK-2201]

    • Now audit log is active by default. To exclude set AUDIT_MODE='N' To include for particular group set AUDIT_MODE for this group

  • [CARDS-53009]

    • WAY4 Web: a requirement for the value of the EnableDeveloperInfo parameter has been added. The parameter must be set to "false" in accordance with PA-DSS.

  • [CARDS-53083]

    • Password complexity requirements can now be added as parameters for WAY4Web user authentication scheme.

    Web banking

  • [CARDS-43841]

    • OpenWay\Published Services\Published Subscriptions is extended by address type and the ability to set an event type or a classifier type for service enrolment and cancelation. For use in Web Banking services only.

  • [CARDS-47961]

    • New form OpenWay\Published Services\Global Parameters allows parameters needed for online applications to be configured.

  • [I1610123173]/[CARDS-50603]

    • Problem with recurring payments appearing in web banking multiple times has been resolved.

  • [CARDS-53176]

    • PA DSS Implementation Guide has been updated: Lifestyle Banking section has been updated (information about play.id and %padss.application.mode=prod has been added).

    Web services

  • [CARDS-51680]

    • New menu branches have been added: OpenWay\Web Services and OpenWay\Way4Web. The "WS Users & Grants" menu branch has been moved from OpenWay\System\DB Administrator Utilities to these new menu branches; the linked menu OpenWay\Full\DB Administrator Utilities\WS Users & Grants has been removed. For more details, see the section "Client Upgrade Notes on Impact changes".

    e-Commerce acquiring

  • [CARDS-49880]

    • Added API to create TD_DOC in case of unsuccessful authentication.

  • [CARDS-51111]

    • Transaction Processing: Luhn digit check condition.

  • [C1512294947]/[CARDS-47274]

    • Added processing "short" format of language data of cardholder browser for E-Commerce usage limiters on acquiring. Also, avoided exception, when received unknown country code.

    e-Commerce issuing

  • [CARDS-47725]

    • Fixed error which lead to ORA-06502 when received e-commerce merchant URL length was more than 255 characters

  • [CARDS-50800]

    • Fixed incorrect processing of usage limiters with special condition containing tags CHANGE_IP and CHANGE_COUNTRY.

    Changes Grouped by Releases

    Change types:

    • Added New Feature
    • Changed Feature
    • Fixed Bug
    • New Task
    • Sub-task
    • Support of Payment System Release Requirements
    • Backporting

    Cards

    • 03.43.30.93
      • CARDS-53683 [Instalment management] Using the CUST_INSTL_FEE_DOC procedure, instalment plan portion amount, tenor, and fee rates can be customized using standard instalment tags.
      • CARDS-53956 [Product management] Correct standing orders processing for terminal contracts with same Terminal ID in different financial institutions is supported. If this duplication exists in the client configuration, the global parameter ALLOW_DUPL_TERMINAL_ID should be set to "Y". In this case, standing order documents for device contracts will be filled with additional contract search attributes: Merchant ID, Member ID and Spc Scheme for source, Member ID and Spc Scheme for target.
      • CARDS-53977 [Issuing authorisation] If a successful authorization advice is received after a reversal, a new hold will be made on contract funds.
      • CARDS-53777 [UnionPay interface] Union Pay: Added the OUT_ST=Y; tag to the "CH Payment" and "CH Payment Rev" message types.
      • CARDS-54044 [Tariff management] Links for "GL", "Billing Sch", "Inst Fee", "Interest Tax", "Inst Sch" have been added to the Tariff Data Input Individual form.
      • CARDS-54071 [NSPK interface] NSPK MPE Import (pipe): fixed filling country code for MIR, JCB, AMEX, UPI BIN table import.
      • CARDS-54097 [Core] A new custom procedure, CUST_RECALC_BILLING has been added for custom actions after changing the billing date for the main contract.
      • CARDS-54116 [Reversal management] Backdated processing is now not launched for advice documents with current posting date if they are created in SMS mode.
      • CARDS-54126 [Tariff management] When approving a personal tariff, Tariff Start Date will be checked by the date of the contract's financial institution.
      • I1609287679 [Transaction management] [CARDS-54109] Extra errors when processing bridge transactions have been removed.
      • I1703235650 [Reversal management] [CARDS-53980] Corrected recalculation of due amounts on Intelligent Backdated Processing when REFRESH_DUE configuration is used.
      • I1704189347 [Core] [CARDS-52998] Document processing procedure behaviour, when a fee was charged twice in an issuing contract, has been fixed for financial documents that inherit the fee amount from an authorization document (the FROM_AUTH tag with the FEE_AMOUNT value is used in basic transaction service setup) and if the fee is configured as a Misc service with the tag "MTR_FEE;" and was triggered by a usage limiter on authorization document processing.
      • I1704246960 [Host2Host interface] [CARDS-54064] Affiliated BASEII Outward Processing (pipe) : Fixed "Illegal BaseII message length" error when exporting transaction with incomplete "AI" addendum.
      • I1705263934 [MasterCard interface] [CARDS-53784] IPM Inward Processing: fixed incorrect processing when DE43.2 contains incorrect symbols.
      • I1706133880 [Transaction management] [CARDS-54098] Now the posting process doesn't recalculate document parameters like ARN for rejected secondary documents that have been sent again.
      • I1706260734 [Core] [CARDS-54119] To consolidate positive and negative Due Amounts from several Due Items for an acquiring product's accounts, the REFRESH_DUE tag should be set in the corresponding account templates. This tag should not be used for templates involved in per-transaction Merchant Payment Statements. By default, Due Amounts are never consolidated into one Due Normalization for acquiring products.
      • CARDS-54003 [NSPK interface] [MIR REL] 2017.2 B-10 NSPK Clearing Interfaces (pipes): supported new cash-to-card transaction processing.
      • CARDS-54018 [NSPK interface] [MIR REL] 2017.2 K-12 : supported "B" value for PDS0165.1 field.
      • CARDS-54129 [Host2Host interface] IRouter stored procedures: Added ownership property for NextChannel in ON_US_CH tag of NextAddData parameter. Values are Own(Y)/Affiliated(A)/Foreign(N).
    • 03.43.30.92
      • CARDS-52828 [Customer/account management] A new parameter has been added to the "Cardholder_Contract_Statement" report: P_HIDE_FEE_CONDITION, varchar(4000). The default value is "1=2". The parameter only works if P_SHOW_CUSTOM_FEE=Y. Use the parameter to hide fee amounts (convert fee amount to zero) in the transactions section.
      • CARDS-53332 [Product management] Product Min/Max/Default credit limit amounts can be specified by threshold tariffs.
      • CARDS-53684 [Instalment management] Instalment plan recalculation is now automatically called when contract Billing Date or Due Date is changed.
      • CARDS-52680 [VISA interface] Added checking of the FILTER parameter for presence of the DOC table condition and checking the type of the first uploaded record. The results of the check are saved in the Process Log.
      • CARDS-53412 [Acquiring authorisation] Cause of "No data found" exception has been fixed.
      • CARDS-53556 [SEPA interface] SEPA Customer-To-Bank export: creditor address data is exported for SEPA Credit Transfer.
      • CARDS-53670 [Fleet cards] The discount calculation algorithm with the BEST_PRICE option has been updated. A new BEST_PRICE_USE_STELLA calculation mode has been added to allow selection of the best price: tariff price or pump price.
      • CARDS-53733 [Instalment management] When converting a transaction from a previous cycle into an Instalment, transfers are generated as separate documents, not as macrotransactions for the original document.
      • CARDS-53759 [MasterCard interface] The XLS_AMEX_Statistics_Issuing_Business and XLS_MC_Statistics_Issuing_Business reports now show account balances in the "Delinquent Outstanding" section at the end of the last reporting period day.
      • CARDS-53768 [UnionPay interface] UPI Fee Prediction. Fixed determination of processing code.
      • CARDS-53794 [Case management] It is no longer necessary to register the "Case Management" menu for the clerk user group to allow clerk users to perform an activity in "Dispute Assistant CM" and other Case Management operation screens.
      • CARDS-53805 [Core banking interface] The necessary privilege to execute CARDS_PIPES package procedures has been added for RBS. Payments Import pipe.
      • CARDS-53807 [VISA interface] XLS_MC_Statistics_Acquiring_Business and XLS_Visa_Statistics_Acquiring_Business reports include contracts with date_expire on first day of report period.
      • CARDS-53809 [Core] Use of the TOTAL_BAL_TYPE tag for prepaid cards has been changed. See Client Upgrade Notes.
      • CARDS-53866 [Reversal management] Intelligent backdated processing now supports instalment event fees recalculation during the correction process.
      • CARDS-53918 [Instalment management] Original document tags are now not skipped on instalment plan recalculation.
      • CARDS-53919 [Instalment management] It is not recommended to use the same fee type for Instalment Event Fees and other Misc Fees as this may affect reversal processing.
      • CARDS-53983 [Instalment management] Instalment Payment holidays portion amount calculation has been corrected for the "Keep Tenor" option.
      • CARDS-53994 [Product management] Validation of contract functional dates Late Payment Date (LP_DATE) and Full Payment Date (FP_DATE) has been enhanced for Set and Recalculate operations. The new value of these dates should be equal to or less than the contract's Next Billing Date + 1 day if the previous value met this condition. When Late Payment Date or Full Payment Date equals Next Billing Date + 1, it means that the LP event or FP event will proceed right before Billing.
      • CARDS-54015 [Reversal management] Account renumeration is skipped during reversal processing contract initialization.
      • I1705100654 [MasterCard interface] [CARDS-53824] IPM Inward Processing (pipe) added grant on select from vec_history.
      • I1705113768 [Core banking interface] [CARDS-53779] In the Core Banking System interface, Misc Fee data export for bank branches is supported in plain and UFX file formats.
      • I1705165707 [VISA interface] [CARDS-53868] VISA Inward Processing (pipe): fixed import of currency messages if scale factor is more than 9.
      • I1705248633 [AMEX interface] [CARDS-53731] VISA Outward: "Merchant State/Province Code" field is filled with spaces for non US/CA Merchant Country transactions.
      • I1706022663 [MasterCard interface] [CARDS-53682] NSPK MPE Loading: fixed situation when not all issuer records for one MasterCard range are copied to NSPK BIN group.
      • I1706056722 [Fleet cards] [CARDS-53767] Adjustment amounts rounding issue has been fixed in the end of month fee recalculation procedure.
      • I1706150009 [NSPK interface] [CARDS-53865] NSPK Processing (pipes) : fixed processing of PDS 2063.
      • I1706274643 [CB Gate] [CARDS-53891] Balance update algorithm has been fixed to not update balance if account is Closed.
      • CARDS-52807 [Security & key management] "PA DSS Implementation Guide" has been updated. The section "Encryption and Protected Protocols for Data Transmission" has been changed. Added a warning that when the TLS 1.2 protocol is used, encryption using the RC4 algorithm must be disabled.
      • CARDS-49061 [Host2Host interface] NSPK Inward, Affiliated BII interface: supported NSPK MIR Loyalty messages.
      • CARDS-53198 [Diners Club interface] DCI MPE Import. Supported loading acquirer member ids to BIN table from Geocodes section of DCI Network Configuration xml file.
      • CARDS-53336 [JCB interface] JCB: Added message codes ("RjP-----","RJP-----","RmP-----","RmR-----") for reject processing.
      • CARDS-53337 [NSPK interface] [MIR REL] 2017.2 K-11: removed support of PDS2072 since 17.2 release. "NSPK_RELEASE"="17.2" global parameter must be set to support this functionality
      • CARDS-53376 [NSPK interface] [MIR REL] 2017.2 K-10: supported new PDS2175. It is used to export/import Card Acceptor URL containing Cyrillic characters. "NSPK_RELEASE"="17.2" global parameter must be set to use this functionality.
      • CARDS-53641 [NSPK interface] NSPK Outward Processing (pipe) : added the "COMMIT_INTERVAL" parameter to manage commit interval.
      • CARDS-53712 [Diners Club interface] Supported export of DCI Card Product Submission file for different DCI Releases. Version number filled from DCI_RELEASE global parameter.
      • CARDS-53769 [Diners Club interface] Supported processing DCI Card Production Confirmation file and storing information from this file in the process log.
      • CARDS-53771 [JCB interface] JCB ISO Inward (pipe): added the ability to charge a cardholder using Cardholder Billing Amount (BIT 6) instead of Reconciliation Amount (BIT 5). "ACP_<memberid>"="Y" new pipe parameter must be set to use this functionality for a specific member.
      • CARDS-53808 [MasterCard interface] Areas: "South Sudan" (code SSD) is included in "MC: Middle East, Africa (E)" area.
      • CARDS-53853 [JCB interface] JCB: Added menu items "OpenWay\JCB\JCB. File Management\JCB Outward Rejected" and "OpenWay\JCB\JCB. File Management\JCB Rejects".
      • CARDS-53926 [JCB interface] [JCB Release 17.2] BIT54 is inherited now in chargebacks. No additional action is required.
    • 03.43.30.91
      • CARDS-53267 [Acquiring authorisation] The ability to decline transactions in the second phase when CVV was not checked has been added. The CVC2R tag with the values 'N', 'P', 'U' or 'S' transferred from the controller implements this functionality. The global parameter CHECK_CVV_ON_ISS switches on this functionality. If the parameter is empty, these transactions are successful. If it contains an error number, this error is transferred to the controller and the document is rejected.
      • CARDS-53558 [JCB interface] JCB ISO Inward Processing (pipe) : fixed filling of "transaction date" field for incoming S2 documents.
      • CARDS-53572 [Transaction management] Filling of merchant information for Batch Header documents added on document accept.
      • CARDS-53579 [JCB interface] JCB Outward Processing.dll (pipe) : fixed size of letters for filling "Merchant Name" and "City Name" fields.
      • I1512231114 [Dispute assistant] [CARDS-53570] DA v2. Fixed filling Trans Date for Reimbursements.
      • I1701125638 [Dispute assistant] [CARDS-53582] Dispute documents with fee return can now be processed even if the original document's services have been deleted by Housekeeping. If the FEE_RETURN=ALL option is configured, a fee will be returned; in other cases, a document will be processed without fee return.
      • I1705264283 [Host2Host interface] [CARDS-53576] IC Documents Import (pipe): removed incorrect check of DocRefSet/DRN element length.
      • CARDS-53785 [DB kernel] PA DSS Implementation Guide has been updated: Disk Encryption section has been added (disk encryption is used when there is no Oracle Partitioning option).
      • CARDS-53916 [Health monitoring] PA DSS Implementation Guide has been updated: Health Monitoring section has been added.
      • CARDS-53510 [JCB interface] JCB Outward Processing, JCB ISO Outward processing (pipes): added the ability to set up start sequence numbers for outgoing file numbering. If needed, the new "START_FILE_SEQ" pipe parameter must be set with the desired number.
      • CARDS-53517 [Diners Club interface] Supported service to export DCI Card Product Submission file (format version 00162).
      • CARDS-53567 [VISA interface] VISA VCF Export (pipe): added new "GET_CARDS_HINT", "GET_CARDS_IDS_HINT", "GET_CARDHOLDERS_HINT" pipe parameters to define Oracle hints for appropriate selects. Parameter values must contain the entire hint including comment symbols, for example GET_CARDS_HINT=/*+cardinality(card 20)*/
      • CARDS-53597 [CB Gate] Added a default value (1000) for the commit_interval parameter of the cb_gate_balance_load pipe.
    • 03.43.30.90
      • CARDS-51850 [Bill payments] It is now possible to clear the ServiceComment and License fields of a PaymentType using mBilling request.
      • CARDS-52131 [VISA interface] Information about Prepaid Cards has been added to the "Card Issuance" section in the "XLS_Visa_Statistics_Issuing_Business" report.
      • CARDS-52958 [VISA interface] In the "XLS_Visa_Statistics_Acquiring_Business" report supported separation of "Acquired Electronic Commerce Transactions Data" section into V PAY and non-V PAY subsections.
      • CARDS-53205 [Diners Club interface] DCI Russia Merchant Management. Supported General order category to retrieve data for Merchant Registration.
      • CARDS-53226 [Reversal management] Generation of corrections in intelligent backdated processing has been improved. When a liability tree is processed, corrections will be generated for transfers between Main/Sub trees in the liability hierarchy. Additionally corrections can now be generated for transfers to not amount available accounts, this feature can be enabled by setting the STORNO_NOT_AMAV_CORRECTIONS global parameter to "Y".
      • CARDS-53270 [UnionPay interface] UPI Audit Trailer Import. Supported creating settlement documents for Fee Collection/ Funds Disbursements (FCP file).
      • CARDS-53283 [Core] Each ITEM_DUE is now processed separately in Acquiring products configuration. Previously, using a Due Type other then Value Days Due could cause a collapse of several ITEM_DUE with different signs, leading to incorrect information in Merchant Statement reports.
      • CARDS-53334 [NSPK interface] NSPK Processing (pipes): fixed incorrect processing for PDS-0176 and PDS-0190 for AMEX.
      • CARDS-53350 [VISA interface] VISA Inward Processing (pipe): fixed link to original_doc for settlement documents.
      • CARDS-53394 [Instalment management] Filtering out of recalculated entries added on instalment creation.
      • CARDS-53396 [High availability] SAF forwarding works on HA secondary node.
      • CARDS-53434 [Issuing authorisation] IPS STIP negative advice message creates a reversal document when it is received after posting an original request which was received in single-message mode.
      • CARDS-53481 [Reversal management] Intelligent Backdated Processing functionality has been improved to correct balance history entry amounts for advice and reversal transactions when a balance type is specified in a custom fee service with an empty Fee Type reference.
      • CARDS-53484 [Dispute assistant] DA v2: Fixed automatic Final Write-Off creation if one of the summary balances is equal to zero.
      • I1703241228 [Acquiring authorisation] [CARDS-53397] Error in sorting P2P documents on Phase2 has been fixed.
      • I1705099074 [CB Gate] [CARDS-53246] Fixed incorrect processing of CBGate balance loading when the last transaction linked to the balance was delivered to CBS by SAF.
      • I1705221109 [Acquiring authorisation] [CARDS-53488] Coms_Log parsing in DB. Fixed error in parsing pay_gate messages.
      • I1705222395 [MasterCard interface] [CARDS-53347] MC IPM Outward. Now the pipe doesn't fill DE38 (Approval Code) for non-intracountry transactions in Offline Chip Card Data Input Mode.
      • I1705235303 [Product management] [CARDS-53377] Selection of Bank Date and Local Date for CS Status Log has been changed when a classifier value is restored by a Classifier Action. This is relevant only for those customers who use Reversal Management or/and Datamart.
      • I1705264583 [NSPK interface] [CARDS-53495] NSPK Outward Processing (pipe): fixed ARN calculating for multiple adjustments.
      • I1706021774 [UnionPay interface] [CARDS-53513] Union Pay Outward: Fixed problem with selecting documents for wrong channel.
      • I1706069710 [Money transfers] [CARDS-53514] Money transfers Sender Data made optional for OnUs and Domestic transactions for CUP cards.
      • CARDS-53083 [WAY4 Web] Password complexity requirements can now be added as parameters for WAY4Web user authentication scheme.
      • CARDS-53277 [NSPK interface] Affiliated BII Outward Processing (pipe) : supported export of NSPK G2C Credit transactions.
      • CARDS-53379 [JCB interface] JCB ISO. Added the "OWS.Accept Clearing" subitem to the menu item "OpenWay\JCB\JCB. Daily Procedures\JCB. Inward Processing\JCB ISO Inward Processing".
      • I1705026998, I1705127863, I1705153646, I1702208472, I1705297867 [NSPK interface] [CARDS-53441] NSPK Bin Table Import (pipe): if NSPK BIN range for VISA/MC is not found and smaller (fully included in NSPK range) VISA/MC BIN ranges exist, these VISA/MC ranges are copied to the appropriate NSPK BIN Group. To avoid copying and restore the old behaviour, the new "COPY_SUBRANGES"="N" pipe parameter must be set.
      • I1706018366 [Transaction management] [CARDS-53473] VISA SMS: Fixed case when Transaction Switch sends duplicate Reversals.
    • 03.43.30.89
      • CARDS-53000 [Reversal management] Liability contract hierarchy is supported in reversal management. To allow intelligent backdated processing for a contract with liability subcontracts, the STORNO_LIAB tag should be set in its product; in this case, the whole liability tree will be recalculated.
      • CARDS-52941 [Reversal management] The ability has been added to properly recalculate contract state with correction documents for fees and interest in intelligent backdated processing. Correction transaction types should be marked using the STORNO_DELAY tag with the "Y" value if a fee is posted in Contracts Daily Update with the preceding date and "N" if a fee is posted in Contracts Daily Update with the current date.
      • CARDS-53201 [VISA interface] VISA VCF Export (pipe): added possibility to redefine card numbers for some accounts on export for mixed company structure. Prefixes of these accounts must be listed in "ACCOUNT_PREFIX" pipe parameter value, which must be separated by commas. "CUST_GET_CARD_NUMBER" new pipe parameter must contain sql expression, which returns redefined card number value.
      • CARDS-46540 [Product management] Due normalization has been improved for Issuing accounts with Due Types: Payment Due, Long Payment Due, Contract Due, Fixed Day Due. If several due items with the same Due Date exist for an account, then only one Due transfer will be performed for the total Due Amount.
      • CARDS-49243 [VISA interface] An equal condition is used to count the number of accounts in the "Total Outstanding" line of the "Aged Analysis of Total Outstanding" section, and "Number of Accounts" line of the "Card Issuance" section in the "QMR VISA Statistics Issuing" report.
      • CARDS-52827 [Accounting] The "Cardholder_Account_Statement" and "Cardholder_Contract_Statement" reports now support configuration with Date Schemes.
      • CARDS-53211 [AMEX interface] Date_Expire and Card_Expire contract dates are now considered in calculation of the "Account Balance" section of the "XLS_AMEX_Statistics_Issuing_Business" report.
      • CARDS-53214 [Transaction management] Fixed incorrect filling of fields with source and target numbers for chargeback when a message contains EMV cryptogram data.
      • CARDS-53216 [JCB interface] JCB ISO Inward Processing (pipe): fixed "Settlement Data doesn't contain settlement amounts" error.
      • CARDS-53221 [Issuing authorisation] Decreased possibility of deadlock when several authorization requests for one card are received at the same time.
      • CARDS-53238 [VISA interface] Th P_ORDER_AGED_ANALYSIS parameter has been deleted from the "XLS_Visa_Statistics_Issuing_Business" report.
      • CARDS-53291 [Issuing authorisation] Fixed the inability to redefine the PARTIAL_APPROVAL_ENABLE property in Services or transaction subtypes.
      • I1704041217 [MasterCard interface] [CARDS-53192] MasterCard IPM OnUs Outward. The pipe no longer fills DE93.
      • I1704187095 [Product management] [CARDS-53269] Usage limiter's end date calculation has been enhanced for usage limiters with Period Type = Billing for sub-contracts.
      • I1705101042 [DB kernel] [CARDS-53222] For event messages (OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Products\Event Types, "Messages" button) the filter in the "Dictionary" button has been changed so that only linked records are shown in the "Dictionary for Messages for..."form.
      • I1705154150 [MasterCard interface] [CARDS-53184] MasterCard PVV Offset Export. Fixed error if no data to export.
      • CARDS-53176 [Web banking] PA DSS Implementation Guide has been updated: Lifestyle Banking section has been updated (information about play.id and %padss.application.mode=prod has been added).
      • CARDS-51624 [Dispute assistant] MasterCard Transaction Management. A warning message and opening a "CHBK_FRAUD_COUNTER" Event have be added for cases when the number of Fraud Chargebacks is exceeded. DA v2. Create Chargeback activity can't be performed if the number of Fraud Chargebacks is exceeded.
      • CARDS-53149 [Diners Club interface] DCI Merchant Management. Supported DCI International Merchant Registration.
      • CARDS-53268 [JCB interface] JCB Outward: for all chip read transactions the "C" value is exported in 22.7 subfield.
      • I1705221304 [NSPK interface] [CARDS-53272] IPS Products. Updated according to last NSPK specification.
    • 03.43.30.88
      • CARDS-53032 [Diners Club interface] DCI: Supported loading BIN table from DCI Network Configuration Information xml file (MPE file).
      • CARDS-52728 [AMEX interface] Added grouping of totals by regions in the "BILLINGS & FEES" section of the XLS_AMEX_Statistics_Issuing_Business report.
      • CARDS-48323 [MasterCard interface] IRD configuration has been modified for Spain.
      • CARDS-51938 [Risk management] Technical operations have been excluded from the risk usage limiter processing. Technical operations are operations where transaction type and service class are not filled.
      • CARDS-52808 [WAY4 Web] In WAY4 Web added check of client privileges to access uploaded files and merchant tree contracts.
      • CARDS-52860 [AMEX interface] The "Account Balances" section in the "XLS_AMEX_Statistics_Issuing_Business" report has been corrected: - Corrected calculation of 'Credit Outstanding Balance Total' and 'Current Credit Outstanding Balance' amount when the P_MIRROR_OVD parameter value is 'Y'. - Changed row order to fit AMEX specification requirements. - Delinquency group's rows are shown with zero values if there are no corresponding data.
      • CARDS-52983 [DB kernel] Fixed the possibility of falling into an infinite loop when incorrect bertlv data tries to parse.
      • CARDS-52989 [VISA interface] VISA BII Outward Processing: fixed creating and sending card-related Fee Collection/Funds Disbursement transactions.
      • CARDS-52997 [Product management] FX_RATE tag calculation has been fixed for DCC Info Inquire documents, when DCC_FX_MODE=CR, and IPS currency differs from Merchant and CH currency.
      • CARDS-53020 [Diners Club interface] DCI DXS Inward Processing. Fixed NullPointerException in case of transactions with addendums without date fields.
      • CARDS-53036 [Core] Behaviour of the FIRST_BILLING and MIN_BILLING=C tags has been enhanced.
      • CARDS-53086 [Mobile banking] The problem with empty invoice details in Mobile Banking has been resolved.
      • CARDS-53113 [Instalment management] Fixed parsing of E2.E1 BERTLV tag containing instalment interest rate.
      • CARDS-53164 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard MPE Import. Fixed TOKEN_BIN tag filling in BIN Table.
      • CARDS-53167 [Money transfers] P2P CSOF tag 06 value returned for Credit accounts and 05 value for Debit/deposit access accounts for money transfers to a VISA card from another IPS card according to VISA requirements.
      • CARDS-53169 [Product management] spac.RESET_INTEREST has been enhanced for custom cases, when Interest Rate should be changed from the Billing cycle start date after holidays, if Interest Rate should be changed in a custom procedure after a new billing cycle starts.
      • CARDS-53170 [Tariff management] Service limit tariffs with preference based on Issuer country (Area) can now be used for source services.
      • CARDS-53177 [AMEX interface] Merchant Management: Fixed processing of incomplete operations.
      • I1703281144 [Dispute assistant] [CARDS-53100] DA v2: For documents that are manually edited, added checking that data in the document add_info field is properly terminated with a semicolon. If not, a semicolon will be added to the end of the add_info field.
      • I1704134961 [Acquiring authorisation] [CARDS-52826] Downgraded transaction MasterCard attributes in a financial confirmation are inherited from the preauthorization document.
      • I1705098865 [AMEX interface] [CARDS-53158] AMEX DAF Import. Fixed rare error due to checking unhandled messages.
      • CARDS-53004 [Mobile banking] Mobile banking: a requirement for the value of the allow_multiple_user_sessions parameter has been added. The parameter must be set to "false" in accordance with PA-DSS.
      • CARDS-53005 [Security & key management] Interactive channels API: a requirement for the value of the csrf_protection parameter has been added. The parameter must be set to "true" in accordance with PA-DSS.
      • CARDS-53006 [Security & key management] Messenger banking: a requirement to not disclose private IP addresses has been added in accordance with PA-DSS.
      • CARDS-53007 [Security & key management] Messenger banking: a requirement for the value of the session_expiry_sec parameter has been added. The parameter must be set to "300" in accordance with PA-DSS.
      • CARDS-53008 [Mobile banking] Mobile banking: a requirement for the value of the debug_enabled parameter has been added. The parameter must be set to "false" in accordance with PA-DSS.
      • CARDS-53009 [WAY4 Web] WAY4 Web: a requirement for the value of the EnableDeveloperInfo parameter has been added. The parameter must be set to "false" in accordance with PA-DSS.
      • CARDS-51958 [NSPK interface] NSPK Inward Processing (pipe): supported new G2C transaction processing.
      • CARDS-51959 [NSPK interface] Added the ability to validate a cardholder's date of birth together with other security values. See documentation for details.
      • CARDS-52972 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard CDF Export: Pipe switched to CDF3 Schema Version 16.01.00.00.
      • CARDS-53033 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard Services: Added services according to Release 17.Q3 article AN 1005.
      • CARDS-53040 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard Services: Added services according to Release 17.Q3 article AN 1004.
      • CARDS-53047 [AMEX interface] Transaction Processing: Added checking of Service Code 701 as a chip code for AMEX.
      • CARDS-53064 [Diners Club interface] DCI Issuer Detail File Import. Supported creating clearing documents. OpenWay\Diners Club\DCI. Daily Procedures\DCI. Inward Processing\DCI DXS Issuer Detail File Inward Processing is used to load issuer clearing and settlements. OpenWay\Diners Club\DCI. Daily Procedures\DCI. Inward Processing\DCI DXS Inward Processing has been removed.
      • ICFEE- 107 [Fee Prediction] [CARDS-52986] RA configuration has been modified for fallback transactions in Europe.
    • 03.43.30.87
      • CARDS-52609 [VISA interface] In the "XLS_Visa_Statistics_Acquiring_Business.rdf" report: 1. Changed the default value of the P_V_PAY_BRAND_NAME parameter from "V PAY" to "V_V". 2. Supported the ability to configure additional groups in SIC_GROUP table to arrange data groups in the "Merchant Category Group Data" and "Contactless" sections. 3. Added new parameter P_SIC_GROUP_CNTCLS_CLASS_TYPE for configuring data groups in the "Contactless" section. 3. Excluded "V PAY" transactions from the "Merchant Category Group Data" section when P_CEMEA = 'N'.
      • CARDS-52662 [Core] Reversal transactions have been excluded from the XLS_CB_f250_3.rdf report.
      • CARDS-52848 [Issuing] Fixed use of P_IS_IMPERSONAL parameter for the XLS_NSPK_Statistics_Issuing_Business_Prepared report.
      • CARDS-52893 [Core] New tags MIN_BAL_TYPE_SIGN/MAX_BAL_TYPE_SIGN have been supported for use together with MIN_BAL_TYPE/MAX_BAL_TYPE and LIMIT_AMOUNT tags.
      • CARDS-52915 [Authentication management] Added the "OFFICER" scope to validation conditions of an authentication scheme linked to a consumer record.
      • CARDS-52939 [Dispute assistant] Dispute Assistant v2. Fixed the procedure to get the last document in a chain.
      • CARDS-52942 [Dispute assistant] Fixed posting of secondary documents, now when an optional document is reversed, the previous document status is not restored.
      • I1612096107 [Host2Host interface] [CARDS-52844] IC Document Export: fixed "An invalid XML character (Unicode: 0x1a) was found" error when exporting a document containing special characters. Invalid symbols are replaced with the "?" character in an outgoing file.
      • I1702270914 [NSPK interface] [CARDS-52869] NSPK Outward Processing (pipe): fixed export of last adjustment, which reverses transaction completely.
      • I1703201358 [Money transfers] [CARDS-52738] If device_parms.device_location value is used as the source of the CPNA tag and the value consists of one word only, the tag value will be calculated as two device_parms.device_location values separated by a space character.
      • I1703249728 [Application management] [CARDS-52849] The problem with missing base relation for a new non-product based related contract during accept of an advanced application R2 has been resolved.
      • I1704121197 [Core] [CARDS-52967] Processing of annual miscellaneous Service fees for contracts created on February 28 of any non-leap year has been fixed. See Client Upgrade Notes for details.
      • I1704192981. Wrong IC for new visa B2B Virtual Payments (ICFEE-178) [Fee Prediction] [CARDS-52895] RA configuration has been modified for all regions and countries in accordance with VISA release (Apr17-341 Mandatory 2.2 New Visa Business-to-Business Virtual Payments Product).
      • I1704204444 [Issuing] [CARDS-52880] Fixed definition of IPS Product for MasterCard subtypes.
      • I1704243534 [Issuing authorisation] [CARDS-52916] Fixed "No Data Found" error during authorization processing if contr_subtype.bin_record is invalid.
      • CARDS-52785 [Data preparation and card personalization] "PA DSS Implementation Guide" has been updated. The section "List of Third-Party Software Used, System Services and Protocols Used" has been changed. Added a warning that the mod_security component is an essential part of the application with regard to security.
      • CARDS-52786 [Issuing] "PA DSS Implementation Guide" has been updated. The section "Specifying Sensitive Data" has been changed. Added a warning that the system cannot function normally without the PVV and Encrypted PIN fields.
      • CARDS-52884 [Security & key management] "PA DSS Implementation Guide" has been updated. Full review for PA DSS 3.2 compliance (03.42.3.x, 03.43.3.x, 03.44.3.x).
      • CARDS-51488 [NSPK interface] NSPK SIOM: supported processing of ONUS/Affiliated fraud transactions.
      • CARDS-51490 [NSPK interface] NSPK SIOM: supported processing of unsuccessful authorization fraud transactions.
      • CARDS-51892 [Acquiring authorisation] Voice Authorization Screen application is compatible with Oracle 12c.
      • CARDS-52545 [AMEX interface] Added the FILTER parameter (pipe:AMEX GNS Outward Processing.cpp).
      • CARDS-52832 [JCB interface] Added the FILTER parameter (pipe:JCB. Outward Processing.cpp).
      • CARDS-52896 [MasterCard interface] IRD configuration has been made based on FULL MPE (Release 17Q2).
    • 03.43.30.86
      • CARDS-52308 [Datamart] In WAY4 Datamart version 03.45.10, new FI Group Load functionality for performing several loads to Datamart (ETLs) for one banking date has been supported. The fi_load_group tag should be put in f_i.special_parms to configure financial institution groups to be loaded during a certain ETL. The mp_fi_load_group table and forms for filling in the fi_load_group tag in f_i.special_parms has been added from WAY4 Cards version 03.45.30.
      • CARDS-52484 [Issuing authorisation] Added ability to permit no more than the specified number of transactions with certain conditions. See documentation for details.
      • CARDS-52815 [Core] Fixed lengthy execution of the approve process for related acquiring contracts.
      • CARDS-52824 [Risk management] Testing - Usage Recalculation: Restored the ability to recalculate usage limiter counters for acquiring.
      • CARDS-52833 [Transaction management] Fixed definition of terminal category to search for target dispute contract in posting history documents.
      • I1703076137 [Money transfers] [CARDS-52813] C2C to affiliated channel license validation has been updated. Transactions will not be more declined by reason of C2C IPS licensies. Correct routing configuration is - corresponding BIN Group Channel should point to Affiliate channel and BIN Table channel should point to appropriate IPS.
    • 03.43.30.85
      • CARDS-50401 [Product management] When re-ageing is performed and previous due account is not found in the contract, it will be created automatically according to the account template rules.
      • CARDS-52446 [Customer/account management] In the "Contract_Analytic_Statement" and "Cardholder_Contract_Statement" reports an option has been added to show purchases made using loyalty bonuses in the separate section.
      • CARDS-52559 [Acquiring authorisation] By default, the posting date after the cut-off time on a device is set to the next working day based on the default calendar. A new feature has been added to redefine the calendar type: the "ACQ_CLNDR_TYPE" parameter defines a special type of acquiring calendar. This feature is available only if the "ENABLES_SHIFT_DAY" parameter is set. If the parameter "ACQ_CLNDR_TYPE" is not set, the default calendar will be used.
      • CARDS-52448 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard PVV/PIN Export: Fixed record selection to satisfy "Full file replace" mode.
      • CARDS-52656 [VISA interface] In the "XLS_Visa_Statistics_Acquiring_Business" report for Visa Europe region (P_CEMEA=N) supported split of transactions into groups: "Immediate Debit" and "Credit & deferred Debit".
      • CARDS-52668 [Accounting] Interest calculation has been enhanced for Interest Scheme -360 and interest calculation on the 31st day of the month.
      • CARDS-52675 [Reversal management] Fixed changing of the "Is Ready" contract attribute when performing manual reversal management actions using DB Manager.
      • CARDS-52686 [Instalment management] Fixed changing of the "Is Ready" contract attribute when performing manual instalment actions using DB Manager.
      • CARDS-52707 [Fee Prediction] The RewardsBusiness product has been added in RA configuration for Interregional jurisdiction.
      • CARDS-52714 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard IPM Outward: Added trimming tag values for PDS0670.
      • CARDS-52729 [Case management] Issue when a document was not added to an existing Financial case for the same contract has been fixed.
      • CARDS-52732 [Reversal management] Due tolerance configuration is now supported in backdated payment processing in the Reversal Management module. Maximum tolerance supported period is 10 days. In common cases it is recommended to use backdated payments instead of due tolerance setup.
      • CARDS-52735 [Acquiring authorisation] Error in filling final fee amount parameter has been fixed.
      • CARDS-52762 [CB Gate] Fixed BerTLV buffers parsing.
      • CARDS-52766 [Core] Validation of setting of classifier value for the contract or client has been enhanced.
      • CARDS-52774 [Application management] Client AddOrUpdate Application R2 checks the existence of a client in accordance with the additional global parameters UNIQUENESS_CLIENT_NUMBER and UNIQUENESS_CLIENT_REG_NUMBER.
      • CARDS-52776 [Transaction management] Fixed error on posting of interbank documents.
      • CARDS-52798 [Fee Prediction] UPI Fee Prediction. Fixed the channel in the OpenWay\UPI Fee Prediction\UPI IRF Criteria form.
      • CARDS-52800 [VISA interface] Query getCardHolderVerificationMethodsReq for VDEP has been optimized.
      • I1611102688 [Tariff management] [CARDS-52306] Added check of "Value Days" field length for "Service Value Days" tariff.
      • I1701227932 [Transaction management] [CARDS-52611] The algorithm for matching Retrieval Request and First Presentment documents has been improved for cases when a secondary document had been already processed and had changed the First Presentment posting status to "InActive".
      • I1702105338 [Dispute assistant] [CARDS-52777] DA R2: For write-off of a dispute case with a presentment for "No Such Card", if reimbursement (in this case, write-off of the presentment) is created manually, it won't be created automatically by the standard dispute case write-off procedure.
      • I1703138261 [MasterCard interface] [CARDS-52801] MasterCard IPM Outward: Now documents with an invalid Approval Code will be suspended. MasterCard IPM OnUs Outward: Now if a document has an invalid Approval Code, this Approval Code won't be exported.
      • I1703209597 [Core banking interface] [CARDS-52654] Pipe RBS. Transactions Export (Batching): generation of duplicate empty files for a future date has been fixed.

ORA-06512: at "OWS.AUTH", line 3054
      • CARDS-52352 [Core] BIN record search on contract subtype validation now checks BIN record status. Active records have a higher priority for being selected than records that are inactive or closed. However, active BIN records with "Data Source" = Own have a lower priority than inactive or closed records from other sources.

Nmbr to Total Purchase Transact. Nmbr Ratio.

    • 03.43.30.81
      • CARDS-52471 [VISA interface] VISA VCF Export (pipe): fixed "status was changed from Close to Open" error when using custom card status (F333 in ADD_FIELDS_T3 pipe parameter).
      • CARDS-52475 [Reversal management] In the Reversal Management module, correction of "Behavior Type" changes has been fixed when changes were done at correction start date.
      • I1703160402 [Product inspector] [CARDS-52474] Product Inspector test script import has been modified when in the file being imported there are test scripts with the same codes that already exist in the destination WAY4Cards system. In the first step of the import procedure, all the existing test steps in the database are marked with the new status "Obsolete" (earlier steps were deleted). In the second step, the system checks if the step exists in the file being imported. If not, the step in the database is kept with the "Obsolete" status, otherwise the step gets a status and inherits other parameters from the file being imported. When a Product Inspector script is run, a step with the "Obsolete" status behaves the same way as a step with the "Skip" status.
      • CARDS-52403 [Acquiring authorisation] The Voice Authorization screen has been refactored and migrated to the last java version.
      • CARDS-52472 [MasterCard interface] IRD configuration has been modified for Lebanon in accordance with MasterCard release 17Q2: MEA 323 - Introduction of Contactless IRD Structure in Lebanon.
    • 03.43.30.80

The default value is "rpr.on_us_channel(cg.group_channel)" to customize the "is_on_us" flag. The default value has been changed for the P_CHAIN_TYPE_FILTER_1 - checks by group_channel are extended by analysis of card_brand for support of affiliated transactions - " trans.chain_type in ('U') and target.card_brand like 'E_%' ".

      • I1703024740 [Core] [CARDS-52378] Standing order amount calculation has been fixed for cases when an order's posting date is earlier than the current banking date, and when the order's minimum and maximum amount currency differs from the account currency.
      • I1703038675 [Risk management] [CARDS-52383] Incorrect processing of several usage limiters with the same limiter type for one transaction is no longer possible.
      • CARDS-52373 [VISA interface] VISA Prepare Outward Files (procedure): added the "COMMIT_BY" parameter to control intermediate commits. Possible values: BATCH/FILE/PROCESS(default).
      • CARDS-52386 [Acquiring] Additional tags BASE_RATE and FX_MARKUP_PCT are supported for DCC Info Inquiry documents.
      • CARDS-52387 [Fee Prediction] RA configuration and IC tariffs have been modified for the Czech Republic according to Visa Business News (AI06374,AI06367).
      • CARDS-52399 [JCB interface] JCB ISO Outward Processing (pipe): improved DE4 and DE49 function for dispute transactions. If a document's reconciliation currency does not match the 1st presentment currency, the document's transaction amount/currency will be exported instead.
      • CARDS-52412 [VISA interface] VISA VCF Export (pipe) : added customization points.
      • I1702212586 [JCB interface] [CARDS-52413] JCB Interface fixed format (pipes): supported contactless PEM.
    • 03.43.30.78
      • CARDS-52327 [Core] Additional information about contract activity can now be shown in Financials -> Balance List ->[History] and [Totals] screen forms under OpenWay\Customer Service\Customer Service (and the same form is available in OpenWay\Issuing\Customer Support\OLD Contract Info): Counter of pending and declined authorizations for turnover balance types and maximum balance over contract life-to-date and year-to-date turnover balance types (requires special configuration in Balance Types screen form). Also for turnover balances with History Mode = Billing (After Close), history records after each billing will be saved in acnt_balance_history and will be available for viewing via the screen forms mentioned above.

      • CARDS-52015 [Bill payments] Biller Management: ATM Retail contracts are now created with consideration of the requested channel.
      • CARDS-52020 [Issuing authorisation] Tokenization activation code stored under a document has been masked.
      • CARDS-52215 [Issuing authorisation] Data from field 112 have been parsed on Purchase token operation.
      • CARDS-52250 [Core] The KEEP_CONTRACT_ID tag is set in a Misc Service (Service Details) or transaction subtype (Fee Algorithm). When a Misc document is created, the contract identifier is specified in add_info.

The P_HAS_CARDREADER parameter has been deleted. New parameters P_IS_KIOSK and P_CAN_WORK_WITH_CARD have been added. Columns 4-9 and 11 have been corrected.

      • CARDS-52320 [JCB interface] JCB ISO Inward Processing (pipe): fixed incorrect creation of settlement documents with zero amount.

      • I1702157314 [Transaction management] [CARDS-52313] When validating a contract subtype, the BIN record is checked even if it is already filled.
      • I1702225223 [Automated routines] [CARDS-52304] The Approve procedure can be be called for sub-products. If the main product is not ready, Approve will be executed for the entire hierarchy; if the main product is ready, only the sub-product will be approved. A new form has been added, OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Products\Product Definition\Products (No Hierarchy), for viewing all products without hierarchy.
      • I1703010503 [VISA interface] [CARDS-52272] RA configuration has been modified for Denmark. The DK_VPAY_ECOM fee descriptor has been withdrawn.
      • I1703076703 [Acquiring authorisation] [CARDS-52318] Address city field has been truncated to 32 symbols when filling device parameters.

      • CARDS-52252 [VISA interface] IC tariffs have been modified according to VISA release article: Apr17-341 2.2 New Visa Business-to-Business Virtual Payments Product.

      • CARDS-52321 [VISA interface] VISA Enhanced Acquirer Capture file Import: added JCB specific for further export ECI (PDE3009) to JCB.
    • 03.43.30.76
      • CARDS-52194 [Issuing authorisation] Added support for external management of transaction value date by sending the Posting Date parameter in IssFundsTransfer, IssPaymentFromContract, IssPaymentToContract web services when working in SMS mode. Requires the appropriate version of W4W.
      • I1612121917 [Issuing authorisation] [CARDS-51820] "No Check" Auth scenario has been removed from forms as obsolete. The additional global parameter ENABLE_NO_CHECK is no longer supported.
      • CARDS-51883 [Acquiring authorisation] P2P merchant initiated transactions (MIT) are supported.
      • CARDS-52055 [Diners Club interface] DCI Clearing Import: Supported value M = "Mobile POS" which is valid for the Terminal Type field since Release 15.2.

      • CARDS-52189 [VISA interface] VISA VCF Export: added the "ACCOUNT_PREFIX" parameter to define the first symbols of accounts for special processing. Default value is "CH".
      • CARDS-52190 [VISA interface] VISA VCF Export: added "REPORT_TO_LINK_T10" and "PARENT_LINK_T10" parameters which make it possible to override "REPORT_TO_LINK" and "PARENT_LINK" parameters for T10 records. Added "TWO_LEVEL_STRUCTURE"="Y"/"N"(default) parameter. If "Y" it is allowed to set the parent link for card directly to a corporate contract.

      • CARDS-49286 [Product management] New Billing Date functionality has been implemented for issuing products.
      • CARDS-51680 [Web services] New menu branches have been added: OpenWay\Web Services and OpenWay\Way4Web. The "WS Users & Grants" menu branch has been moved from OpenWay\System\DB Administrator Utilities to these new menu branches; the linked menu OpenWay\Full\DB Administrator Utilities\WS Users & Grants has been removed. For more details, see the section "Client Upgrade Notes on Impact changes".

      • CARDS-52133 [Instalment management] Instalment Event = "Plan Closed", according to which an Instalment Event Fee is charged is no longer generated when an instalment plan in preview or inactive status is closed.

      • CARDS-52164 [Core] Fixed incorrect balance amounts shown right after balance prediction in WAY4Web; cache clear has been added.
      • I1702196631 [Product management] [CARDS-52141] Fixed amount calculation for standing orders with the BY_BATCH tag; now zero amount orders are not recalculated based on account balance.
      • CARDS-52123 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard IRD Calculation: Base IRD Configuration now uses native DE22, PDS0023 and PDS0052 values to define IRD specification.

      • CARDS-51965 [Instalment management] Instalment fee code is now taken from an Instalment Scheme even if the fee rate is passed in document tags. Previous system behaviour was to use "FEE" as a fee code value regardless of Instalment Scheme settings.

      • CARDS-43148 [Customer/account management] Added a new parameter P_USE_LOCAL_CONSTANTS for the "Merchant Standing Order Entry Details.rdf" report for using the report with Way4Web.
      • CARDS-51386 [Core] A new value, FEE_CURR, can now be used for the REDEF_FEE_ACC_CURR tag.
      • CARDS-51895 [Core] The ability to post Event chains in a user-defined order has been added. A new field, "Step N" should be filled in for the Events in the chain to specify their posting order. A new event posting mode, DEPENDENT_CHAIN has been introduced to provide proper condition checking for cases when an Event depends on the results of previous Events in the chain.

      • CARDS-51960 [Transaction management] Country Table: Revised record for Madagascar. Code (3 bytes) must be "MDG", Code (2 bytes) must be "MG", Code (Numeric) must be "450", Curr Name must be "MALAGASY ARIARY", Curr Code must be "MGA", N Curr Code must be "969". No impact on transaction processing.
      • I1701271032 [Tariff management] [CARDS-51919] Changing Interest Tariff Apply Mode without changing interest rates has been enhanced.

      • CARDS-51637 [VISA interface] [VISA REL] Apr17-376 4.5: supported new "Payment Account Reference" field in BASE II Draft Data Transactions. If this field has a meaningful value in an incoming transaction it is stored in the "PAR" tag in the document.

VISA BASE II Outward pipe: supported export of the "Purchase Identifier" field (TC05 TCR1 pos 133-157) from the "PURCH_ID" tag.
      • I1612279006 [Fee Prediction] [CARDS-51719] IRD configuration has been modified for EU region.
    • 03.43.30.66
      • CARDS-51610 [Loyalty] Added the ability to limit the bonus points amount accrued for a client contract within a loyalty campaign. The limit amount should be set in the "Action Total Limit" field of the tariff action, the ACTION_LIMIT_MODE=LOCAL tag indicates that the action limit should be calculated for each contract. A new strict mode has been added to check the action limit, it prevents total points from exceeding the specified limit with the last transaction; ACTION_LIMIT_MODE=STRICT should be set for the tariff action.
      • CARDS-51670 [Acquiring] Document tags CYCLE_CB (Credit Banknote), CYCLE_DC (Debit Coin), CYCLE_CC (Credit Coin), CYCLE_DB2 (for ATMs with 2 dispensers) have been supported to define the cycle code to group entries for batch repayment.
      • CARDS-48740 [POS management] Final advice is supported for P2P transactions.
      • CARDS-51673 [Fee Prediction] MasterCard MPE Import. Supported loading amount restriction from MPE for a particular IRD by tag in the configuration. Now the configuration supports loading amount restriction for Spain IRD 75 and 85 for retail transactions.
      • CARDS-51683 [Product management] Usage_Limiters_Css.current_status value now considers the state of Contract Classifiers, as before. When the condition is false, the value is "S" (Service Deactivated).
      • I1512213945 [MasterCard interface] [CARDS-51668] MasterCard Inward Processing: fixed FILE_MASK parameter processing in silent mode.
      • I1612227997 [Transaction management] [CARDS-51672] Fixed usage limiter counter calculation for partial reversals.

    • 03.43.30.65
      • CARDS-51312 [Notifications] Added new variables %TRANS_BONUS_ALL%, %TRANS_BONUS_AT:<AccountType>%, %TRANS_BONUS_LIST[:<Prefix>:<Expire>:<Days>]%, %TRANS_BONUS_DOC_ALL%, %TRANS_BONUS_DOC_AT:<AccountType>%, %TRANS_BONUS_DOC_LIST[:<Prefix>:<Expire>:<Days>]% for messaging about loyalty bonuses accrued as the result of some transactions. These variables can be used in client message setup for SMS Banking.

      • CARDS-51646 [Transaction management] Non tariff-dependent conditions for usage limiters with tariffs are checked before tariff search to minimize database load.
      • CARDS-51647 [Invoice management] Overdue substate restore procedure has been fixed for invoice payment reject.
      • I1607269017 [Dispute assistant] [CARDS-50154] DA v2: Fixed the procedure to get the last document in a chain. Supported processing reversals that were not generated in the DA interface. The activity "Accepted Presentment Reversal (Iss)" (idt DSP_ACPT_PRS_REV_SYSACT) must be registered in the acquirer strategy.
      • I1612293501 [High availability] [CARDS-51620] Incorrect PostingStatus values are no longer assigned to documents moved from a secondary HA node when deferred processing takes these records in a different order than the original one.
      • CARDS-51631 [VISA interface] IPS Product Definition: Changed name for VISA product "X" from "Reserved" to "B2B Virtual Payments".
      • CARDS-51658 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard NSPK Outward: From 28.02.2017, the pipe will fill PDS0765 for MoneySend Payment Transactions.
    • 03.43.30.64
      • CARDS-51358 [Product management] Added the ability to define and show a past due date and period for a contract. Overdue balance should be configured to include all overdue accounts and the balance code should be specified in the PAST_DUE_BALANCE global parameter.
      • CARDS-51475 [VISA interface] The logic has been changed for calculating total active cards and total cards in the following QMR Issuing reports: "AMEX Statistics Issuing", "MC Statistics Issuing", "Visa Statistics Issuing". A card that has been reissued (when the contract with old card number hasn't been closed) is taken into account only once for "number of total cards in circulation" and "number of active cards".
      • CARDS-51476 [AMEX interface] "AMEX Statistics Issuing Business" default behaviour has changed. Now the report will group data by Internal Product Names, not by AMEX IPS Product names as before. To support this behaviour, a new parameter, P_ATTR_PS_ISS_INT_PRODUCT_NAME, has been added to the report (the default value is "PS_ISS_INT_PRODUCT_NAME"). Also, additional configuration is required and statistics gathering should be repeated for the required period to see the results in the new format. To keep the old behaviour, the P_ATTR_PS_ISS_INT_PRODUCT_NAME parameter should be set with an empty value. Please contact OpenWay Support for more details.
      • CARDS-50957 [AMEX interface] Transactions for foreign devices are now shown in the "AMEX Statistics Issuing Business" report.
      • CARDS-51449 [Product inspector] Added sorting by ID for application action logging in PI test results.
      • CARDS-51487 [Acquiring] For the "Merchant Contract Statement" report, parameter values (P_DATE_FROM; P_DATE_TO; P_ZIP_CODE; P_REPTYPE; P_SQL_TRACE; P_F_I; P_ID) can be set directly without local_constants. If these parameters are not set, values from local_constants will be used.
      • CARDS-51489 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard CDF Export. Enhanced customization.
      • CARDS-51572 [NSPK interface] NSPK Outward Processing: fixed ARN recalculation for Adjustments, when an Adjustment has the same date as original transaction.
      • CARDS-51579 [JCB interface] JCB Variable Outward: fixed ARN field 31 subfield 2 filling. Now it matches PDE3901.2. Removed DE14 filling for non ICC transactions.
      • CARDS-51586 [Host2Host interface] IRouter: Removed unnecessary incorrect PIN tries processing in routing contract.
      • CARDS-51592 [Notifications] Processing of Default Service (with id=0) for correct representation of the variables "%SERVICE$..." is added
      • CARDS-51629 [Core] The error message "History mode can not be empty" has been modified to the warning message "History mode may be required" when approving a Service Package.
      • I1611104436 [Customer/account management] [CARDS-51596] Increased the precision of reading FX rates for macrotransactions to 12 digits for use in screen forms and reports.
      • I1611305656 [Product inspector] [CARDS-51348] Product Inspector test script import has been modified when in the file being imported there are test scripts with codes that already exist: a UI dialog is displayed to confirm the script update. If script update is chosen, all the existing test steps will be deleted and the new one rewritten. This dialog window appears only if the pipe's SILENT mode parameter is switched off.
      • CARDS-51148 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard Release 17.Q2 Global 521, Global 533, Global 566, AP 345, MEA 323: Added Reject Error Messages with codes 0008, 2204, 2595, 2639, 2641, 2662, 2809, 2810, 2811, 2814, 2817, 2823, 2824.
      • CARDS-51154 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard Release 17.Q2 Global 521. IPS Product Definition: Added the "MasterCard Flex Prepaid" product with the MPD code.
      • CARDS-51561 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard Release 17.Q2 Global 594: Supported loading the Payment Account Reference field of an ADDR message to the document tag PAR.
      • CARDS-51576 [Fee Prediction] RA configuration has been modified for the Great Britain and the Czech Republic.
      • CARDS-51581 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard CDF Export: Supported merging documents for Financial Adjustment Records.
      • I1612198860 [Money transfers] [CARDS-51583] P2P data Validation rules required for the IPS channels will also be validated for the Affiliate channels if the card BIN group channel is defined as an IPS channel.
    • 03.43.30.63
      • CARDS-51359 [Application management] Advanced Applications R2 supports setting contract Instalment Limits with an activity period.
      • CARDS-51375 [Instalment management] The ability to set a temporary Instalment limit added. A limit may be set for a time period, after which it will be set to zero or to the current value used, depending on the limit's configuration.
      • CARDS-51405 [Fleet cards] Usage limiter remainder values (units and money, units or money, units, money) returned for successful transactions are now regulated by the FLEET_RETURN_LIMITERS global parameter.
      • CARDS-51415 [Tariff management] Supported automatic inheritance of a tariff domain contract parameter value from a sub to a main contract according to linked classifier value priority.
      • CARDS-51416 [Product management] The ability to skip Tariff Plan inheritance has been implemented.
      • CARDS-49814 [Issuing] In the form "OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Contract Types\Plastic Codes" added the new columns"Offline PIN (fill only for Chip cards)" and "Contactless (fill only for Chip cards)". In the menu "OpenWay\Full\Statistics\Dictionaries\Statistic Attributes (custom)" added the new attribute "PS_IS_COMBINED".
      • CARDS-51380 [UnionPay interface] UPI Audit Trailer File Import: Loading Fund Disbursement from FCP files.
      • CARDS-51492 [AMEX interface] Transaction Processing: Added checking of Service Code 702 for AMEX.
      • CARDS-51530 [VISA interface] VISA Enhanced Acquirer Capture File: fixed doc.MERCHANT_ID filling. This field is filled only from the TCR1 record of the file being imported.
      • CARDS-51533 [NSPK interface] NSPK SIOM Outward: fixed Oracle grants for Clerk role.
      • CARDS-51563 [Money transfers] Ability to change the CUP Channel name letter has been implemented.
      • I1509142952 [Host2Host interface] [CARDS-51531] IC Documents Export, IC Documents Import. The "EXCLUDE_TAGS" parameter has been added to IC Documents Export, IC Documents Import pipes, making it possible to exclude export/import of the specified tags from/to doc.add_info.
      • I1609086162 [Dispute assistant] [CARDS-51433] DA v.2: Fixed filling reimbursement amounts by default.
      • I1611305517 [MasterCard interface] [CARDS-51501] Interchange tariffs have been modified for EU (Intra-Western) in accordance with MasterCard Interchange Manual.
      • I1612200174 [MasterCard interface] [CARDS-51505] MasterCard IPM Outward: Now we don't send DE54 Cashback amount in chargebacks.
      • CARDS-51481 [JCB interface] JCB ISO Outward (variable): added the "EXT_CURR_EXP" parameter for changing the currency exponent on transaction export.
      • I1511020079 [AMEX interface] [CARDS-49191] AMEX: supported functionality to reverse outgoing AMEX GFSG files.
      • ID901121006 [AMEX interface] [CARDS-51526] AMEX GNS Inward and Outward: Supported Contactless and Wallet transactions.
    • 03.43.30.62
      • CARDS-50723 [Core] Additional input parameters have been added to the CUST_TRANS_CODE custom procedure. These parameters allow more precise customization of transaction codes. A transaction code generated by the custom function is not altered anymore with additions in standard code. The resulting transaction code is used in the macrotransaction and GL Trace. Entry record trans codes can be synchronised with GL Trace records if the SYNC_ENTRY_GL_TRANS_CODE global parameter is set to "Y". For using standard transaction codes, the function should return null value. Different transaction codes can be generated for base amount, base fee, additional fee and markup using logic for the EntryRole input parameter. A transaction code with the BaseAmount role is saved in a macrotransaction, other roles are used in GL Trace and Entry only. The previous version cust_trans code was only called for the BaseAmount role. If only customization of macrotransaction trans_code is needed (which is inherited by certain rules into gl_trace and entry) then a condition on this EntryRole should be added.
      • CARDS-51271 [Instalment management] Installments behavior changed. Installments with extra fee are added into the principal amount . An Additional fee capitalization invoice will be created to reflect the fee amount calculated and create the proper funds transfers.
      • CARDS-51427 [Authentication management] Allow the "SINGLE" option for identification schemes.
      • CARDS-51235 [Issuing] Fixed incorrect ability to mark an additional card applet for production without the main one.
      • CARDS-51394 [Core] Fixed recalculation of values in the ON_DATE, ON_DATE_BALANCE fields of the Account table during the Accounting GL renumeration process.
      • CARDS-51444 [Customer/account management] Fixed performance trouble with procedure of calculation values current amount and current number fields on GUI forms.
      • CARDS-51438 [MasterCard interface] Interchange tariffs have been modified for Croatia in accordance with MasterCard Interchange Bulletin No. 18.
      • I1611068909 [Fee Prediction] [CARDS-51437] Interchange tariffs have been modified for Portugal in accordance with MasterCard Interchange Bulletin No. 21.
      • I1611234983 [Fee Prediction] [CARDS-51440] Interchange tariffs have been modified for Germany in accordance with MasterCard Interchange Bulletin No. 23.
    • 03.43.30.61
      • CARDS-51371 [Loyalty] Fixed action approval for loyalty actions with Action Total Limit specified.
      • CARDS-51378 [Acquiring] Documents, that are registered in the technical cycle "AllDocs", were excluded from the reports "Merchant Contract Statement", "Merchant Transactions Statement" and %TRANS_CST_CYCLE_N%, %TRANS_CST_CYCLE_CODE% variables used in notification.
      • CARDS-51392 [UnionPay interface] UPI Audit Trailer Import: fixed "Acceptor Name Location" field processing.
      • CARDS-51410 [NSPK interface] Fixed "No or incorrect tag NSPK_TA" error when exporting a transit adjustment transaction to NSPK.
      • CARDS-51413 [Diners Club interface] DCI Outward Processing: Supported exporting a transaction amount with a surcharge fee (from the document settlement amount).
      • CARDS-51419 [UnionPay interface] UnionPay Outward Processing: Supported filling the "System Trace Audit Number" and "Transmission Date and Time" fields from the authorization document if one of them isn't present in the financial document.
      • CARDS-51423 [Core] Threshold amount calculation for Inherited standing orders with BY_BATCH has been fixed for multicurrency contracts.
      • I1609088862 [Acquiring authorisation] [CARDS-50497] MATCH_REVERSE_ONLINE parameter limits the period from sales completion to the reversal transaction excluding the preauthorisation transaction.
      • I1611018583 [Issuing] [CARDS-51391] Fixed incorrect usage limiter redefinition processing which lead to Oracle exception when all previously made redefinitions was already terminated.
      • I1612082795 [VISA interface] [CARDS-51432] RA configuration has been fixed for the United Kingdom and Gibraltar.
      • I1612151492 [Host2Host interface] [CARDS-51420] Fixed "CHIP_TRANS ::ERROR: Wrong Data Detected" error when exporting chip NSPK transactions using the "Affiliated BII Outward Processing" pipe.
      • CARDS-50278 [NSPK interface] NSPK: supported SIOM (NSPK fraud reporting system) for Issuers.
      • CARDS-51140 [JCB interface] JCB ISO Inward: added support for incoming files without RDW. To import such files, the "NORDW"="Y" pipe parameter must be set.
      • CARDS-51366 [Money transfers] P2P tags are filled in in the documents prepared for processing in the Affiliate H2H channels.
      • I1611286121 [VISA interface] [CARDS-51384] RA configuration has been modified for EU region.
    • 03.43.30.60
      • CARDS-51329 [Tariff management] The ability to use a discount for a tariff value has been added. Tag DISCOUNT_CODE should be added to tariff "Apply Rules" with the contract parameter code that stores the discount value as a percentage.
      • CARDS-51041 [MasterCard interface] Error in tokenization processing when IRouter is used as an authorization channel has been fixed.
      • CARDS-51114 [Data preparation and card personalization] Default ICC Key Pre-generation Menu Items have been fixed and no longer refer to unused PM_ICC_KEY view.
      • CARDS-51268 [Product management] Fixed processing of the ORDER_MIN_PARM tag for standing orders with BY_BATCH mode.
      • CARDS-51314 [MasterCard interface] DE 124 in TAR messages will also be sent also for green channel.
      • CARDS-51347 [Transaction management] Transaction Conditions: Added default TC for POS Chip PBT/SBT Token and Contactless Transaction Conditions.
      • I1607081471 [Dispute assistant] [CARDS-51266] DA v2: Fixed amount processing if the global parameter USE_TRANS_AMOUNT=Y.
      • I1610052490 [MasterCard interface] [CARDS-51350] MasterCard Service Packs: Excluded Transaction Subtype Fee Algorithm to be updated when Copy Configuration file is loaded.
      • I1610143454 [Core] [CARDS-50702] Definition of routing idt for new contracts is regulated by the SKIP_ROUTING global parameter. When the value is "Y" (default), routing idt will not be filled in. If distributed processing is used and routing idt is a required attribute of real contracts, its definition can be additionally regulated by the client parameter SKIP_ROUTING, whose should be "Y" for cards that have been issued but not yet sold.
      • I1610184379 [Dispute assistant] [CARDS-51319] DA v2: Restored the reopen case feature if a new document is added to a closed case.
      • I1610275332 [MasterCard interface] [CARDS-51337] MasterCard IPM Outward: Supported PDS0023 inheritance for Second Presentment from First Presentment original data.
      • I1612082027 [Host2Host interface] [CARDS-51341] Affiliated BII Inward: fixed fallback detection for several types of POS Terminal Capabilities.
      • CARDS-51124 [UnionPay interface] UPI Audit Trailer File Import: Supported loading Fee Collection and Fund Disbursement (FCP) files.
      • CARDS-51278 JCB ISO: Added menu items OpenWay\JCB\JCB. Daily Procedures\JCB. Outward Processing\JCB ISO Outward Processing and OpenWay\JCB\JCB. Daily Procedures\JCB. Inward Processing\JCB ISO Inward Processing. Added settlement message codes.
      • I1507289108 [MasterCard interface] [CARDS-50426] MC IPM Inward: Added filling the MC_BSA tag with the value of PDS0158 subfields 2 and 3.
      • I1609197138 [VISA interface] [CARDS-51333] VISA RA and Tariffs calculation: Now the additional global parameter VISA_CALC_RA can contain a comma separated list of alpha codes of acquiring countries for which the system must calculate RA/Tariffs.
    • 03.43.30.58
      • CARDS-50891 [CB Gate] The STIP balance loading procedure has been improved by checking the fact of sending (and delivering) an operation to the CBS and matching it with information from the loading file. Added the ability to use last operation time instead of last operation reference number in STIP balance data files.
      • CARDS-51292 [Customer profile] Marketing personal messages are now limited to 4000 characters.
      • CARDS-51223 [VISA interface] VISA VCF Export: fixed filling optional fields in "T6 block header" record.
      • CARDS-51227 [Core] Target ConsumerID calculation for decisions has been fixed.
      • CARDS-51238 [JCB interface] JCB ISO Outward - fixed "Unknown message type" error when exporting Partial 2nd Presentment.
      • CARDS-51257 [Application management] Advanced applications for contract update now call the contract approve process if the contract was changed even if the last sub-application in the tree is for contract status update and no changes were made to contract status.
      • CARDS-51267 [DB kernel] Fixed document error message when a batch has already been posted, but not closed.
      • CARDS-51285 [Diners Club interface] DCI IPSE Export: Amount fields default value.
      • CARDS-51287 [Core] FROM_TRANS_DATE behaviour has been restored for the explicit number of days defined in the tag value.
      • CARDS-51293 [AMEX interface] AMEX FSF Export: Fixed Approval Code field format checking.
      • CARDS-51299 [Authentication management] TAGS_GET_NODE procedure not updating CLIENT/CONSUMER references during UID resolving process.
      • I1611072019 [Transaction management] [CARDS-51228] The USE_AUTH_FX parameter is now checked on the global and financial institution level.
      • I1611184862 [Risk management] [CARDS-51289] Corrected calculation of the amount sign for a parent usage limiter when the transaction direction and FOR_WHOM property both are opposite to the corresponding properties of the child limiter.
      • I1611186375 [Tariff management] [CARDS-51136] Fixed tariff duplication when a personal tariff domain was copied from another card contract during card replacement.
      • I1611219274 [MasterCard interface] [CARDS-51276] MasterCard SAFE Inward: Added the pipe parameters FILE_TEMPL and FILE_ARCH_TEMPL to change the file mask for loading files. A mask must have a directory and a fixed format (without the "*" character).
      • I1611251560 [UnionPay interface] [CARDS-51249] UnionPay Outward Processing: Restored the possibility to send ATM Reversals.
      • CARDS-51263 [Core banking interface] IC Documents Export: Added the ability to export PAN instead of TOKEN for ONUS token transactions. To export PANs, the value of the new pipe parameter "PAN_FOR_TOKEN_ONUS" should be set to "Y".
      • CARDS-51280 [JCB interface] JCB: Added requirements for JCB ISO.
    • 03.43.30.57
      • CARDS-51120 [Fleet cards] A new tag, F0.EA.FFXX.C9, has been added to the Fleet decline response bertlv message. The tag will be filled in with the exceeded limiter's expiry date when at least one of the MoneyLimit(F0.EA.FFXX.C7) and UnitsLimit(F0.EA.FFXX.C8) tags in the response message also contains values.
      • CARDS-50826 [Transaction management] IPS Inward Processing: Changed inward file rollback processing.

      • CARDS-51093 [Application management] The problem with empty AMND_PREV fields in new device records created by Advanced Applications has been resolved.
      • CARDS-51109 [Core banking interface] RBS Outward Processing: fixed "Can't buffer without truncating ()" error when executing the "GET_CLIENT_PARMS" procedure. If target or source accounts are longer than 32 symbols, they are truncated with a warning.
      • CARDS-51111 [e-Commerce acquiring] Transaction Processing: Luhn digit check condition.
      • CARDS-51131 [JCB interface] JCB ISO Outward: fixed "Strange situation" error.

      • CARDS-51201 [Invoice management] Fixed standing order generation for invoice payment reject actions.
      • I1609214123 [Issuing] [CARDS-50964] The Move Contract procedure has been fixed when a new parent Account Scheme is the same as the old one (for example, when the same Account Scheme is used both for cards that have not yet been assigned and for assigned cards).
      • I1610275964 [Application management] [CARDS-51126] Advanced Application R1 can be succesfully accepted even if it's blocked by the same officer who starts the accept process.
      • I1611018583 [Application management] [CARDS-51190] Exception handling has been added into usage limiter redefinition procedure
      • I1611104436 [Customer/account management] [CARDS-51187] Precision of currency conversion rate stored for macrotransaction is increased to 12 digits.

    • 03.43.30.56
      • CARDS-50452 [Data preparation and card personalization] Categories supported for template tags in VPA Import chip scheme pipe.
      • CARDS-50494 [Core] "Latest items only" value in the "History Mode" field was removed. A new tag, "SAVE_LATEST" for the Balance Type is supported instead. It can be set automatically on Balance Type validation and it means that history will be saved for the last four items only.
      • CARDS-51049 [MasterCard interface] Fixed POS transaction display in the "MasterCard Statistics Acquiring Business" report.
      • CARDS-51112 [Data preparation and card personalization] Default settings in the standard menu item for the RSA Emv Key Management pipe have changed. Keys and certificates are stored and read from @WORK_DIR@\data\keys directory.

To launch the "DB statistics" process in parallel, the "PARALLEL" parameter and global additional parameter "PROCESS_WAIT_INTERVAL" should be configured with the required level of parallelism.

    • 03.43.30.52
      • CARDS-50974 [Issuing authorisation] VISA Interface: supported TCR5 pos 150 PAN Token field. It is stored/exported from "D_TKN" tag.
      • CARDS-50984 [Loyalty] Tariff action processing has been fixed. When applying a tariff action, two tariff data records are automatically created: one from the date the action starts and the second - from the date the action is finished.
      • CARDS-51005 [Instalment management] Fixed activation of an instalment plan with recalculation if custom fee parameters are used.
      • I1606172131 [Risk management] [CARDS-50886] Technical operations have been excluded from usage processing except operational usages. Technical operations are operations where transaction type and service class are not filled.
      • I1610204501 [Transaction management] [CARDS-50960] Fixed redefinition of the DECLINE_NON_AUTHORIZED global parameter for a financial institution or for a particular document when the global parameter DECLINE_NON_AUTHORIZED=Y, but its value is overridden by "N".
      • CARDS-50949 [Diners Club interface] DCI Inward Processing: For loading Acquirer Confirmation File - changed message code S1--I--- trans type "Interchange Total" to S1-AI--- trans type "Acq Interchange Total" and code S1--F--- trans type "Reimbursement Fee Total" to S1-AF--- trans type "Acq Reimbursement Fee Total". They must be changed manually or by loading Copy Configuration file. Supported loading Interchange Issuer Detail File.

    • 03.43.30.49
      • CARDS-50813 [Accounting] For Fee Prediction tariffs to use FX conversion by channel rates from Fee Base, Fee Min, Fee Max to the account currency, a special CR-FX Type (FX Type=CR_<Buy>;<Sell>;<Middle>) should be used, and the tag CONV_CHANNEL should be defined in Service Details. The special CR-FX Type should be Internal (the field "Is Internal=Yes" in OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Accounting Setup\FX Types), even if there are no banking FX Schemes for it.
      • CARDS-50799 [NSPK interface] NSPK Outward - fixed filling PDS 0025.2 for reversals of presentments. The correct date is taken from the settlement data for the original transaction.
