But this format for client identification is not correct and a warning message will be saved in process_mess.
    • 03.43.30.47
      • CARDS-50784 [Core] Warning message that "Payment receiver is not found for client and payment type" during order document processing is created only for SEPA documents.
      • CARDS-50354 [POS management] Value "A" to ACQ_ONLINE tag has been added. This value changes vice versa online status of operation in operation table.
      • CARDS-50738 [Instalment management] Interest for the first portion of an instalment plan is always calculated for the entire period, not on a daily basis if the USE_MONTH_WEIGHT global parameter or tag in the Accounting Scheme is set to "B". A new value, "W", is supported for the INST_ADV_FEE_OPEN global parameter. This value can be used to waive an "Advance Fee" for early repayment or other actions that cause plan recalculation.
      • CARDS-50765 [NSPK interface] NSPK Outward: fixed the rollback procedure for NSPK Collection Only files, so it is possible to export these transactions again.
      • CARDS-50794 [Core] Menu Item DB Administrator Utilities.Special Contract Utilities.Macrotransactions - Reverse has been updated - now macro-transactions generated by this menu item are marked with REPOST_MTR tag. This tag has local_date of reversed macro-transaciton as value and it allows Datamart to filter out such records during daily ETL process.
      • CARDS-50806 [Money transfers] Updated warning message text.
      • CARDS-50850 [Issuing authorisation] The VDEP_TYPE tag to define the identification type for VDEP has been supported for Financial Institutions, Services and Contract Subtypes.
      • I1604192767 [Dispute assistant] [CARDS-49093] DA v2. Supported changing Trusted Amount currency. The currency may be the First Presentment transaction or settlement currency.

      • I1610184194 [Acquiring authorisation] [CARDS-50727] Problem with losing some data in input field 26 when core P2P is on has been fixed.
    • 03.43.30.41
      • CARDS-49289 [Core] Automatic creation of classifier values has been implemented for new Tariff Plan approval in a Tariff Book (for contract parameters with location in Classifier or with Mirror To the classifier configuration).
      • CARDS-49935 [Reversal management] Fixed recalculation of the DLQ_LEVEL, DLQ_LEVEL_INSTL, BEH_TYPE and other "balance type" related classifiers during the correction process.
      • CARDS-50489 [Core] Fixed invalid error message generation during Balance Type validation in case when the parent balance type with the tag COUNTER_ONLY has subordinated balance types with 'TURNOVER%' usage. Added error message generation during Balance Type validation in case when parent balance type with the tag COUNTER_ONLY has subordinated balance types with 'BALANCE' usage.

Added validation that the total length of FirstName and LastName does not exceed 30 characters. Numeric country code used for attributes in the bertlv container has been prepared for VISA.

      • CARDS-50455 [Issuing] Data in the "Installment" block of the "Cardholder Contract Statement" report can now be sorted.
      • CARDS-50580 [Issuing authorisation] When an attempt to create or change token information is made in Stand-In mode, the error "Tokenization is not available in stand-in mode" occurs.
      • CARDS-50590 [NSPK interface] NSPK Inward Processing: fixed "Inward Invalid number format for PDS-0301" error for large numbers. Also, the "TRAILER_CHECKS" parameter for the NSPK Inward Processing pipe has been added to skip checking values from trailers.
      • CARDS-50626 [NSPK interface] NSPK Outward Processing: added a check for DE12 (must not be greater then PDS-0105.2 (file date)). Added the "FILE_REF_DATE" pipe parameter for file date (PDS-0105.2) filling, parameter values are "SYSTEM" (default value, system time is used) and "BANK" (bank date is used).
      • CARDS-50627 [Core] Object Task Scheduler task for client addresses links renewing after client or contract approval now is switched off by default and can be switched on by the global parameter RENEW_ADDRESS_LINK.
      • CARDS-50648 [DB kernel] DML tagging for acnt_contract.last_scan does not work if "Upgrade Stoplist" synch flow is present.

For example, to provide Itemized Document Code for AMEX Representment a tag "ADD_TAG_X=REQ_IDC;" in Parm List field can be added on the activity "Create Representment (Acq)".

    • 03.43.30.20
      • CARDS-49704 [MasterCard interface] There are two ways for implementing additional identification when TAR occurs. The first is to set the global parameter AUTH_REQ_ADD_AUTH_METHOD='1'. When the parameter is set and the special tag FORCE_AUTH in the Service is set to "Y", error code 85 is returned. When Primary Account Number Source method of PAN capture is manually entered by the cardholder or if it is a "card on file" from the wallet provider, error code 85 is returned.
      • CARDS-49793 [Acquiring authorisation] The ACQ_ONLINE tag affects the entire document chain.

    • 03.43.30.16
      • CARDS-49906 [Instalment management] Instalment Tariffs with the Instalment Fee and Instalment Scheme roles now can be configured to check document tags and additional properties. This makes it possible to specify "If Preference Type" for an Instalment Fee tariff, for example.
      • CARDS-49977 [Product management] The ability to redefine an entry due date from a custom document tag has been implemented. The tag DUE_DATE_TAG=<tag name> should be defined in the Service's "Service Details" field and the corresponding tag with value format 'YYMMDD' should pass in the document's "Add Info".
      • CARDS-50007 [Tariff management] The "Active Tariffs" form, that could be found in OpenWay\Tariffs\Tariff for Contracts (Edit Personal) - Active Trf has been enhanced. When verifying tariff apply rules for a contract, contract conditions are checked.
      • CARDS-49430 [Transaction management] Now we mark a transaction with NE% transaction condition without STAN as authorised.
      • CARDS-49759 [Instalment management] Fee Capitalized into principal changes the Unpaid Principal amount limit upon the capitalization when corresponding invoice event changes it's status from "Written-off".
      • CARDS-49971 [Product management] Tariff Domain contract parameter validation has been fixed for "Billing Level Only" and "Top Level Only" parameters. Additional validation of the "Location of Current Value" field value has been added: the value for such contract parameters can be "Contract" or "Classifier" only.
      • CARDS-50045 [NSPK interface] The format of the "Territory Code" field has been corrected in the NSPK statistic acquiring report.
      • CARDS-50049 [Core] Mirroring of contract parameter value to classifier is fixed in case when contract parameter was set or removed by event with ACNT_TAG configuration on Event Type.
      • CARDS-50053 [Core] Fixed setting and removing of contract parameter by event with ACNT_TAG configuration on Event Type.
      • CARDS-50077 [Application management] A new Product tag, STOCK; has been introduced. This tag should be set in the Custom Data field of Products used to register large numbers of stock "Instant Issuing" cards within the same hierarchy. This tag disables refresh of data in a contract hierarchy during contract approval, so the tag may not be set in issuing or acquiring products used for ordinary customer contracts. Use of this tag makes it possible to avoid performance problems seen in Applications inward interfaces (batch or SOA) when an Instant Issuing card is sold to a customer as the contract approval process is always called during application processing.
      • CARDS-50089 [Core] View CONTRACT_DATA field USAGE_LIMIT_STR: if length of limiters data more than 4000 letters then the string will replaced to asterisks
      • I1606280305 [Risk management] [CARDS-50040] Form "Usage Recalculation Result" show only records for recalculation processes now.
      • I1608108465 [Product inspector] [CARDS-49855] Exporting product inspectors scripts is fixed. It now uploads all subscripts linked to the main script.
      • I1608246647 [Product management] [CARDS-50065] Fixed Fee Account search for child Service pack (case when Financial Institution numeration scheme was changed).
      • I1608300685 [Application management] [CARDS-50093] Advanced Application R1 supports special *#N symbols in the <PlasticInfoTitle> tag to clear this field in a client or contract record.
      • I1608314913 [Product management] [CARDS-50066] balance_type.amnd_date and balance_type.amnd_officer DB table columns now are updated for historical records during Balance Type validation process.
      • CARDS-50080 [VISA interface] Reimbursement Attributes Configuration: Modified CEMEA region.
    • 03.43.30.11
      • CARDS-49992 [Data preparation and card personalization] D-PAS (Diners Club) supported in data preparation module.
      • CARDS-49862 [Product inspector] A new step type, "Set Contract Parameter", has been added to Product Inspector.
      • CARDS-49869 [Reversal management] Classifier history is no longer deleted during the correction process. Corrected classifier values are marked with a special status is_active=Z for correct synchronisation with Datamart.
      • CARDS-50034 [Core] Evening End of Day is ready for Distributed Processing.
      • I1608234331 [Accounting] [CARDS-50038] Fixed automatical GL renumeration triggering in case the contract's product is changed to the new one with different Tariff Domain containing Tariff Role = GL Numeration tariffs with new values.
      • CARDS-49825 [VISA interface] To implement the latest requirements for Visa Operating Certificates (QMR) Reports issued 9 June 2016: Issuing Report: In the Card Issuance portion of the operating certificates, Visa has removed metrics previously attributed to the "Number of Active Cards" and added a section called "Number of Issued Chip Cards." Acquiring Report: In the Merchant Data portion, Visa has removed / clarified metrics under "Number of Merchant Outlets" and added sections called "Number of Terminals Installed at Merchants" and "Number of mPOS Terminals Installed at Merchants."
    • 03.43.30.10
      • CARDS-49852 [Risk management] Fixed incorrect restriction for usage operations in DDDW on form "OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Alerting Setup\Usage Operation Request"
      • CARDS-49864 [Product management] SET_CONTRACT_PARM API to set a contract parameter with Mirror To Classifier has been fixed.
      • CARDS-50005 [Product management] Restored the ablity to set a standard classifier when a contract parameter with the same code and "Mirror To=Classifier" option is set.
      • CARDS-50019 [Instalment management] Custom fees excluded from standard summary rate (INST_INF_RATE tag in invoice_log.posting_details) calculation.
      • I1608181057 [Product management] [CARDS-50001] Added additional conditions for selecting inherited orders to synchronise "Reason details" with the template order during the MIGRATE_INHERITED procedure on upgrade.
      • CARDS-49716 [JCB interface] JCB: Added functionality for loading JCB BIN Table.
      • CARDS-49905 [NSPK interface] Added a new column, "Territory Code", for the NSPK "Acquiring Business" statistics report. This column contains the code of the territory where a device is located. The first two numbers of the OKATO code are used as the code.
    • 03.43.30.09
      • CARDS-49954 [Accounting] Re-ageing is stopped as soon as the most delinquent bucket's balance exceeds the variance amount.
      • CARDS-49976 [Core] Contract parameters cache has been fixed for configurations with Tariff Domain contract parameters.
      • CARDS-49989 [Distributed processing] CDU with LAST_SCAN_MODE=S skipped new contracts.
      • I1604188226 [Core] [CARDS-49967] Form link from Process Message forms to Doc could open the doc was not related to this message

      • I1608183148 [Automated routines] [CARDS-49933] Fixed Start of the day procedure problem during date shifting where multiple Time zones are configured in the system
    • 03.43.30.04
      • CARDS-49357 [Tariff management] Priority for attaching tariff sub-domains has been implemented for parent domains with the tag ATTACH_SUBS. The PRIOR tag should be used in sub-domain Apply Rules.
      • CARDS-48139 [Invoice management] A new global parameter, DO_NOT_SCAN_INVOICES, has been added. This parameter regulates the scanning of invoices on CDU.
      • CARDS-49714 [Core] "BT_SIMPLE" mode processing has changed: Current Due Min Amount Threshold, configured as specified in the Statement Tariff or Account Scheme Min Repayment value, and Full Statement Balance Threshold, configured as a new Threshold tariff with the predefined code "MTP_FULL_BALANCE", have been introduced.
      • CARDS-49788 [Core] Now "COUNTER_ONLY balances" are not shown in the "Balances for..." form. A new form, "Counters", has been added to show "COUNTER_ONLY balances". The "Entry N" field has been replaced by "Trx count" in the "Totals for..." form.
      • CARDS-49880 [e-Commerce acquiring] Added API to create TD_DOC in case of unsuccessful authentication.
      • CARDS-42412 [MasterCard interface] In reports: MC_Inward_Monetary_Transactions.rdf, MDS_Notification.rdf, Mastercard_Notification.rdf, Monetary_Transactions.rdf, Unmatched_Trans_DiffAmounts.rdf, Unmatched_Trans_NotAuth.rdf, VISA Inward Monetary Transactions.rdf calculation of Reimbursement Fee for reversal is corrected - now fee amount are used with sign which depends on document request category.

      • CARDS-49252 [Core] The functionality of Balance Types with the "COUNTER_ONLY" tag in the "Posting Details" field has been fixed for multi-currency cumulation mode (when accounts in different currencies are registered for the contract). The logic for recording COUNTER_ONLY balances has also been changed, now they are "positive" for Advices and "negative" for Reversals. A new technical currency - "NUM" has been added for recording "COUNTER_ONLY" Balance Types. Please see "Client Upgrade Notes" for detailed information.

      • CARDS-49353 [Reversal management] Conditions have been added to show only those actions that can be called for a document.
      • CARDS-49370 [Application management] When an Advanced Application R2 application to set a credit limit contains a comment that is more than 255 characters, the corresponding message will be returned instead of 'Internal error'.

Please see "Client Upgrade Notes" for detailed information.

      • CARDS-49635 [Acquiring authorisation] The global parameter "USE_PTID_IN_P2P" has been added to manage the PTID tag as a P2P money transfer indicator. If the parameter is set to "Y", the PTID tag is used to indicate a P2P money transfer transaction. The default value is "N".

    • 03.43.30.02
      • CARDS-49283 [Core] The tariff domain contract parameter is checked after the Product has been changed.
      • CARDS-49600 [Instalment management] Way4 now supports the ability to create an instalment plan after the adjustment of the original document is posted on the amount of the advice macrotransaction of the received adjustment. To enable this feature set the INST_CREATE_ON_ADJUSTMENT=Y global parameter or tag in the "Special Parms" field of the financial institution's details.
      • CARDS-48435 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard IPM Inward: Stopped logging non-fatal file format errors to Process Log.
      • CARDS-49455 [JCB interface] Merchant Management: Fixed processing of operations that were not completed.
      • CARDS-49602 [Product inspector] A client created when running a test script will have the same "Client Type" field value as the contract.
      • CARDS-49733 [Dispute assistant] DA v2: Retail Reversal processing if a case is being created for an incoming chargeback.
      • CARDS-49780 [Issuing authorisation] Fixed incorrect processing of "non-zero" approval response codes on IRouter for transit authorisation request responses.
      • CARDS-49785 [Instalment management] Fixed instalment advance fee calculation in secondary actions when there are several fees for the instalment plan.
      • I1604208358 [Accounting] [CARDS-49678] Added macrotransaction cache reset on contract reprocessing error.
      • I1605233793 [VISA interface] [CARDS-49801] Fixed VISA REJECTS/RETURNS processing for REJECT_DOC view to work correctly.
      • I1607159147 [VISA interface] [CARDS-49790] VISA BII Outward: Added additional check for "Merchant City" field.
      • I1608026553 [Product inspector] [CARDS-49770] Fixed product definition for creating subcontracts in Product Inspector.
      • CARDS-49583 [NSPK interface] NSPK Proprietary: added support for PDS-2072.
      • CARDS-49584 [NSPK interface] NSPK Clearing: supported new DE22 values.
      • CARDS-49739 [UnionPay interface] UnionPay Inward/Outward: Supported Institution Identification Number Expansion for settlement files.
      • CARDS-49740 [UnionPay interface] Union Pay: Products updated in IPS Product Definition table according to October 2016 Release.
      • CARDS-49742 [UnionPay interface] UnionPay Inward/Outward: Added the "Single/Dual Brand Indicator" field to settlement files without any processing.
      • CARDS-49744 [UnionPay interface] UnionPay Inward/Outward: Supported Transaction Initiating value 06 (manual cash withdrawal) for settlement files.
      • CARDS-49797 [Transaction management] Transaction Conditions: Added procedure to recalculate convolution for transaction attributes. To recalculate, run OpenWay\Full\DB Administrator Utilities\Special OpenWay Utilities\Interchange\Recalc TC Convolution.

      • CARDS-49635 [Acquiring authorisation] The global parameter "USE_PTID_IN_P2P" has been added to manage the PTID tag as a P2P money transfer indicator. If the parameter is set to "Y", the PTID tag is used to indicate a P2P money transfer transaction. The default value is "N".

      • CARDS-48628 [Issuing authorisation] Added Instalment data filling for sending to POS in authorization response
      • CARDS-49146 [Tariff management] A new field "Apply Rules" has been added to forms for viewing and editing Tariff Domains.
      • CARDS-49220 [Core] New fields, start_local_date and end_local_date, related to mtr.local date have been added to the cs/decision log.
      • CARDS-49227 [Core] Most frequently used reports have been updated. Now each time a report is run, the report name will be logged in process log parameters in the REPORT tag and the menu item name will be logged in the TITLE tag.
      • CARDS-49245 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard IPM Inward: Supported loading installment data form PDS0181.
      • I1510156268 [MasterCard interface] [CARDS-49236] MasterCard IRD Calculation: Supported CutOff Time checking for Timeliness processing.
      • CARDS-49267 [Fleet cards] Fixed padding in bertlv number format
      • I1606027645 [Fleet cards] [CARDS-49250] Adjustment documents fee calculation algorithm is changed to avoid rounding issues.
      • CARDS-48979 [Money transfers] According to the IPS requirements for Money Transfer bertlv E9 container generation is added to fill F112 of ISO message. CPID, CPRN calculation algorithms are arranged. P2P_EMPTY_NAME_SUBST global parameter added. This parameter defines constant value which will be used to fill in empty FirstName, LastName attributes of Sender in cases when these values should be filled in with 'Bank Name' value. If parameters is not defined 'UNKNOWN' constant value will be used.
      • CARDS-49029 [MasterCard interface] XLS_MC_Statistics_Issuing_Business.rdf report has been enhanced pursuant to MasterCardQ2 2016 requirements: On-us/Domestic Interchange/International reporting breakout for "ATM Cash" and "Manual Cash" part has been removed. Only "Total ATM Cash" and "Total Manual Cash" is reported in the "Total Cash Advances" section. "Local Use Only" section has been removed from MasterCard forms. It can be now shown by setting the report parameter "P_HIDE_LOCAL_USE_CARDS" value to "N" (the default value is "Y"). New "Open" and "Blocked" reporting columns have been added for the "Accounts and Cards" section for the following lines: - Accounts at the beginning of the quarter. - Accounts at the end of the quarter. - Cards at the beginning of the quarter. - Cards at the end of the quarter. The following fields have been added to the "Accounts and Cards" section: - Cards at the beginning of the quarter. - New cards. - Cards with at least one transaction during the quarter.
      • CARDS-49192 [MasterCard interface] XLS_MC_Statistics_Acquiring_Business report has been updated: the Cirrus/Maestro section has been split into two sections.
      • CARDS-49222 [VISA interface] The XLS_Visa_Statistics_Issuing_Business report now has new lines "Payments Received", "Misc Debits", "Misc Credits" in the "Account Reconciliation" section.
    • 03.43.29.18
      • CARDS-49098 [Instalment management] Instalment Rate/Interest Fee values passed as document tags and used for instalment fee calculation are now saved to an instalment plan's fee subtotal (invoice_log.posting_details).
      • CARDS-49103 [Instalment management] When using Shift Fee Charge Mode=Capitalize Fees Every Month / Capitalize Fees on First Portion, an additional check is made that the sum of fee invoices does not exceed the total pre-calculated amount of the fee.
      • CARDS-49216 [Dispute assistant] DA v2: Added function to check dispute configuration. Menu item ROOT.OpenWay.Dispute Assistant CM.Dispute Configuration.Check Dispute Configuration.
      • CARDS-49218 [Instalment management] Fee rate and calculation scheme used for instalment creation is shown in an instalment plan's "Subtotals" form.
      • CARDS-49219 [Fleet cards] Uniqueness validation added for Fleet Goods dictionary tables: goods_nomenclature.name, goods_nomenclature.code, goods_item.goods_group_id+name, goods_item.code, Nomenclature added to goods_group validation rules.
      • CARDS-49225 [Core] Country table. Currency Codes for Bulgaria and Russia.
      • I1606174351 [MasterCard interface] [CARDS-49202] MasterCard Inward Processing. Optimized reject messages processing by moving functionality of I305169548 to Accept Clearing process.
      • I1606223355 [VISA interface] [CARDS-49208] Now operations like Sales, ATM, Cash is summed up, another operations like Original Credits, Refunds is subtracted in count of transactions.
      • CARDS-49212 [Case management] Problem with case status when a group activity wasn't successful for some cases has been resolved.
      • CARDS-49221 [Application management] Deferred response file for unsuccessful application in Advanced Applications R2 always contains the original error message.
      • I1408123014 [Data preparation and card personalization] [CARDS-43895] Embossing Files.rdf: P_SHOW_ONLY_MAIN_APPLETS parameter has been added.N Plast and N PIN columns corrected
      • I1604209064 [MasterCard interface] [CARDS-49214] MasterCard Outward Processing. Now engine messages are linked to a document.
      • CARDS-49228 [NSPK interface] MasterCard Inward Processing. Supported Retrieval Request Acknowledgement message without processing.
    • 03.43.29.17
      • CARDS-48522 [Case management] The ROOT\OpenWay\Case Management menu has been reorganised: only configuration setup remains in this menu. All "Operations" menu items are configured in special menus: CM Consumer Collections, CM Risk Management, CM Card Blocking, Dispute Assistant CM - these menu items can work only with cases of the corresponding category.
      • CARDS-48941 [Customer/account management] A new contract search algorithm has been added to route transactions with one card to different accounts (issuing contracts) depending on Contract Parameters. Special configuration is required.
      • CARDS-49121 [Issuing authorisation] 3DS TD package now has support for distributed edition of Cards.
      • CARDS-49159 [MasterCard interface] The algorithm for calculating AMEX_MEMBER_ID, VISA_MEMBER_ID and MC_MEMBER_ID statistic attributes has been refactored. The BIN table's "Member ID" value is now used.
      • CARDS-49169 [Case management] The "Code" field has been added to Case Management domains. This field is mandatory for a domain and will be required during the domain approve process.
      • CARDS-49178 [Core] CMS Stat - information about reports and pipe names is gathered from process_log into PROCESS_GROUP.
      • I1604080041 [Application management] [CARDS-49167] Advanced Applications R2 now supports loading of the "Used As MK" field, which indicates whether the key is the master key.
      • I404248627 [Transaction management] [CARDS-40275] IPS Transaction Inward: Now "Checking errors: [Wrong condition pairs...]" messages are skipped.
      • CARDS-48547 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard Inward Processing: Processing File Reject messages.
      • CARDS-48950 [MasterCard interface] Affiliated BII Outward: fixed error message when processing unmatched secondary documents.

      • CARDS-49148 [Core] When an Additional Credit Limit is set, the value of the AUTH_LIM_DF tag in acnt_log.msg_details now changes.
      • CARDS-49151 [Case management] Repeated editing of documents created during a dispute cycle is now possible in Case Management dispute screens.

      • CARDS-49185 [Case management] It's impossible to approve/accept a document through manual, not Case Management, interfaces if this document is included in an open "Document Workflow" case. Other cases don't restrict access to their documents.

    • 03.43.29.16
      • CARDS-48743 [Case management] When a Case Management activity should create a new subcase but this case already exists, it will be linked to the current case and the corresponding message will appear when "Complete" is performed manually.
      • CARDS-48893 [Product inspector] Product Inspector supports setting tariffs with dates in the past for Reversal Management testing purposes.
      • CARDS-48289 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard Debit Switch is supported in the XLS_MC_Statistics_Acquiring_Business.rdf report. The P_CHANNEL parameter added. The default value is 'D', 'E', 'e'. Changes have been made to the standard version of cust_stat_attr_value. Please see Upgrade Notes on Impact changes for details.

      • CARDS-45953 [JCB interface] JCB Merchant Export: New 850 format is now supported. To export merchant data in new "850 bytes" format new "FILE_FORMAT"="850" parameter must be set for the "JCB Merchants Export" pipe.
      • CARDS-48012 [Product inspector] Product Inspector "Application for <>" form supports the "Mandate" button for applications with Object Type=ClientCounterparty
      • CARDS-48936 [Application management] Instalment Limits are supported in Advanced Applications R2.
      • CARDS-49030 [Product inspector] The ERR_MSG tag can be used to check an expected error message in a Product Inspector test step.
      • CARDS-49053 [Application management] Advanced Application R2 type validation now allows to have the Classifier section defined without any limitations/mandatory parameters (classifier code is no longer mandatory).
      • CARDS-49055 [Issuing authorisation] Bertlv tag processing of MDES data has been added.
      • I1602048837 [Case management] [CARDS-48934] In Case Management screens, the error message shown when an activity cannot be performed now includes the reason.
      • I1604154458 [Acquiring] [CARDS-48780] Contract Approve procedure will remove Merchant address "City" attribute leading spaces.
      • I1605184497 [Accounting] [CARDS-49077] A new report parameter, P_TO_HTML with the values Y/N has been added to XLS_GL_Trial_Balance.rdf. The default value is N. The "Y" value allows report data to be generated in HTML format. For this parameter to work, the File Extension field should also be set to 'html' in a customized menu item. The output driver should have the "SPREADSHEET" value as in the default menu item.
      • CARDS-48601 [Accounting] In report "GL_Account_Statement" the size of labels has been increased for displaying big amounts correctly.
      • CARDS-48999 [Reversal management] Supplementary account transfers are recalculated on correction processing.
      • CARDS-49089 [MasterCard interface] Calculation of Reimbursement Fee for reversal has been corrected, the fee amount is used with the right sign.
      • C1605053197 [MasterCard interface] [CARDS-48848] Fixed definition of IPS Product for MasterCard subtypes.

    • 03.43.29.14
      • CARDS-48913 [Data preparation and card personalization] Supported profile import from MCHIP Advance Profile Generator.
      • CARDS-48956 [Core] If any tariff domains in the hierarchy specified for a Product in the Tariff Domain field contain the ATTACH_BY_CODE=<value> tag in Apply Rules, the presence of a default Tariff Domain code defined as the <VALUE>=<default tariff domain code> tag in the Product's Custom Data field is validated when approving the Product.
      • CARDS-48525 [Instalment management] Instalment payment holidays behaviour has changed. All unpaid principal is now shifted after payment holidays, even that which is open and overdue.
      • CARDS-48629 [Core] A new interest calculation algorithm for Interest Scheme "360" has been implemented: IntScheme value for specifying the number of days in a year is determined with the formula InstScheme=12 * CycleWeight, where CycleWeight is the number of days in a billing cycle. To use this interest algorithm, set USE_MONTH_WEIGHT=B; for an account template, Accounting Scheme, financial institution, or global parameter.
      • CARDS-48722 [VISA interface] Affiliated Base II Inward: Added additional check to prevent posting of documents with ONUS source_channel from file, that is not loaded yet.
      • CARDS-48768 [Customer/account management] Deletion of accounting contracts has been moved from standard contract forms to a special menu.
      • CARDS-48857 [Reversal management] Instalment plans with the "SIMULATED' status are skipped in the correction process initiated by Reversal Management.
      • CARDS-48904 [Product inspector] Decision logging can be enabled for Product Inspector test scripts.
      • CARDS-49016 [Product management] Historical records are now saved in the APPL_PRODUCT table for changes in attached tariff domain contract parameters.
      • CARDS-49018 [Core] When approving a contract, the contract parameter whose value specifies the tariff domain code used for attaching a tariff domain is validated. If a parameter is not found for a contract, the default value will be taken from the corresponding tag in the contract's "Product Custom Data" field. When the additional contract tag ATTACH_DEF_FROM_SUBS is set, the contract parameter will be searched for and inherited from a subcontract's default value.
      • CARDS-49046 [NSPK interface] An NSPK report configuration file has been created and put in Opt\nspk_reporting\db\datam\NSPK_STAT_ATTR_ENG.txt
      • I1510262910 [Invoice management] [CARDS-48982] Added the ability to inherit tags on invoice payment resend. The tags to inherit should be listed in the RESEND_PAYM_INHERIT_TAGS global parameter.
      • CARDS-48598 [VISA interface] XLS_Visa_Statistics_Issuing_Business.rdf: Number of Statements Mailed section corrected, Number of Statements Mailed with Finance Charges section added.
      • CARDS-48880 [Core] Default parameter values have been changed in the XLS_NSPK_Statistics_Acquiring_Devices.rdf report, a new column, "Cb Territory" has been added to the report. Totals have been corrected in the layout of XLS_NSPK_Statistics_Acquiring_Devices.rdf and XLS_NSPK_Statistics_Acquiring_Business.rdf reports. Footers have been added to XLS_NSPK_Statistics_Issuing_Business_Prepared.rdf, XLS_NSPK_Statistics_Acquiring_Business.rdf, XLS_NSPK_Statistics_Acquiring_Devices.rdf reports
      • CARDS-48905 [Instalment management] Fixed calculation of non interest-based fees for secondary instalment plans: fees are calculated using the original transaction amount and parameters received in the original document; an advance fee is taken only upon Full Early Repayment.
      • CARDS-48945 [Money transfers] Fixed error in filling the CSOF tag for device host-to-host P2P operations.
      • CARDS-48978 [VISA interface] RA configuration has been modified for CEMEA and EU regions.
      • CARDS-48989 [Fleet cards] F0.ED, F0.EA.FFXX.ED attributes are returned from issuer.
      • CARDS-49013 [Issuing authorisation] Fixed the behaviour of adjustments with sec trans_conditions attributes. For transaction usage limiters, trans_conditions are taken from the primary transaction. For operation usage limiters, trans_conditions attributes are not inherited from the primary transaction.
      • CARDS-49024 [Accounting] Due Date will not longer be copied from previous cycle if it could not be calculated for the new cycle and no conditions for Due Date are met.
      • I1503315299 [VISA interface] [CARDS-49041] VISA Outward: fixed filling POS_Terminal_Capability for magnetic stripe operations on EMV terminals when the DEV tag is absent.
      • I1604278984 [Application management] [CARDS-49039] Performance of address application R2 caused by not optimazed query to paym_rec table has been improved.
      • I1605241039 [Money transfers] [CARDS-49004] CSOF tag made optional for P2P transactions with credit of OnUs card.
      • I1605304783 [NSPK interface] [CARDS-49051] NSPK Outward: fixed filling DE63 for Refunds.
      • I1606010576 [Product management] [CARDS-49022] Product approval has been changed: Product Renew Mode has been added. When the FREE_SUBTYPE parameter is set, exhaustive validation of a Product's subtype BIN table range correspondence has been excluded.
      • CARDS-48998 [NSPK interface] XLS_NSPK_Statistics_Acquiring_Business.rdf: new columns (20 and 21) added. New parameters: P_IS_TRANSFER_CREDIT_FLT = tt.trans_type_idt = '0614 2' P_IS_TRANSFER_DEBIT_FLT= tt.trans_type_idt = '0513 1'

      • CARDS-48729 [NSPK interface] NSPK Outward: fixed "PHONE" tag processing: if its value doesn't begin with 3 digits, it is unloaded in field 0170.3, not 0170.1.

      • I1605118135 [Core banking interface] [CARDS-48898] RBS. Outward Processing: added the TRANS_DTLS_TO_REASON_DTLS parameter.
    • 03.43.29.12
      • CARDS-48391 [Core] Balance Types configuration has been changed significantly. Some impact changes have been introduced in order to make the configuration more straightforward and avoid dubious setup. Balance Types configuration automatic update and validation will be performed during upgrade and results will be logged in the Process Log. For more information, see "Client Upgrade Notes".
      • CARDS-48706 [Product management] Contract functional dates have been enhanced. Now it is possible to configure custom Date Types and use them in Date Schemes. This feature can help to configure complicated Product setup when standard functional dates behaviour does not meet business requirements. However each business case should be analysed carefully and the decision to use a custom Date Type requires approval from the OpenWay product team in each individual case.
      • CARDS-48823 [Instalment management] Recalculation of an instalment plan on its activation during financial document processing is supported.
      • CARDS-48841 [Transaction management] Tags SIC_LIST, EXC_SIC_LIST, TRANS_FX now work for all tagged data validation. They can be defined under Preferred, they can be defined in Service in the Service Details field, in Usage Template in the Spc Parms field, and in Tariff in the Apply Rules field, in order to define the rules for document processing.
      • CARDS-48863 [Core] The SET_THROUGH tag is no longer supported. Please see "Client Upgrade Notes" for detailed information.
      • CARDS-48870 [Tariff management] Links for Instalment-related tariffs have been added to the Tariff Data View.srd form.

    • 03.43.29.10
      • CARDS-47754 [AMEX interface] AMEX GFS: Supported Global Settlement File Notification import.
      • CARDS-48641 [High availability] Implemented protection against changes in data for contracts that are authorised in secondary databases.
      • CARDS-48570 [Instalment management] It is now possible to specify Shift Plan and Free Period when creating an Instalment Plan from a transaction or balance.
      • CARDS-48622 [Acquiring authorisation] Added Send-to-Friend transfers. P2P, P2P Reversal, Billing Payment and Billing Payment Reversal operations are supported. The card number may be unknown in Phase 1. Between Phase 1 and Phase 2 a card is searched for by a code. This interface can be used for payments when the payment transfer recipient's requisites are initially unknown.
      • CARDS-48653 [Instalment management] New "Shift Fee Charge Mode" values for an instalment scheme have been added to capitalise fees calculated for a shift period into the Principal: "Capitalize Fees Every Month" and "Capitalize Fees on First Portion". These modes define the frequency of capitalisation.
      • CARDS-48737 [Instalment management] Instalment simulation mode can be specified with the INST_SIM_MODE tag in a document's add_info field.
      • CARDS-48748 [Acquiring] Operations Pcash_pos, Pcash_pos_reversal, Pcash_atm, Pcash_atm_reversal. Pcard_control_request, Ppin_change, Ppin_change_rev are added into standard.
      • CARDS-48277 [VISA interface] RA configuration and interchange tariffs have been modified for VISA International, EU, Ireland and Iceland.
      • CARDS-48471 [Instalment management] Early repayment of an instalment plan with a flat fee no longer changes the fee amount. On full repayment, the full fee amount is taken. On partial repayment, an advance fee is not taken, the new plan preserves the fee amount from the original plan.
      • CARDS-48733 [SEPA interface] Fixed the issue when Accept for an application to activate an individual order failed if the linked mandate's "date_from" value was a date in the future.
      • CARDS-48741 [Transaction management] Now we assume "offline" device authorisation is authorisation (doc tag ONLINE=Y/N)
      • CARDS-48746 [Data preparation and card personalization] Bug when tasks were incorrectly split between PIN Management files has been fixed.
      • CARDS-48758 [Case management] Problem with Oracle error in "New Sub Case by all selected documents" is resolved
      • CARDS-48776 [MasterCard interface] MPE Import: Life Cycle Indicator processing for IP0075T1.
      • CARDS-48788 [Dispute assistant] DA v2. Reject-documents processing.
      • I1411267508 [UnionPay interface] [CARDS-48777] CUP: Added "Accept Clearing" subitem to OpenWay\CUP\CUP. Daily Procedures\CUP. Inward Processing\CUP Inward Processing.
      • I1604194090 [Issuing authorisation] [CARDS-48761] Condition to create the error message "094-Duplicate reversal" has been corrected
      • I1604238369 [Product management] [CARDS-48804] "PARENT_LIMIT_PART" tag processing has been changed. Synchronisation of card`s credit limit with the account credit limit when it changes is performed according to the value of the global parameter "SET_CREDIT_LIMIT_MODE". After the period expires, the card`s credit limit is also restored to the original value (before the temporary credit limit was set). If the "PARENT_LIMIT_PART" tag is set in a Product's "Custom Data" (CUSTOM_DATA) field, but its value (percentage) is not defined, the card`s available credit limit for such contracts will be "0". The value (percentage) of the "PARENT_LIMIT_PART" tag in the Product's "Custom Data" (CUSTOM_DATA) field is only "initial", if this value must be changed, it must be done in the contract's "EXT_DATA" field. It's forbidden to set a fixed credit limit for a card if the "PARENT_LIMIT_PART" option is active for a Product.
      • I1605041699 [Diners Club interface] [CARDS-48750] DCI Clearing Import: Returned support for old releases.
      • I1605090770 [Core] [CARDS-48751] Merchant Management: Now we get Merchant Id and MCC directly from a merchant account contract and don't try to get device parameters.
      • I1605116864 [Transaction management] [CARDS-48802] MasterCard IRD Calculation: Removed hardcoded check for Cashback transactions.
      • CARDS-48567 [UC interfaces] Added Transaction Attributes support (instead of Transaction Condition).
    • 03.43.19.19
      • I1503315299 [VISA interface] [CARDS-49041] VISA Outward: fixed filling POS_Terminal_Capability for magnetic stripe operations on EMV terminals when the DEV tag is absent.

      • CARDS-48729 [NSPK interface] NSPK Outward: fixed "PHONE" tag processing: if its value doesn't begin with 3 digits, it is unloaded in field 0170.3, not 0170.1.
      • CARDS-48912 [Core] The "Check" action for the "Folder" tariff domain generates an error when there are tariffs in this domain.

    • 03.43.19.16
      • CARDS-48706 [Product management] Contract functional dates have been enhanced. Now it is possible to configure custom Date Types and use them in Date Schemes. This feature can help to configure complicated Product setup when standard functional dates behaviour does not meet business requirements. However each business case should be analysed carefully and the decision to use a custom Date Type requires approval from the OpenWay product team in each individual case.

      • CARDS-48887 [NSPK interface] NSPK Outward Processing: fixed null pointer exception when processing "TRANS_LOCATION" tag, fixed incorrect file creation in some cases when exception occurs.
      • CARDS-48890 [Transaction management] A routing contract is chosen considering document tags in custom rules.

      • I1603040013 [Case management] [CARDS-47944] If manual case creation is replaced by adding a document to an existing case, and the case is not closed by the activity, all documents in the case are marked as kept from Housekeeping.

    • 03.43.19.14
      • CARDS-48504 [Diners Club interface] DCI DXS Inward: Supported Disputes and Fees file processing.
      • CARDS-46989 [VISA interface] VISA BII Inward Processing : Added the ability to assign MULTICURRENCY_OIF_<ProcBIN>, VSS_HIGH_SRE_<ProcBIN>, MULTICURRENCY_<ProcBIN> parameters using a new form. To use the form, it is necessary to configure the parameters MULTICURRENCY_OIF_<ProcBIN>, VSS_HIGH_SRE_<ProcBIN>, MULTICURRENCY_<ProcBIN> in special forms called from OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Main Tables\Member Parameters in the same logical way as in the pipe, and remove these parameters from pipe settings.
      • CARDS-48443 [Notifications] To notify sender of Send-to-friend money transfer event SEC_CODE_EVNT will be triggered.
      • CARDS-48511 [Customer profile] Retry interval for the recurrent payments in WebBanking can be configured as in days as in hours.
      • CARDS-48635 [Data preparation and card personalization] Check for Cryptogram Version and EMV Cryptogram Scheme consistency added for VSDC and UICS cards.
      • CARDS-48643 [Instalment management] Special Auxiliary invoices can be created under instalment plan portions for fee capitalisation during the plan shift period.
      • CARDS-48660 [Product management] Search for an available tariff with the "OVL_THRESHOLD" tariff type is performed in the context of current document data (for example MCC or Merchant ID). Separate "OVL_THRESHOLD" tariffs can be configured with the "If Preference Type" definition.
      • CARDS-48665 [Issuing authorisation] Special activation method value for activation method "By phone" in TAR-response for MDES(VDEP) transactions has been realized. Constant written in address record as phone number will be used as an answer without masking if it contains alphanumeric symbols. AUTH_TOKEN_ADDR_TYPE global parameter contains the type of address record.
      • CARDS-48673 [Product management] The ability to trigger multiple CONTRACT_DELAY% events (with fee charging or notifications) based on different contract inactivity periods is supported.
      • CARDS-48674 [Application management] APPL_CHECK_EVNT global parameter is supported in Advanced Application R2 to prevent application decline in case when contract event can not be posted immediately.
      • I1604213654 [Application management] [CARDS-48638] Added houskeeping rule 'Purge Expired' for adv_appl table
      • CARDS-47827 [AMEX interface] AMEX GNS Merchant Management: Dates processing.
      • CARDS-48640 [Core] Fee Prediction calculation for DCC/MCA transactions has been fixed. To use the correct base amount for fee prediction calculation, the new value, CR_TRANS, should be used for the FEE_BASE tag.
      • CARDS-48645 [Dispute assistant] DA v2. Incoming Chargeback processing when it initiates creation of a case.
      • CARDS-48659 [Mobile banking] Fixed problem with adding client mobile number instead of updating the existing one.

      • CARDS-48707 [Core] Due Amount is not rounded for High Precision accounts by an Account Due order if the XF_ROUND tag is absent and the PRECISION tag is present.

      • I1603107121 [Transaction management] [CARDS-48664] Restored behaviour to allow multiple authorisation mode for MCC group code X instead of group code G.

      • CARDS-47936 [Instalment management] Instalment plans for a transaction can be simulated on demand.
      • CARDS-46183 [SEPA interface] SEPA: Added reject reason codes.

      • CARDS-47903 [VISA interface] Visa Inward: some technical changes have been made for processing settlement documents.
      • CARDS-48062 [Core] "Tariff Domain" contract parameter role has been supported.
      • CARDS-48121 [Notifications] %AUTH_SCH_IDT:TELEGRAM% is default address data value for message template prepared to send through Telegram channel
      • CARDS-48195 [Acquiring authorisation] New ability to restrict P2P OnUs transactions between cards of different FI hierarchies has been added. To activate this ability use P2P_CONF configuration tag FI_RESTRICT=Y;
      • CARDS-48205 [Automated routines] Standard CDU menu items are started using filtering by liab_category instead of liab_contract.
      • CARDS-48217 [Tariff management] A new field, "Default Is Active" in Tariff Types configuration is supported for Usage, Service and Service Limit tariff roles. If the "No" value is specified and a tariff is not found: the Service will be marked as not allowed and Usage will be skipped.
      • CARDS-48220 [Acquiring] MCA Product: the list of allowed/not allowed MCA currencies can be defined as a contract parameter for any contract used in processing MCA transactions (device contract, Nostro contract, DCC Contract).
      • CARDS-48222 [Product inspector] "Unmark as Standard" action has been added to Product Inspector Journal form.
      • CARDS-48223 [Product inspector] DA v2. Supported Create Reimbursement activity parametrization from Product Inspector.
      • CARDS-48276 [Money transfers] P2P Sender Data tags can be filled in in OnUs and Domestic transactions. To Activate this option use P2P_CONF parameter tag ONUS_CPNA=Y
      • CARDS-48309 [Instalment management] Added procedures for packing and unpacking instalment-specific BERTLV tags into corresponding document tags.
      • I1603100750 [Product management] [CARDS-48133] Fatal error in Contracts Daily Update process has been replaced with a non-blocking error message if a template standing order has been removed but an inherited standing order remains active. To protect against such problems, the inherited standing orders validation script "Check Template Orders References.UPG" is provided by OpenWay support for configuration validation before upgrade. See Upgrade Notes for more details.
      • I1603110989 [Issuing authorisation] [CARDS-48272] The procedure to select plastic for issuing authorisation has been corrected to improve processing of messages without a card expiration date. Previously, when such a message was received for a card after plastic reissuing the message would be rejected without a reason.
      • I1603178723 [Case management] [CARDS-48100] The menu item "ROOT.OpenWay.Case Management.Automated Routines.Scan Cases in parallel mode" can use a new parameter, "Condition", which can be customised to select particular cases. The standard menu item selects all open cases.
      • CARDS-44478 [Core] An Event-based contract parameter (EXT_DATA tag) value is now restored when the triggered Event is closed.
      • CARDS-46422 [Product inspector] Client parameters may now be specified when creating sub-contracts in Product Inspector using the "Contract: Create Sub" step.
      • CARDS-47890 [Product management] Use of the FEE_BASE_FROM tag for several custom fees with the same Fee Code has been fixed.
      • CARDS-48077 [Instalment management] Instalment Limits with the "Counter" type no longer depend on currency.
      • CARDS-48104 [SEPA interface] A mandate's "date_from" is taken to calculate a standing order for the SEPA Direct Debit "Date To" field value if the mandate's "last_used_date" is null.
      • CARDS-48108 [Application management] The <CheckAvailable> tag from an XML application for contracts is supported now in Advanced Applications R2.
      • CARDS-48135 [AMEX interface] AMEX GNS: Added reason codes 4516 and 4517 for fulfillment. Manual action.
      • CARDS-48137 [MasterCard interface] Country Table: Changed Direct Area from "MC: European Economic Area Sub-region" to "MC: Western European Sub-region" for countries: Andorra, Monaco, San Marino, Vatican City State, Antarctica, Greenland, Faroe Islands, Saint Barthelemy, Falkland Islands, Guernsey, Isle of Man, Jersey, Saint Helena, Ascension and Tristan Da Cunha, South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands. Manual Action!
      • CARDS-48145 [Data preparation and card personalization] Fixed incorrect processing of error messages which can occurs on cards production tasks loading.
      • CARDS-48157 [VISA interface] Visa BIN Table Import: removed the "PAYMENT" tag, added the "RESTRICT_PAYM" tag containing restricted BAI.
      • CARDS-48179 [Core banking interface] RBS Outward processing: fixed "precision overflow (HASH_TOT_AMOUNT)" error.
      • CARDS-48188 [Host2Host interface] Affiliated BII Inward:Fixed invalid "DEV" tag filling.
      • CARDS-48249 [Reversal management] Fixed processing <Base functional date>_NEXT during billing in correction process initiated by Reversal Management module.

      • I1504200238 [MasterCard interface] [CARDS-48147] MPE Import: fixed Daily file loading on the next day after Full and Daily files were loaded simultaneously.
      • I1508038215 [Fleet cards] [CARDS-48187] RetCode parameter removed from cust_bill_is_use_trf procedure. Cust should return USE_TARIFF=N and create Warning message if cannot to determine required processing flow for transaction.
      • I1512016218 [CB Gate] [CARDS-48232] Fixed storing of link between transaction and updated balance records.
      • I1512305689 [Customer/account management] [CARDS-48214] Contract level generation for acquiring contracts has been fixed in liability trees.
      • I1601213753 [MasterCard interface] [CARDS-47940] MPE Import: fixed repeated loading of Daily files that are newer than Full file.
      • I1603100476 [Product management] [CARDS-48171] Threshold amount calculation for standing orders with the "ORDER_AMNT_PARM=TARIFF_TYPE_CODE" tag in the "Posting details" field and a tariff type with Role=Threshold has been fixed for multi-currency contracts.
      • I1603218203 [MasterCard interface] [CARDS-48164] Interregional MasterCard Manual Cash Disbursement tariff have been modified.
      • I1603222795 [Application management] [CARDS-48260] Fixed an error in permissions for checking status to OK. This permission is validated only for ATMs now.
      • I1603235268 [MasterCard interface] [CARDS-48174] MasterCard IPM Inward: PDS0058 processing.
      • CARDS-48160 [Acquiring authorisation] Added the "RESTRICT_PAYM" tag containing restricted BAI ('BP','CC','CO','CP','FD','GD','GP','MD','PD','PG','PS','TU','AA','BB','CI','BI','MI','PP','OG)' or the "ALL" value, if all BAI are prohibited. The PAYMENT='N' tag is kept for backward compatibility.

      • CARDS-46893 [Diners Club interface] DCI DXS Outward: Supported new file name format.

      • CARDS-48153 [Third-party batch interface] RBS. Base24 Transactions Export: For AmEx/JCB/MIR/UPI NSPK transactions, CRD_FIID is filled with "NSPA"/"NSPJ/NSPK/NSPU" values.
      • CARDS-48234 [Accounting] Added new currency "BELARUSSIAN RUBLE" with Alphabetic code BYN, Numeric code 933 and Minor unit 2. Currency "BELARUSSIAN RUBLE" with Alphabetic code BYR renamed to "BELARUSSIAN RUBLE (old)". Manual Action!
      • CARDS-48281 [MasterCard interface] MPE Import: Supported moving IRD Selection Service Indicator in table IP0072T1 by Release 16.Q2 MPE changes on 31 March 2016.
      • I1603017876 [MasterCard interface] [CARDS-48172] CSOF tag filled in with Funding Source information in the Credit to MC P2P document according to MasterCard requirements. New P2P_CONF global parameter configuration tag CSOF_NO_DATA determines system behaviour if no Funding Source information is available. Valid values are: W - generate a Warning only, E - generate an Error and decline the transaction.

To protect against such problems, the inherited standing orders validation script "Check Template Orders References.UPG" is provided by OpenWay support for configuration validation before upgrade. See Upgrade Notes for more details.

      • CARDS-47567 [NSPK interface] New reports have been created: XLS_NSPK_Statistics_Issuing_Business_Prepared.rdf(OpenWay\NSPK\NSPK.       • CARDS-47726 [AMEX interface] AMEX GFS: Added new pipe to import Inquiry and Chargeback Notifications. Use menu item "OpenWay\AMEX GFS\AMEX. Daily Procedures\AMEX. Inward Processing\AMEX ICNF Import" to run pipe.
      • CARDS-48000 [Issuing] Added processing of new tag SEQV_N_MASK. The tag should be entered into contr_subtype.add_parms if needed. If the tag exists then Card Sequence Number for new plastics will correspond the Oracle's condition "CSN like <TagValue>". F.e., "SEQV_N_MASK=9_;" should be using to MIR(NSPK) cards.
      • CARDS-47240 [Product inspector] Added logging Contract Parameter Export in Product Inspector. To enable logging, use the LOG_MODE=CONTR_PARM_EXPORT tag in Test Options or in Step Parameters. Contract Parameter Export values can be viewed in the newly form Test Scripts -> Last Contr -> Contract Info -> Cntr Prm Exp.
      • CARDS-47419 [Acquiring authorisation] Tag DISp_ALG containing information about cash algorithm has been added.
      • CARDS-47660 [Product inspector] The "Create Order By Template" step has been added to the "For Contract" group in Product Inspector. See the manual for details.
      • CARDS-47938 [Issuing authorisation] Added ability to disable of reading of configuration of returning on authorisation responces balances from additional packages for performance increasing. Please, see documentation for details.
      • CARDS-47943 [Web banking] OpenWay\Published Services\Published Subscriptions is extended by address type and the ability to set an event type or a classifier type for service enrolment and cancelation. For use in Web Banking services only.
      • CARDS-48005 [Core] Dispute reason code processing has been enhanced. Tags are supported and can be set in the "Add Info" field (DSP_REASON.ADD_INFO): TRANS_TYPE_EXT=<Transaction Type Extension code>; allowing special services to be used for the specific reason code, and TRANS_TYPE_EXT_EVENT=<event code>; to generate an Event for the source/target contract.
      • CARDS-48088 [Instalment management] Simulated instalment plans now can be viewed using the "Simulated" link in Instalment Contract Data.
      • CARDS-48096 [Customer profile] EChannel Functionality List is stored now in the special database handbook and can be requested by the application to check whether the functionality is supported on the DB level.
      • CARDS-47619 [Notifications] Fixed Event generation when the 'ONE_FOR_DOC' tag is set in the Special Parameters field of an Event type.
      • CARDS-47912 [Core] A number of issues have been fixed in the "Contract Parameters" form (OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Common Handbooks\Contract Parameters). Existing data in the form should be reviewed and validated (see the "Check All" action in the form).
      • I1603082607 [High availability] [CARDS-48089] Fixing ignoring device status in Online nodes if it has been set in Backoffice in HA Switch
      • I1603164269 [Issuing authorisation] [CARDS-48094] Special symbol has been deleted from code.
      • I1603166447 [VISA interface] [CARDS-48097] IC tariffs have been modified for Iceland.
      • CARDS-47846 [Diners Club interface] DCI Acquirer Confirmation File processing: Settlement aggregation with consideration of transaction currency is supported by the pipe parameter SETTL_CUT_BY_TRANS_SETTL_CURR=Y (N by default).
      • CARDS-48064 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard SMS: Added Adjustment message codes. Contact Support for details.
    • 03.43.09.13
      • CARDS-47587 [AMEX interface] AMEX GFS: Added new pipe to import Inquiry and Chargeback Notifications. Use menu item "OpenWay\AMEX GFS\AMEX. Daily Procedures\AMEX. Inward Processing\AMEX ICNF Import" to run pipe.
      • CARDS-47606 [Notifications] OpenWay\Published Services\Published Subscriptions is now used for online published service configuration - as SMS notifications - too. It allows to connect the service with the special address type for getting mobile phone or email data. Property link allows to set up the special events or classifiers for enrolling and cancelling the service. And also a classifier for choosing the preferred delivery channel.
      • CARDS-47999 [Money transfers] New tag SENDER_AUTH has been added. The Y value will be set if correct sender data (Name-CPNA, Address-CPAD, City-CPCY, ClientCountry-CPCN, State-CPST(for USA, CAN), PostalCode-CPPC) are available.
      • CARDS-45312 [Acquiring] MCA Product: Multi-Currency Acquiring (MCA) conversion can be performed when posting acquiring documents. This feature allows to redefine the currency of an account for document posting, according to specific mapping between Transaction currency and settlement (accounting) currency and to apply a FX Rate Markup when converting funds using a special Service. In addition to Product configuration, to activate this functionality, documents loaded to WAY4 from an external system must contain the MCA_CONV=Q; (Request) tag in the "Add Info" field.
      • CARDS-47268 [Acquiring authorisation] ATM cassettes available balance computation mechanism has been changed. Number of diverted and rejected banknotes now affects available amount for cassette.
      • CARDS-47911 [Core] Balance history forms have been reorganised.
      • CARDS-47961 [Web banking] New form OpenWay\Published Services\Global Parameters allows parameters needed for online applications to be configured.
      • CARDS-47963 [Core] MCA Product: when the MCA_CONV=Y; tag is present in a document's "Add Info" field, we calculate the MCA Conversion Difference (Revenue or Expense). This is the difference between the payment amount expected from the payment system calculated directly from the transaction amount and based on the transaction amount in the Merchant Receivable currency.
      • CARDS-47978 [Issuing authorisation] Added support of some chip cards property when contactless transaction data does not contain of executed issuer script command couner
      • CARDS-48039 [Tariff management] The FOLDER tag can now be specified in Tariff Domain Apply Rules. The tag has the following effect: a Tariff Domain is not used in tariff search; Tariffs cannot be loaded or approved when located in a "Folder" Domain. The tag can be used in conjunction with ATTACH_BY_CODE and ATTACH_SUBS tags.
      • CARDS-48040 [Tariff management] The ATTACH_BY_CODE tag value specified in the "Tariff Domain Apply Rules" field defines the contract parameter whose value matches the unique tariff sub-domain code to be attached to the contract.
      • CARDS-48047 [Acquiring] MCA Product: It is now possible to define the currency of an expected payment from the IPS (Outgoing Suspense account currency) depending on the transaction currency. Selection of an Outgoing Suspense account currency can be set up using an FX tariff in a Nostro contract's Service. The ability to use one of a document's currencies (TRANS_CURR, SETTL_CURR, RECONS_CURR) as the FX_CURRENCY tag value has been added.
      • CARDS-48048 [Acquiring] A link for tariff configuration has been added to DCC Interchange contracts.
      • I1603111318 [Customer/account management] [CARDS-48031] Process log for OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Common Handbooks\Standard classifiers markup has been added.
      • CARDS-47620 [Product management] Full/DB Administrator Utilities/Special Contract Utilities/Recalc Balances for Contracts has been fixed for active overdraft blocking.
      • CARDS-47964 [DB kernel] The FastTrack upgrade works without errors.
      • CARDS-47987 [Issuing] XLS_MC_Statistics_Issuing_Business.rdf, XLS_Visa_Statistics_Issuing_Business.rdf reports: The P_MIRROR_OVD parameter has been added to the Delinquent Outstanding section.
      • CARDS-47997 [NSPK interface] NSPK Outward: fixed PDS0268 filling for partial secondary transactions.
      • CARDS-48008 [Host2Host interface] UFX Documents Import: APPLY_ARN pipe parameter processing.
      • I1601262918 [MasterCard interface] [CARDS-47832] MasterCard IPM Outward: Fee Collection/Funds Disbursement processing for our cards.
      • I1602255603 [Core] [CARDS-47937] Macrotransaction Source Amount filling has been changed. Due to FX conversion, this field may have been equal to zero; now for all such cases, the zero value is overridden by the amount of the entry posted to the source account. Please see Upgrade Notes for more details on this change impact.
      • I1603040013 [Case management] [CARDS-47944] If manual case creation is replaced by adding a document to an existing case, and the case is not closed by the activity, all documents in the case are marked as kept from Housekeeping.
      • CARDS-47076 [Host card emulation] Transaction Processing: Added TOKEN attribute, added Group Transaction Conditions <<All Token Initiated (Group)>> with G_TOKEN code and "TOKEN" formula and <<All HCE (Group)>> with G_HCE code and "TOKEN and REMOTE_CHIP" formula.
      • CARDS-47946 [MasterCard interface] IRD configuration has been modified in accordance with release 16Q2.
      • CARDS-47947 [MasterCard interface] IRD configuration has been modified in accordance with release 16Q2.
      • CARDS-47950 [MasterCard interface] IRD configuration has been modified in accordance with release 16Q2.
      • I1511020079 [POS management] [CARDS-47835] Added the MATCH_REVERSE_ONLINE parameter. If a reversal is received more than "MATCH_REVERSE_ONLINE" hours after the original transaction, it will be declined.
    • 03.43.09.12
      • CARDS-47667 [Case management] Supported new ProgramCode "REFRESH_CASE;" tag to refresh a case after a Case Management activity.
      • CARDS-47775 [Application management] Application/RegNumber field in DB has been increased to 64 characters.
      • CARDS-47859 [Health monitoring] Added support of Way4U monitoring by coms_log.
      • CARDS-47898 [Product inspector] The Create Group Script action in Product Inspector has been removed. Now Script export selection is available in OpenWay\Product Inspector\Test Scripts -> Actions -> Export by Group Code.
      • CARDS-47900 [Instalment management] Both automatic and manual early repayment of an instalment can now be forbidden for plans created in different Instalment Schemes.
      • CARDS-47932 [Notifications] Message converter has been enhanced to process new subsitution variables %AUTH_SCH_IDT:<AuthTypeCode>% and %AUTH_SCH_IDT_EXTENSION:<AuthTypeCode>% in notification templates. These varables should be placed in Address Data field of message template under Event Type, Service Package, Account Scheme or Product. Address Type field should be left empty for such message templates.
      • I210188470 [Accounting] [CARDS-41642] Ledger Category has been added to the Account Roles standard handbook. This field is used in the Data Warehouse interface.
      • CARDS-46997 [Reversal management] Fixed an issue with missing reversal correction record, related to reversal in the current billing cycle.
      • CARDS-47843 [Acquiring authorisation] Negative RC usages are fired on second phase of acquiring operation.
      • CARDS-47849 [NSPK interface] Fixed "Message Extraction Failed" error when unpacking NSPK Original Doc.
      • CARDS-47872 [Diners Club interface] Fixed "country not found" error for country codes that are not 3 digits.
      • CARDS-47914 [Diners Club interface] DCI Outward: Card Sequence Number processing for ATM Chip Addendum.
      • CARDS-47920 [Remote access] Procedures to On/Off usage limiter has been corrected to works in Telescope.
      • I1505106881 [Transaction management] [CARDS-47955] Now the form "OpenWay\Full\Documents Input & Update\Documents Troubleshooting\Documents - Resend Rejected" can be used with the global parameter FINANCIAL_REJECTS=N (not only with FINANCIAL_REJECTS=Y).
      • I1512226203 [MasterCard interface] [CARDS-47909] MC BIN Table loading: fixed absence of some necessary issuer records.
      • I1602295599 [NSPK interface] [CARDS-47904] Visa Inward: improved currency rate accuracy when loading settlement documents.
      • I310186397 [Core] [CARDS-37268] Problem when some GL Entries could be created with a GL Date in the past has been fixed. See Upgrade Notes for more details.
      • CARDS-47869 [VISA interface] RA configuration and IC tariffs have been modified for Liechtenstein in accordance with Regulation (EU) 2015/751.
      • CARDS-47896 [Acquiring authorisation] F43 field (Merchant Name (Trans_Details document field)) is now filled with SenderName attribute for Credit MoneyTransfer request to VISA according to VISA requirements
    • 03.43.09.11
      • CARDS-47767 [SEPA interface] ACTIVITY_DATE_TO and ACTIVITY_DATE_FROM fields of an individual standing order that is linked to a SEPA payment receiver are synchronised when the mandate's dates change: - date_from, date_to - cancellation_date - last_used_date.
      • CARDS-47796 [Issuing authorisation] Added support of PVV updates for MasterCard in PIN change and PIN set transactions and plastic reissuing.
      • CARDS-47803 [Application management] When activating an individual order for SEPA Direct Debit or SEPA Credit Transfer, it will automatically be linked to the Contract Counterparty created in previous sections of the same application.
      • CARDS-47813 [Core] Additional setup possibilities have been added to custom Services processing: the "Priority" field has been added to the "Custom Fee" screen form and now fees are processed in decreasing order of priority. The value calculated by custom fee can now be saved in the doc.add_info field as a tag. To do so, the SAVE_FEE tag should be added to the custom fee's "Service Details" field (it can also be used for <CALC> fees). These new features can be used for example to support acquiring fee sharing setup. Acquiring fee sharing setup should be consistent with general Acquiring Product and accounting setup. Special instructions are provided by OpenWay consultants under separate agreements. Please contact OpenWay for more details.
      • CARDS-46277 [MasterCard interface] MPE Import: now all MPE_IP00XXT1 tables are loaded from an MPE file unconditionally; improved performance for big MPE Daily files.
      • CARDS-47789 [Reversal management] An issue with incorrect interest calculation on reversal has been fixed. The issue occurred when the reversal start date coincided with the start of a year.
      • CARDS-47831 [Customer/account management] Processing of variable %ACCOUNT_INTEREST% has been corrected to empty billing cycle support.
      • CARDS-47834 [Reversal management] Contract base dates for previous periods saved in account billing log records are recalculated in the correction process.
      • CARDS-47857 [MasterCard interface] IC tariffs have been modified for Iceland.
      • I1512226203 [MasterCard interface] [CARDS-47815] MC BIN Table loading: fixed filling bin_table.bin_condition.
      • I1602164896 [Dispute assistant] [CARDS-47845] Dispute Assistant v2: Second Presentment and Second Chargeback amount processing for Credit transactions. Fixed previously incorrect calculation of Chargeback Balance (and 2nd presentment amount) when a chargeback had been performed for a credit transaction.
    • 03.43.09.10
      • CARDS-44969 [AMEX interface] Created a new pipe, AMEX Merchants Raw Data Import (com.openwaygroup.pipe.amex.merchants_raw_data_import.jar) to load per-transactional acknowledgments.
      • CARDS-47610 [AMEX interface] AMEX GNS Outward Processing: supported export of Merchant Discount Rate for POS 1st presentments when new pipe parameter MERCHANT_FEE_CODE is specified.
      • CARDS-47806 [UnionPay interface] CUP Outward Processing: For e-commerce transactions field, ECI is filled now with values 09 or 10. CUP Inward Processing: Transaction attributes are now set based on field ECI values 09 and 10.
      • I1511247895 [UnionPay interface] [CARDS-47574] UPI/CUP: Supported Fee Prediction.
      • CARDS-40687 [Product inspector] Item logging in Product Inspector is supported.
      • CARDS-43841 [Web banking] OpenWay\Published Services\Published Subscriptions is extended by address type and the ability to set an event type or a classifier type for service enrolment and cancelation. For use in Web Banking services only.
      • CARDS-45956 [VISA interface] Added Visa Edit Package Rejects support.
      • CARDS-47533 [Core] MIN_SETTL_AMOUNT and MAX_SETTL_AMOUNT tags have been added to the Special Parameters field of an Event type to check a document's settlement amount when checking event type availability and to determine notification limits, for example. Tag values may be a contract parameter or a fixed value in the contract currency.
      • CARDS-47566 [Invoice management] Additional information is now available for invoices in fleet configurations. Customization of invoice properties is extended.
      • CARDS-47646 [SEPA interface] SEPA Credit Transfer mandates are supported in the SEPA Interface module.
      • CARDS-47647 [Application management] A field for the payment receiver code value has been added to the "Appl Standing Order" form for advanced applications. The entered value will be checked among all existing payment receivers or created in previous sections of the same application.
      • CARDS-47685 [SEPA interface] "Activate" button for cancelled mandate has been removed.
      • CARDS-47692 [Instalment management] Instalment interest can be calculated up to the due date. To enable this mode, set the INST_INTEREST_TO_DUE global parameter to "Y".
      • CARDS-47718 [Core] XLS_CB_f250_1_Prepared.rdf: OpenWay\RF Reporting\Report Parameters Configuration (Form 250 Part 1) menu item has been created. It is used for Rep_type and Rep_parm tables loadig/updating.
      • CARDS-47760 [Core] The "Domain Code" field has been added to Classifier & Decision configuration forms.
      • CARDS-47823 [Acquiring] Product selection has been added to the "DCC Contracts" form.
      • I1406162997 [MasterCard interface] [CARDS-40816] Supported reversing outgoing MC IPM files.
      • I1509171811 [Transaction management] [CARDS-47676] Documents with category Is Authorization = 'Transit Auth' are now matched with "Fin" category documents for all outward presentments (IsOnUs = Yes/No).
      • I1601194217 [Multiple financial institutions] [CARDS-47638] Individual standing orders for 001-BRANCH_ACQ_FEES and 001-BRANCH_ISS_FEES have been deactivated in the default setting applied to all new WAY4 installations.
      • CARDS-40745 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard IRD Calculation: Supported ALM by the additional global parameter MC_CALC_IRD_ALM=Y.
      • CARDS-42826 [Core] SAVE_TGT_FEE/SAVE_SRC_FEE tag behaviour for adjustments has been fixed. Concerns XF_FEE_PREDICTION fees.
      • CARDS-43882 [AMEX interface] AMEX GNS Outward Processing: Fixed Chip Card (9240) ICC System Related Data field "Application PAN Sequence Number" filling. AMEX GNS Inward Processing: Fixed Chip Card (9240) ICC System Related Data fields "Application PAN Sequence Number", "Transaction Date", "Transaction Type" saving.
      • CARDS-44017 [MasterCard interface] IRD config autofilling: fixed IRD for Cash Disbursement for CPI=MCC,DMC.
      • CARDS-44609 [MasterCard interface] IRD config autofilling: Fixed product_id filling to consider not only CONFIG PRD_TYPE but also MPE_IP0052T1.Product_Type_Id.
      • CARDS-44687 [MasterCard interface] IRD config autofilling: ird_fee_desc amount restrictions are not reset now on IP0030T1 MPE Daily Update if ird_fee_desc record received these restrictions from CONFIG.
      • CARDS-44868 [MasterCard interface] IRD config autofilling: changed "Possible error in MPE: no products for ..." message type from Warning to Debug.
      • CARDS-45273 [VISA interface] RA configuration has been modified for Visa International.
      • CARDS-45379 [Core] A classifier's bank_date is now inherited from the posting date of the macrotransaction if it is created in the EOD posting process, or from the Event start date if it is generated when posting an Event. A Decision's bank_date is now inherited from the trigger classifier bank_date. Decision bank_date and bank_date_to are now recorded in the decision log.
      • CARDS-46007 [VISA interface] VISA VCF Export: Fixed NPE on T1 forming when parameters PAST_DUE_1_CYCLE_CODE, PAST_DUE_2_CYCLES_CODE, ...PAST_DUE_6_CYCLES_CODE, PAST_DUE_X_CYCLES_CODE are not specified.
      • CARDS-46135 [SEPA interface] New forms have been created with the capability to repost/resend rejected SEPA direct debit/credit documents. When reposting, the document invoice_party record is copied from the original to the new document.
      • CARDS-46214 [Issuing authorisation] Fixed incorrect processing of authorisation request for partial approval when a card's available amount is equal to zero.
      • CARDS-46232 [Fleet cards] Authorization Retail Item document no more created if transaction declined.
      • CARDS-46238 [NSPK interface] NSPK outward: fixed incorrect filling of PDS-0025.02.
      • CARDS-46242 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard IPM Outward: Changed pipe parameter TRAILER_CHECKS default value to "N".
      • CARDS-46262 [Issuing authorisation] Fixed incorrect reversal of fee document which was created by a usage limiter for non-transaction operations (Change PIN, Balance Inquire etc.) in the Clear Old Pendings process.
      • CARDS-46266 [NSPK interface] NSPK interface: directory parameters have been added: NSPK outward: OUTPUT_DIRECTORY NSPK inward: SOURCE_DIR

      • CARDS-46269 [NSPK interface] NSPK Outward: pipe now logs an error, not a warning when a document is suspended.
      • CARDS-46289 [NSPK interface] NSPK Outward - the pipe truncates F41 (Card Acceptor Terminal Id) to 8 symbols.
      • CARDS-46291 [Product inspector] Case Management activity user and case owners can be excluded from test log comparison in Product Inspector by setting the special tag CM_COMPARE_OWNER=N; in test script options.
      • CARDS-46307 [Security & key management] Bug with repeated pipe starting has been fixed. New records that appeared since the previous start of the pipe are now dumped.

      • CARDS-47341 [Acquiring authorisation] Merchant name has been extended up to 83 characters for DCI channel. The same global parameter MERCHANT_NAME_LENGTH_X as for AMEX interface is used to define Merchant name length.
      • CARDS-47345 [Issuing] XLS_MC_Statistics_Issuing_Business.rdf: "Accounts at beginning of quarter", "New accounts obtained during the quarter" and "Accounts lost during quarter" fields in the Accounts and Cards section have been corrected.
      • CARDS-47348 [Diners Club interface] Diners Club Acquiring filter has been changed to Diners Club. The components.ini file has been fixed.
      • CARDS-47352 [Issuing] Fixed procedure of unmarking card for production for Cards with applets without contract.
      • CARDS-47361 [NSPK interface] NSPK Inward: processing of file continues when "Wrong condition pairs" error occurs.
      • CARDS-47365 [SEPA interface] SEPA Export: Field "ReqdExctnDt" filling for credit transfer documents with the posting date
      • CARDS-47378 [UnionPay interface] CUP Outward Processing: Fixed filling TC100 'Amount, transaction' field to match its value with Authorization Field 4 when an Acquirer fee is present.
      • CARDS-47424 [NSPK interface] NSPK Inward: if PDS0268 doesn't exist, fill doc.trans_amount from DE004.
      • CARDS-47432 [NSPK interface] NSPK Outward: fixed DE033 filling for second chargeback.
      • CARDS-47437 [MasterCard interface] MasterCard CDF Export: Now the pipe gets issuer data from the clearing financial institution for the institution specified in pipe parameter FI_ID. The configuration must be checked or tested!
      • CARDS-47444 [VISA interface] VISA VCF Export: now the pipe gets issuer data (including Issuer Identification Number and Processor Identification Number) from the clearing financial institution of the institution specified in the FI_ID pipe parameter.
      • CARDS-47460 [SEPA interface] SEPA Export: xsd validation problems.
      • CARDS-47461 [Issuing authorisation] Workflow for incomplete validation of security values on IRouter has been corrected.
      • CARDS-47466 [Acquiring] Transaction documents with transaction types with Direction = None (e.g. Retrieval Requests) are not processed by the DCC_ACCOUNTING service and therefore do not generate supplementary GL-entries in DCC Accounting contracts.
      • CARDS-47474 [Reversal management] Now the local amount sign for a reversal macrotransaction created by the Reversal Management module is not inherited from the original macrotransaction and is the same as in traditional reversal processing, i.e. has the inverse sign to an Advice macrotransaction.
      • CARDS-47475 [UnionPay interface] CUP Inward Processing/CUP Outward Processing: revised clearing and settlement message codes for compliance with CUP SMS. Manual action required! Contact Support for details. UnionPay Audit Trailer File Import (com.openwaygroup.pipe.cup.audit_trailer_import.jar): changed 2 settlement message codes: S2OAI2X- to S2OAI2X0 and S2III2X- to S2III2X0. Please modify them manually in OpenWay\Full\Configuration Setup\Transaction Types\Message Types.
      • CARDS-47480 [MasterCard interface] MC BIN Table loading: removed extra bin_table records.
      • CARDS-47487 [NSPK interface] Fixed "System Error" when loading a Retrieval Request.
